atk-s0302a:14_11: Na hi bhagavā ayutte dese kāle ca dhammaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0302a:14_18: bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhūpagatoti bhikkhū”tiādinā nayena vacanattho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:14_34: Tena ca tesaṃ bhikkhanasīlatādiguṇayogasiddhena vacanena hīnādhikajanasevitavuttiṃ pakāsento uddhatadīnabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti.
atk-s0302a:14_35: “Bhikkhavo”ti iminā ca karuṇāvipphārasommahadayanayananipātapubbaṅgamena vacanena te attano abhimukhe
atk-s0302a:14_36: karonto teneva kathetukamyatādīpakena nesaṃ vacanena sotukamyataṃ janeti,
atk-s0302a:14_37: teneva ca sambodhanatthena sādhukaṃ manasikārepi niyojeti.
atk-s0302a:15_0: Aparesupi devamanussesu vijjamānesu kasmā bhikkhūyeva āmantesīti ce?
atk-s0302a:15_4: seṭṭhā anagāriyabhāvaṃ ādiṃ katvā satthucariyānuvidhāyakattā sakalasāsanapaṭiggāhakattā ca,
atk-s0302a:15_7: Apica te dhammadesanāya bhājanaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattisabbhāvato.
atk-s0302a:15_8: Visesato ca ekacce bhikkhūyeva sandhāya ayaṃ desanāpīti evaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0302a:16_0: Kimatthaṃ pana bhagavā dhammaṃ desento paṭhamaṃ bhikkhū āmantesi,
atk-s0302a:16_3: Bhikkhū aññaṃ cintentāpi vikkhittacittāpi dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāpi kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontāpi nisinnā honti.
atk-s0302a:16_4: Te anāmantetvā dhamme desiyamāne “ayaṃ desanā kiṃnidānā kiṃpaccayā katamāya aṭṭhuppattiyā desitā”ti sallakkhetuṃ asakkontā duggahitaṃ vā gaṇheyyuṃ,
atk-s0302a:16_6: tena nesaṃ satijananatthaṃ bhagavā paṭhamaṃ āmantetvā pacchā dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0302a:17_8: Te bhikkhūti ye bhagavā āmantesi, te.
atk-s0302a:17_10: abhimukhā hutvā suṇiṃsu sampaṭicchiṃsu paṭiggahesunti attho.
atk-s0302a:17_12: bhagavā etaṃ idāni vattabbaṃ sakalasuttaṃ avoca.
atk-s0302a:17_13: Ettāvatā yaṃ āyasmatā ānandena atthabyañjanasampannassa buddhānaṃ desanāñāṇagambhīrabhāvasaṃsūcakassa
atk-s0302a:17_14: imassa suttassa sukhāvagāhaṇatthaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:18_0: Idāni paṭiccasamuppādaṃ votiādinā nayena bhagavatā nikkhittassa suttassa saṃvaṇṇanāya okāso anuppatto.
atk-s0302a:18_1: Sā panesā suttavaṇṇanā yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0302a:18_8: Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayeneva katheti,
atk-s0302a:19_0: Yāni pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā.
atk-s0302a:19_1: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ nijjhānakkhamaṃ
atk-s0302a:19_2: manaṃ abhinīhāraṃ bujjhanabhāvañca apekkhitvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni,
atk-s0302a:20_0: Bhagavantaṃ pana upasaṅkamitvā catasso parisā cattāro vaṇṇā nāgā supaṇṇā gandhabbā asurā yakkhā mahārājāno
atk-s0302a:20_1: tāvatiṃsādayo devā mahābrahmāti evamādayo “bojjhaṅgā bojjhaṅgāti, bhante,
atk-s0302a:20_7: kiṃsūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”ntiādinā nayena pañhaṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0302a:20_8: Evaṃ puṭṭhena bhagavatā yāni kathitāni bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni,
atk-s0302a:21_0: Yāni pana tāni uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca kathitāni,
atk-s0302a:21_3: Cūḷasīhanādasuttaṃ puttamaṃsūpamaṃ dārukkhandhūpamaṃ aggikkhandhūpamaṃ pheṇapiṇḍūpamaṃ pāricchattakūpamanti evamādīni,
atk-s0302a:22_0: Evametesu catūsu nikkhepesu imassa paṭiccasamuppādasuttassa parajjhāsayo nikkhepo.
atk-s0302a:22_4: Cattāro hi puggalā ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo padaparamoti.
atk-s0302a:22_5: Tattha yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0302a:22_7: Yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0302a:22_9: Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yoniso manasikaroto,
atk-s0302a:22_16: bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0302a:22_18: Iti imesu catūsu puggalesu ugghaṭitaññūpuggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena idaṃ suttaṃ nikkhittaṃ.
atk-s0302a:23_0: Tadā kira pañcasatā janapadavāsikā bhikkhū sabbeva ekacarā dvicarā ticarā catucarā pañcacarā sabhāgavuttino
atk-s0302a:23_1: dhutaṅgadharā āraddhavīriyā yuttayogā vipassakā saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ paccayākāradesanaṃ patthayamānā
atk-s0302a:23_3: rattakambalasāṇiyā parikkhipamānā viya desanaṃ paccāsīsamānā parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:23_4: Tesaṃ ajjhāsayavasena bhagavā idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:23_5: Yathā hi cheko cittakāro aparikammakatabhittiṃ labhitvā,
atk-s0302a:23_12: vaṭṭikaṃ vā tūlikaṃ vā ādāya rūpameva samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0302a:23_13: evameva bhagavā akatābhinivesaṃ ādikammikakulaputtaṃ labhitvā nāssa āditova arahattapadaṭṭhānaṃ saṇhaṃ
atk-s0302a:23_15: sīlasamādhikammassakatādiṭṭhisampadāya pana yojento pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ tāva ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:24_5: sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ bhavissati diṭṭhi ca ujukā.
atk-s0302a:24_7: sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya cattāro satipaṭṭhāne tividhena bhāveyyāsi.
atk-s0302a:24_10: ajjhattaṃ vā kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
atk-s0302a:24_13: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāhi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
atk-s0302a:24_15: sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāya ime cattāro satipaṭṭhāne evaṃ tividhena bhāvessasi,
atk-s0302a:24_17: yā ratti vā divaso vā āgamissati,
atk-s0302a:25_1: arahattapadaṭṭhānaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ vipassanālakkhaṇaṃ ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:26_0: Parisuddhasīlaṃ pana āraddhavīriyaṃ yuttayogaṃ vipassakaṃ labhitvā,
atk-s0302a:26_2: ujukameva pana arahattapadaṭṭhānaṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ vipassanālakkhaṇaṃ ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:26_3: Ime pañcasatā bhikkhū pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ parisodhetvā ṭhitā sudhantasuvaṇṇasadisā suparimajjitamaṇikkhandhasannibhā,
atk-s0302a:26_5: Iti tassāgamanatthāya satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ apekkhamāno idaṃ suttaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:27_1: Paccayākāro hi aññamaññaṃ paṭicca sahite dhamme uppādeti.
atk-s0302a:28_6: “Kacci pana vo anuruddhā samaggā sammodamānā”tiādīsu hi paccatte dissati.
atk-s0302a:28_21: Taṃ suṇāthāti taṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ taṃ desanaṃ mayā vuccamānaṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0302a:29_0: Sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti ettha pana sādhukaṃ sādhūti ekatthametaṃ.
atk-s0302a:29_6: bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu hi āyācane dissati. “Sādhu,
atk-s0302a:29_7: bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane.
atk-s0302a:32_1: sādhukaṃ suṇāhī”tiādīsu sādhukasaddoyeva daḷhīkamme āṇattiyantipi vuccati.
atk-s0302a:32_2: Idha panāyaṃ ettheva daḷhīkamme āṇattiyā ca attho veditabbo,
atk-s0302a:32_6: āṇattiatthena “mama āṇattiyā suṇātha” sundaratthena “sundaramimaṃ bhaddakaṃ dhammaṃ suṇāthā”ti etaṃ dīpitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:33_1: Sādhukaṃ manasi karothāti manasikāre daḷhīkammaniyojanena manindriyavikkhepanivāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:33_11: “yasmā ayaṃ dhammo dhammagambhīro ca desanāgambhīro ca,
atk-s0302a:33_14: tasmā sādhukaṃ manasi karothā”ti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:33_16: “Taṃ suṇāthā”ti ettha paṭiññātaṃ desanaṃ saṃkhittatova na desessāmi,
atk-s0302a:33_17: apica kho vitthāratopi naṃ bhāsissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:36_1: bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:37_7: Pañcavidhā hi pucchā adiṭṭhajotanāpucchā diṭṭhasaṃsandanāpucchā vimaticchedanāpucchā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchāti,
atk-s0302a:38_1: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ aññātaṃ hoti adiṭṭhaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:38_2: Tassa ñāṇāya dassanāya tulanāya tīraṇāya vibhūtāya vibhāvanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0302a:39_1: Pakatiyā lakkhaṇaṃ ñātaṃ hoti diṭṭhaṃ tulitaṃ tīritaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:39_2: So aññehi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanatthāya pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0302a:41_4: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti, aniccaṃ, bhante.
atk-s0302a:41_5: Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vāti, dukkhaṃ, bhante.
atk-s0302a:43_0: Tattha buddhānaṃ purimā tisso pucchā natthi. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:43_1: Buddhānañhi tīsu addhāsu kiñci saṅkhataṃ addhāvimuttaṃ vā asaṅkhataṃ adiṭṭhaṃ ajotitaṃ atulitaṃ atīritaṃ avibhūtaṃ avibhāvitaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:43_3: Yaṃ pana bhagavatā attano ñāṇena paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:43_4: tassa aññena samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vā saddhiṃ saṃsandanakiccaṃ natthi.
atk-s0302a:43_6: Yasmā panesa akathaṃkathī tiṇṇavicikiccho sabbadhammesu vihatasaṃsayo.
atk-s0302a:43_8: Itarā pana dve pucchā bhagavato atthi.
atk-s0302a:44_0: Idāni tāva pucchāya puṭṭhaṃ paccayākāraṃ vibhajanto avijjāpaccayā,
atk-s0302a:44_3: Ettha ca yathā nāma “pitaraṃ kathessāmī”ti āraddho “tissassa pitā soṇassa pitā”ti paṭhamataraṃ puttampi katheti,
atk-s0302a:44_4: evameva bhagavā paccayaṃ kathetuṃ āraddho “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā nayena saṅkhārādīnaṃ paccaye
atk-s0302a:44_8: desessāmi paṭiccasamuppanne ca dhamme”ti ubhayaṃ ārabhitvā ubhayampi kathesi.
atk-s0302a:44_9: Idāni avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādīsu pana avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo.
atk-s0302a:44_10: Tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantīti iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:44_12: vitthārena pana sabbākārasampannā anulomapaṭiccasamuppādakathā visuddhimagge kathitā,
atk-s0302a:45_0: Paṭilomakathāyaṃ pana avijjāya tvevāti avijjāya tu eva.
atk-s0302a:45_3: Evaṃnirodhānaṃ pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhā viññāṇādīnañca nirodhā nāmarūpādīni niruddhāniyeva hontīti dassetuṃ
atk-s0302a:45_5: evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti āha.
atk-s0302a:45_11: Iti bhagavā anulomato dvādasahi padehi vaṭṭakathaṃ kathetvā tameva vaṭṭaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā paṭilomato dvādasahi
atk-s0302a:45_12: padehi vivaṭṭaṃ kathento arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:45_13: Desanāpariyosāne te pañcasatā āraddhavipassakā ugghaṭitaññūpuggalā sūriyarasmisamphuṭṭhāni paripākagatāni
atk-s0302a:45_14: padumāni viya saccāni bujjhitvā arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:46_0: Idamavoca bhagavāti idaṃ vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena sakalasuttaṃ bhagavā avoca.
atk-s0302a:46_1: Attamanā te bhikkhūti tuṭṭhacittā te pañcasatā khīṇāsavā bhikkhū.
atk-s0302a:46_2: Bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti karavīkarutamañjunā kaṇṇasukhena paṇḍitajanahadayānaṃ amatābhisekasadisena
atk-s0302a:51_5: Imasmiñca pana sutte catasso vallihārakapurisūpamā vattabbā,
atk-s0302a:51_7: Yathā hi vallihārako puriso valliyā aggaṃ disvā tadanusārena mūlaṃ pariyesanto taṃ disvā valliṃ mūle chetvā ādāya kamme upaneyya,
atk-s0302a:51_8: evaṃ bhagavā vitthāradesanaṃ desento paṭiccasamuppādassa aggabhūtā jarāmaraṇā paṭṭhāya yāva mūlabhūtaṃ avijjāpadaṃ,
atk-s0302a:51_9: tāva desanaṃ āharitvā puna vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ desento niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:52_1: jarāmaraṇaniddese tāva tesaṃ tesanti ayaṃ saṅkhepato anekesaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddesoti viññātabbo.
atk-s0302a:52_3: yā somadattassāti evañhi divasampi kathentassa neva sattā pariyādānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0302a:52_4: Imehi pana dvīhi padehi na koci satto apariyādinno hoti.
atk-s0302a:52_7: Tamhi tamhīti ayaṃ gatijātivasena anekesaṃ sattanikāyānaṃ sādhāraṇaniddeso.
atk-s0302a:52_13: Ayañhi jarāti iminā padena sabhāvato dīpitā,
atk-s0302a:52_19: Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ milāpetvā tacavalibhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā.
atk-s0302a:52_20: Tenassā ime khaṇḍiccantiādayo tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā.
atk-s0302a:52_21: Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā dassitā.
atk-s0302a:52_22: Yatheva hi udakassa vā vātassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ saṃbhaggapalibhaggatāya vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0302a:52_23: na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni,
atk-s0302a:52_24: evameva jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo,
atk-s0302a:52_25: cakkhuṃ ummīletvāpi gayhati na ca khaṇḍiccādīneva jarā.
atk-s0302a:53_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattāya āyukkhaya-
atk-s0302a:53_4: Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati,
atk-s0302a:53_6: Yasmā ca daharakāle suppasannāni sukhumampi attano visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni
atk-s0302a:53_8: oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti,
atk-s0302a:54_0: Sā panāyaṃ evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0302a:54_1: Tattha dantādīsu khaṇḍādibhāvadassanato rūpadhammesu jarā pākaṭajarā nāma,
atk-s0302a:54_2: arūpadhammesu pana jarā tādisassa vikārassa adassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma.
atk-s0302a:54_5: taṃ cakkhunā disvā manodvārena cintetvā “ime dantā jarāya pahaṭā”ti jaraṃ jānāti udakaṭṭhāne baddhāni
atk-s0302a:54_6: gosīsādīni oloketvā heṭṭhā udakassa atthibhāvaṃ jānanaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:54_7: Puna avīci savīcīti evampi duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0302a:54_9: pavāḷacandasūriyādīnaṃ viya mandadasakādīsu pāṇīnaṃ viya ca pupphaphalapallavādīsu ca apāṇīnaṃ viya antarantarā
atk-s0302a:54_12: Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā jarā savīcijarā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:55_0: Ito paraṃ tesaṃ tesantiādi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:55_1: Cuti cavanatātiādīsu pana cutīti cavanakavasena vuccati,
atk-s0302a:55_5: Antaradhānanti ghaṭasseva bhinnassa bhinnānaṃ cutikkhandhānaṃ yena kenaci pariyāyena ṭhānābhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:56_10: Atha vā yasmā cātumahārājikādīsu khandhā bhijjanteva,
atk-s0302a:56_14: Ettha ca kaḷevarassa nikkhepakāraṇato maraṇaṃ “kaḷevarassa nikkhepo”ti vuttanti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0302a:56_17: bhikkhaveti idaṃ ubhayampi ekato katvā jarāmaraṇanti kathīyati.
atk-s0302a:57_6: Te hi aṇḍakosañca vatthikosañca okkamantā pavisantā viya paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0302a:58_1: Khandhāyeva hi paramatthato pātubhavanti, na satto.
atk-s0302a:58_6: Āyatanānanti ettha tatra tatra uppajjamānāyatanavasena saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:58_8: Pātubhavantāneva hi tāni paṭiladdhāni nāma honti.
atk-s0302a:58_11: jātīti iminā padena vohārato paramatthato ca desitāya jātiyā nigamanaṃ karotīti.
atk-s0302a:59_0: Bhavaniddese kāmabhavoti kammabhavo ca upapattibhavo ca.
atk-s0302a:59_2: Tañhi tattha upapattibhavassa kāraṇattā “sukho buddhānaṃ uppādo dukkho pāpassa uccayo”tiādīni viya phalavohārena bhavoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:59_3: Upapattibhavo nāma tena kammena nibbattaṃ upādiṇṇakkhandhapañcakaṃ.
atk-s0302a:59_4: Tañhi tattha bhavatīti katvā bhavoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:59_5: Sabbathāpi idaṃ kammañca upapattiñca ubhayampetamidha “kāmabhavo”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:60_4: Daḷhattho hi ettha upasaddo upāyāsaupakaṭṭhādīsu viya.
atk-s0302a:61_0: Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:61_5: “sassato attā ca loko ca idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”ntiādi.
atk-s0302a:62_3: Gosīlagovatādīni hi “evaṃ suddhī”ti abhinivesato sayameva upādānānīti.
atk-s0302a:62_7: Ito bahiddhā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sīlena suddhī”ti vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:63_4: Attavādamattameva vā attāti upādiyanti etenāti attavādupādānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:63_9: Idha assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:64_1: dhammataṇhāti etaṃ cakkhudvārādīsu javanavīthiyā pavattāya taṇhāya “seṭṭhiputto brāhmaṇaputto”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0302a:64_5: Sā kāmarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ assādentī pavattamānā kāmataṇhā,
atk-s0302a:64_6: sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassata”nti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā bhavataṇhā,
atk-s0302a:64_7: ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ ucchijjati vinassati pecca na bhavatī”ti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā
atk-s0302a:64_10: tathā saddataṇhādayopīti evaṃ tāni aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni honti.
atk-s0302a:64_15: paccuppannāni chattiṃsāti evaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritāni honti.
atk-s0302a:64_17: itthasmīti hotī”ti vā evamādīni ajjhattikarūpādinissitāni aṭṭhārasa,
atk-s0302a:64_19: iminā itthasmīti hotī”ti vā evamādīni bāhirarūpādinissitāni aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa,
atk-s0302a:64_22: paccuppannāni chattiṃsāti evampi aṭṭhasataṃ taṇhāvicaritāni honti.
atk-s0302a:64_23: Puna saṅgahe kariyamāne rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu chaḷeva taṇhākāyā tissoyeva kāmataṇhādayo hontīti. Evaṃ –
atk-s0302a:67_4: atthi abyākatā”ti evaṃ vibhaṅge āgatattā cakkhudvārādīsu pavattānaṃ kusalākusalābyākatavedanānaṃ “sāriputto
atk-s0302a:67_5: mantāṇiputto”ti evamādīsu mātito nāmaṃ viya mātisadisato vatthuto nāmaṃ.
atk-s0302a:67_12: tisso manoviññāṇadhātuyoti etāhi sampayuttavasena vedanā veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:68_3: kāyasamphassoti ettāvatā ca kusalākusalavipākā pañcavatthukā dasa phassā vuttā honti.
atk-s0302a:69_1: taṃ visuddhimagge khandhaniddese ceva āyatananiddese ca vuttameva.
atk-s0302a:70_6: ime pana tayo sabbadubbalesupi cittesu santi,
atk-s0302a:70_8: Cattāro ca mahābhūtāti ettha cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo.
atk-s0302a:70_10: Yena pana kāraṇena tāni mahābhūtānīti vuccanti,
atk-s0302a:70_13: Catunnañca mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyāti ettha pana catunnanti upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:70_20: catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ samūhaṃ upādāya vattamānaṃ rūpanti ettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:70_21: Evaṃ sabbathāpi yāni ca cattāri pathavīādīni mahābhūtāni,
atk-s0302a:70_22: yañca catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya vattamānaṃ cakkhāyatanādibhedena abhidhammapāḷiyameva vuttaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0302a:72_5: vacīdvāre vacanabhedavasena pavattānaṃ vīsatiyā eva vacīsañcetanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:72_7: kāyavacīdvāre copanaṃ akatvā raho nisīditvā cintentassa pavattānaṃ lokiyakusalākusalavasena ekūnatiṃsamanosañcetanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:73_3: Tattha catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhe aññāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ antogadhato vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato ca.
atk-s0302a:73_4: Tathā hi taṃ dukkhasaccapariyāpannattā dukkhe antogadhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:73_7: dukkhasaccaṃ etaṃ paṭicchādeti tassa yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhanivāraṇena ñāṇappavattiyā cettha appadānena.
atk-s0302a:74_0: Dukkhasamudaye aññāṇaṃ tīhi kāraṇehi veditabbaṃ vatthuto ārammaṇato paṭicchādanato ca.
atk-s0302a:74_1: Nirodhe paṭipadāya ca aññāṇaṃ ekeneva kāraṇena veditabbaṃ paṭicchādanato.
atk-s0302a:74_2: Nirodhapaṭipadānañhi paṭicchādakameva aññāṇaṃ tesaṃ yāthāvalakkhaṇapaṭivedhanivāraṇena tesu ca ñāṇappavattiyā appadānena.
atk-s0302a:74_3: Na pana taṃ tattha antogadhaṃ tasmiṃ saccadvaye apariyāpannattā,
atk-s0302a:74_4: na tassa taṃ saccadvayaṃ vatthu asahajātattā,
atk-s0302a:74_9: Purimaṃ pana vacanīyattena sabhāvalakkhaṇassa duddasattā gambhīraṃ,
atk-s0302a:75_0: Apica “dukkhe”ti ettāvatā saṅgahato vatthuto ārammaṇato kiccato ca avijjā dīpitā.
atk-s0302a:75_3: Avisesato pana “aññāṇa”nti etena sabhāvato niddiṭṭhāti ñātabbā.
atk-s0302a:76_4: Apicettha sabbeheva tehi nirodhapadehi nibbānaṃ desitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:76_5: Nibbānañhi āgamma te te dhammā nirujjhanti,
atk-s0302a:76_6: tasmā taṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ nirodhoti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:76_7: Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ sutte dvādasahi padehi vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ desento arahattanikūṭeneva desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:76_8: Desanāpariyosāne vuttanayeneva pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0302a:79_2: Nanu ca avijjāpaccayā puññābhisaṅkhāropi atthi āneñjābhisaṅkhāropi,
atk-s0302a:79_5: Yañhi kiñci bhavattayasaṅkhātaṃ vaṭṭaṃ patthetvā pavattitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:79_6: antamaso pañcābhiññā aṭṭha vā pana samāpattiyo,
atk-s0302a:79_7: sabbaṃ taṃ vaṭṭapakkhiyaṃ vaṭṭasīsanti vaṭṭasīsattā micchāpaṭipadāva hoti.
atk-s0302a:79_8: Yaṃ pana kiñci vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ patthetvā pavattitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:79_12: Appamattakampi hi paṇṇamuṭṭhimattadānakusalaṃ vā hotu mahantaṃ velāmadānādikusalaṃ vā,
atk-s0302a:79_13: sace vaṭṭasampattiṃ patthetvā vaṭṭanissitavasena micchā ṭhapitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:79_16: “Idaṃ me dānaṃ āsavakkhayāvahaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ pana vivaṭṭaṃ patthentena vivaṭṭavasena sammā ṭhapitaṃ arahattampi
atk-s0302a:79_30: “Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho”ti etaṃ nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ yassā paṭipadāya phalaṃ,
atk-s0302a:79_34: Imasmiñca atthe asesavirāganirodhāti ettha virāgo nirodhasseva vevacanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:79_36: Yena vā virāgasaṅkhātena maggena asesanirodho hoti,
atk-s0302a:79_38: Evañhi sati sānubhāvā paṭipadā vibhattā hoti.
atk-s0302a:79_39: Iti imasmimpi sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitanti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:81_1: Catutthe vipassissāti tassa kira bodhisattassa yathā lokiyamanussānaṃ kiñcideva passantānaṃ parittakammābhinibbattassa
atk-s0302a:81_4: Balavakammanibbattassa pana kammajapasādassa balavattā avipphandantehi animisehi eva akkhīhi passi seyyathāpi devā tāvatiṃsā.
atk-s0302a:81_12: Ettha ca kiñcāpi pacchimabhavikānaṃ sabbabodhisattānaṃ balavakammanibbattassa kammajapasādassa balavattā akkhīni na vipphandanti,
atk-s0302a:81_13: so pana bodhisatto eteneva nāmaṃ labhi.
atk-s0302a:82_2: Ekadivasaṃ kira vinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīditvā atthe anusāsantassa rañño alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ mahāpurisaṃ āharitvā aṅke ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:82_3: Tassa taṃ aṅke katvā palāḷayamānasseva amaccā sāmikaṃ assāmikaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:82_6: Upadhārayamānā aññaṃ adisvā “aṭṭassa dubbinicchitattā evaṃ kataṃ bhavissatī”ti puna sāmikameva sāmikaṃ katvā “ñatvā nu kho kumāro evaṃ karotī”ti?
atk-s0302a:82_9: Atha rājā “jānāti mahāpuriso”ti tato paṭṭhāya appamatto ahosi.
atk-s0302a:82_10: Tena vuttaṃ “viceyya viceyya kumāro atthe panāyati ñāyenāti kho,
atk-s0302a:82_12: vipassissa kumārassa bhiyyosomattāya ‘vipassī vipassī’tveva samaññā udapādī”ti.
atk-s0302a:83_3: paccayānaṃ vā arahattā arahāti evaṃ guṇato uppannanāmadheyyassa.
atk-s0302a:83_4: Sammāsambuddhassāti sammā nayena hetunā sāmaṃ paccattapurisakārena cattāri saccāni buddhassa.
atk-s0302a:83_5: Pubbeva sambodhāti sambodho vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:83_10: Purimabuddhānañhi pādamūle abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya paṇḍitova so satto,
atk-s0302a:83_12: Yathā vā udakato uggantvā ṭhitaṃ paripākagataṃ padumaṃ sūriyarasmisamphassena avassaṃ bujjhissatīti bujjhanakapadumanti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:83_13: evaṃ buddhānaṃ santike byākaraṇassa laddhattā avassaṃ anantarāyena pāramiyo pūretvā bujjhissatīti bujjhanakasattotipi bodhisatto.
atk-s0302a:83_15: taṃ patthayamāno pavattatīti bodhiyaṃ satto āsattotipi bodhisatto.
atk-s0302a:83_21: Cavati ca upapajjati cāti idaṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:83_23: Tañhi jarāmaraṇadukkhato nissaṭattā tassa nissaraṇanti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:83_24: Kudāssu nāmāti katarasmiṃ nu kho kāle.
atk-s0302a:84_1: Ahu paññāya abhisamayoti paññāya saddhiṃ jarāmaraṇakāraṇassa abhisamayo samavāyo samāyogo ahosi,
atk-s0302a:84_3: Atha vā yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāyāti yoniso manasikārena ca paññāya ca abhisamayo ahu.
atk-s0302a:85_1: Samudayo samudayoti ekādasasu ṭhānesu saṅkhārādīnaṃ samudayaṃ sampiṇḍetvā niddisati.
atk-s0302a:85_11: Taṃ panetaṃ catūsu saccesu lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ niddiṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:87_3: bhikkhave”ti na evaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:87_7: Sabbabodhisattānañhi bodhipallaṅke nisinnānaṃ na añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā ācikkhati –
atk-s0302a:87_9: Yathā pana paṭhamakappikakāle deve vuṭṭhe udakassa gatamaggeneva aparāparaṃ vuṭṭhiudakaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0302a:87_10: evaṃ tehi tehi purimabuddhehi gatamaggeneva pacchimā pacchimā gacchanti.
atk-s0302a:87_11: Sabbabodhisattā hi ānāpānacatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā taṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ sammasitvā
atk-s0302a:87_12: buddhā hontīti paṭipāṭiyā sattasu suttesu buddhavipassanā nāma kathitāti.
atk-s0302a:91_4: Bhūtānaṃ vā sattānantiādīsu bhūtāti jātā nibbattā.
atk-s0302a:91_5: Sambhavesinoti ye sambhavaṃ jātiṃ nibbattiṃ esanti gavesanti.
atk-s0302a:91_6: Tattha catūsu yonīsu aṇḍajajalābujā sattā yāva aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca na bhindanti,
atk-s0302a:91_8: aṇḍakosaṃ vatthikosañca bhinditvā bahi nikkhantā bhūtā nāma.
atk-s0302a:91_9: Saṃsedajā opapātikā ca paṭhamacittakkhaṇe sambhavesino nāma,
atk-s0302a:91_20: Appahīnabhavasaṃyojanattā āyatimpi sambhavaṃ esantānaṃ sekkhaputhujjanānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:91_21: Evaṃ sabbathāpi imehi dvīhi padehi sabbasatte pariyādiyati.
atk-s0302a:92_4: Atha vā ṭhitiyāti tassa tassa sattassa uppannadhammānaṃ anuppabandhavasena avicchedāya.
atk-s0302a:92_6: Ubhopi cetāni “bhūtānaṃ vā ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya ca,
atk-s0302a:92_7: sambhavesīnaṃ vā ṭhitiyā ceva anuggahāya cā”ti evaṃ ubhayattha daṭṭhabbānīti.
atk-s0302a:93_0: Kabaḷīkāro āhāroti kabaḷaṃ katvā ajjhoharitabbako āhāro,
atk-s0302a:93_2: Oḷāriko vā sukhumo vāti vatthuoḷārikatāya oḷāriko,
atk-s0302a:93_4: Sabhāvena pana sukhumarūpapariyāpannattā kabaḷīkāro āhāro sukhumova hoti.
atk-s0302a:93_5: Sāpi cassa vatthuto oḷārikatā sukhumatā ca upādāyupādāya veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:93_6: Kumbhīlānañhi āhāraṃ upādāya morānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0302a:93_10: Morānaṃ pana āhāraṃ upādāya taracchānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0302a:93_11: Te kira tivassachaḍḍitāni visāṇāni ceva aṭṭhīni ca khādanti,
atk-s0302a:93_12: tāni ca nesaṃ kheḷena temitamattāneva kandamūlaṃ viya mudukāni honti.
atk-s0302a:93_13: Taracchānaṃ āhāraṃ upādāya hatthīnaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0302a:93_25: Cakkavattino āhārato bhummānaṃ devānaṃ āhāro sukhumo.
atk-s0302a:94_0: Ettha ca oḷārike vatthusmiṃ ojā parittā hoti dubbalā,
atk-s0302a:94_2: Tathā hi ekapattapūrampi yāguṃ pīto muhutteneva jighacchito hoti yaṃkiñcideva khāditukāmo,
atk-s0302a:94_3: sappiṃ pana pasatamattaṃ pivitvā divasaṃ abhottukāmo hoti.
atk-s0302a:94_8: Dve pana ekato hutvā parissayañceva vinodenti pālenti cāti.
atk-s0302a:95_0: Phasso dutiyoti cakkhusamphassādi chabbidhopi phasso etesu catūsu āhāresu dutiyo āhāroti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:95_2: tasmā iminā nāma kāraṇena dutiyo tatiyo cāti idamettha na gavesitabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:95_5: Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ ṭhāne upādiṇṇakaanupādiṇṇakavasena ekarāsiṃ katvā cattāro āhāre dassesi.
atk-s0302a:95_8: Tattha sappādīhi gilitānaṃ maṇḍūkādīnaṃ vasena upādiṇṇakakabaḷīkārāhāro daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0302a:95_9: Maṇḍūkādayo hi sappādīhi gilitā antokucchigatāpi kiñci kālaṃ jīvantiyeva.
atk-s0302a:95_14: Idaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ na ruccatīti aṭṭhakathāyameva paṭikkhipitvā idaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0302a:95_15: imesaṃ sattānaṃ khādantānampi akhādantānampi bhuñjantānampi abhuñjantānampi paṭisandhicitteneva sahajātā kammajā ojā nāma atthi,
atk-s0302a:96_2: atha kasmā aññesupi sattānaṃ paccayesu vijjamānesu imeyeva cattāro vuttā”ti? Vuccate –
atk-s0302a:96_4: Visesapaccayo hi kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ rūpakāyassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro,
atk-s0302a:96_10: ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0302a:97_1: Kabaḷīkārāhāro ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āharati phassāhāro tisso vedanā,
atk-s0302a:98_1: Kabaḷīkārāhāro tāva mukhe ṭhapitamatteyeva aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0302a:98_2: dantavicuṇṇitaṃ pana ajjhohariyamānaṃ ekekaṃ sitthaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭharūpāni samuṭṭhāpetiyeva.
atk-s0302a:98_4: Phassāhāro pana sukhavedanīyo phasso uppajjamānoyeva sukhaṃ vedanaṃ āharati,
atk-s0302a:98_6: adukkhamasukhavedanīyo adukkhamasukhanti evaṃ sabbathāpi phassāhāro tisso vedanā āharati.
atk-s0302a:99_2: Evaṃ sabbathāpi manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave āharati.
atk-s0302a:99_3: Viññāṇāhāro pana ye ca paṭisandhikkhaṇe taṃsampayuttakā tayo khandhā,
atk-s0302a:99_4: yāni ca tisantativasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjanti,
atk-s0302a:99_7: Ettha ca “manosañcetanā tayo bhave āharatī”ti sāsavakusalākusalacetanāva vuttā.
atk-s0302a:100_0: Etesu catūsu āhāresu kabaḷīkārāhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti,
atk-s0302a:100_3: Kabaḷīkārāhāro hi upatthambhentoyeva kāyaṭṭhapanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0302a:100_4: Kammajanitopi hi ayaṃ kāyo kabaḷīkārāhārena upatthaddho dasapi vassāni vassasatampi yāva āyuparimāṇā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0302a:100_6: Yathā mātuyā janitopi dārako dhātiyā thaññādīni pāyetvā posiyamāno ciraṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0302a:101_1: gehe papatante aññena dārunā upatthambhitaṃ santaṃ eva taṃ gehaṃ na patati.
atk-s0302a:101_3: ayaṃ kāyo āhāraṭṭhitiko āhāraṃ paṭicca tiṭṭhatī”ti.
atk-s0302a:102_0: Evaṃ kabaḷīkāro āhāro upatthambhento āhārakiccaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0302a:103_0: Evaṃ sādhentopi ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro dvinnaṃ rūpasantatīnaṃ paccayo hoti āhārasamuṭṭhānassa ca upādiṇṇakassa ca.
atk-s0302a:103_3: Phasso pana sukhādivatthubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ phusantoyeva sukhādivedanāpavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0302a:103_4: Manosañcetanā kusalākusalakammavasena āyūhamānāyeva bhavamūlanipphādanato sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hoti.
atk-s0302a:103_5: Viññāṇaṃ vijānantameva nāmarūpappavattanena sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā hotīti.
atk-s0302a:104_0: Evaṃ upatthambhanādivasena āhārakiccaṃ sādhayamānesu panetesu cattāri bhayāni daṭṭhabbāni.
atk-s0302a:104_7: Kabaḷīkārāhāre hi nikantiṃ katvā sītādīnaṃ purakkhatā sattā āhāratthāya muddāgaṇanādikammāni karontā anappakaṃ dukkhaṃ nigacchanti.
atk-s0302a:104_8: Ekacce ca imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvāpi vejjakammādikāya anesanāya āhāraṃ pariyesantā diṭṭheva dhamme gārayhā honti,
atk-s0302a:104_10: “tassa saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitā”tiādinā lakkhaṇasaṃyutte vuttanayena samaṇapetā honti.
atk-s0302a:104_11: Iminā tāva kāraṇena kabaḷīkāre āhāre nikanti eva bhayanti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:105_0: Phassaṃ upagacchantāpi phassassādino paresaṃ rakkhitagopitesu dārādīsu bhaṇḍesu aparajjhanti,
atk-s0302a:105_1: te saha bhaṇḍena bhaṇḍasāmikā gahetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ vā chinditvā saṅkārakūṭe chaḍḍenti,
atk-s0302a:105_3: Tato te rājā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārāpeti.
atk-s0302a:105_4: Kāyassa ca bhedā duggati tesaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā hoti.
atk-s0302a:105_5: Iti phassassādamūlakaṃ diṭṭhadhammikampi samparāyikampi bhayaṃ sabbamāgatameva hoti.
atk-s0302a:105_6: Iminā kāraṇena phassāhāre upagamanameva bhayanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:106_0: Kusalākusalakammāyūhane pana tammūlakaṃ tīsu bhavesu bhayaṃ sabbaṃ āgatameva hoti.
atk-s0302a:106_1: Iminā kāraṇena manosañcetanāhāre āyūhanameva bhayanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:107_1: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭisandhināmarūpaṃ gahetvāva nibbattati.
atk-s0302a:107_2: Tasmiñca nibbatte sabbabhayāni nibbattāniyeva honti tammūlakattāti iminā kāraṇena viññāṇāhāre abhinipātoyeva bhayanti veditabboti.
atk-s0302a:108_4: Yasmā taṃ tato samudeti jāyati pabhavati,
atk-s0302a:108_11: Yasmā pana tesaṃ taṇhā yathāvuttena atthena nidānañceva samudayo ca jāti ca pabhavo ca,
atk-s0302a:109_0: Ettha ca ime cattāro āhārā taṇhānidānāti paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā attabhāvasaṅkhātānaṃ āhārānaṃ purimataṇhānaṃ vasena nidānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:109_2: sesānaṃ tato ūnaūnasantativasena uppannarūpabbhantaraṃ jātā ojā atthi,
atk-s0302a:109_4: Paṭisandhicittasampayuttā pana phassacetanā sayañca cittaṃ viññāṇanti ime taṇhānidānā upādiṇṇaka-
atk-s0302a:109_6: viññāṇāhārāti evaṃ tāva purimataṇhānidānā paṭisandhikā āhārā.
atk-s0302a:110_0: Yasmā pana bhagavā na kevalaṃ āhārānameva nidānaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0302a:110_5: kiṃnidānātiādinā nayena vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā vivaṭṭaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0302a:110_6: Imasmiñca pana ṭhāne bhagavā atītābhimukhaṃ desanaṃ katvā atītena vaṭṭaṃ dasseti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:111_1: vedanāphassasaḷāyatananāmarūpaviññāṇāni yasmiṃ attabhāve ṭhatvā kammaṃ āyūhitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:111_5: dvīsu tassa janakaṃ kammanti saṅkhepena kammañceva kammavipākañcāti,
atk-s0302a:111_6: dvepi dhamme dassentena atītābhimukhaṃ desanaṃ katvā atītena vaṭṭaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:112_0: Tatrāyaṃ desanā anāgatassa adassitattā aparipuṇṇāti na daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0302a:112_2: Yathā hi cakkhumā puriso udakapiṭṭhe nipannaṃ suṃsumāraṃ disvā tassa parabhāgaṃ olokento gīvaṃ passeyya,
atk-s0302a:112_5: heṭṭhā kucchiṃ olokento pana udakagataṃ agganaṅguṭṭhañceva cattāro ca hatthapāde na passeyya,
atk-s0302a:113_1: Tīre ṭhito cakkhumā puriso viya yogāvacaro.
atk-s0302a:113_2: Tena purisena udakapiṭṭhe suṃsumārassa diṭṭhakālo viya yoginā āhāravasena imassattabhāvassa diṭṭhakālo.
atk-s0302a:113_3: Parato gīvāya diṭṭhakālo viya imassattabhāvassa janikāya taṇhāya diṭṭhakālo.
atk-s0302a:113_4: Piṭṭhiyā diṭṭhakālo viya yasmiṃ attabhāve taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0302a:113_6: Naṅguṭṭhamūlassa diṭṭhakālo viya tassattabhāvassa janakānaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ diṭṭhakālo.
atk-s0302a:113_7: Heṭṭhā kucchiṃ olokentassa pana agganaṅguṭṭhañceva cattāro ca hatthapāde adisvāpi “aparipuṇṇo suṃsumāro”ti
atk-s0302a:113_8: agahetvā nayato paripuṇṇotveva gahaṇaṃ viya yattha yattha paccayavaṭṭaṃ pāḷiyaṃ na āgataṃ,
atk-s0302a:113_9: tattha tattha “desanā aparipuṇṇā”ti agahetvā nayato paripuṇṇātveva gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:113_10: Tattha ca āhārataṇhānaṃ antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:113_12: viññāṇasaṅkhārānaṃ antare ekoti evaṃ tisandhicatusaṅkhepameva vaṭṭaṃ dassitanti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:115_1: Dutiye sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāyāti imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne bhagavā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:115_3: Tassañhi parisati moḷiyaphagguno nāma bhikkhu diṭṭhigatiko nisinno.
atk-s0302a:115_6: athassāhaṃ vissajjessāmī”ti pucchāya okāsadānatthaṃ desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:120_3: Etadavocāti desanānusandhiṃ ghaṭento etaṃ “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0302a:120_7: yo etaṃ viññāṇāhāraṃ khādati vā bhuñjati vāti?
atk-s0302a:121_0: Kasmā panāyaṃ itare tayo āhāre apucchitvā imameva pucchatīti?
atk-s0302a:121_2: So hi mahante piṇḍe katvāva kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ bhuñjante passati,
atk-s0302a:121_4: Tittiravaṭṭakamorakukkuṭādayo pana mātusamphassena yāpente disvā “ete phassāhārena yāpentī”ti tassa laddhi.
atk-s0302a:121_5: Kacchapā pana attano utusamaye mahāsamuddato nikkhamitvā samuddatīre vālikantare aṇḍāni ṭhapetvā vālikāya paṭicchādetvā mahāsamuddameva otaranti.
atk-s0302a:121_9: na pana etāya laddhiyā imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0302a:121_11: Yathā ummattako pacchiṃ gahetvā antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇo gomayampi pāsāṇampi gūthampi khajjakhaṇḍampi taṃ
atk-s0302a:121_12: taṃ manāpampi amanāpampi gahetvā pacchiyaṃ pakkhipati.
atk-s0302a:121_16: Teneva naṃ bhagavā “kasmā evaṃ pucchasī”ti avatvā gahitagāhameva tassa mocetuṃ no kallo pañhotiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:122_1: Āhāretīti ahaṃ na vadāmīti ahaṃ koci satto vā puggalo vā āhāretīti na vadāmi.
atk-s0302a:122_2: Āhāretīti cāhaṃ vadeyyanti yadi ahaṃ āhāretīti vadeyyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:122_3: Tatrassa kallo pañhoti tasmiṃ mayā evaṃ vutte ayaṃ pañho yutto bhaveyya.
atk-s0302a:122_6: ayaṃ viññāṇāhāro katamassa dhammassa paccayoti attho.
atk-s0302a:122_7: Tatra kallaṃ veyyākaraṇanti tasmiṃ evaṃ pucchite pañhe imaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ yuttaṃ “viññāṇāhāro āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā paccayo”ti.
atk-s0302a:122_10: Tasmiṃ bhūte sati saḷāyatananti tasmiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattisaṅkhāte nāmarūpe jāte sati saḷāyatanaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0302a:123_0: Saḷāyatanapaccayā phassoti idhāpi bhagavā uttari pañhassa okāsaṃ dento desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:123_1: Diṭṭhigatiko hi navapucchaṃ uppādetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:123_7: Diṭṭhigatikassa hi satto nāma bhūto nibbattoyevāti laddhi,
atk-s0302a:123_8: tasmā attano laddhiviruddhaṃ idanti na pucchati.
atk-s0302a:123_9: Apica idappaccayā idaṃ idappaccayā idanti bahūsu ṭhānesu kathitattā saññattiṃ upagato,
atk-s0302a:123_12: tucchapucchameva pucchatī”ti ito paṭṭhāya desanaṃ ekābaddhaṃ katvā desesi.
atk-s0302a:123_15: Imasmiṃ pana sutte viññāṇanāmarūpānaṃ antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:125_1: Tatiye samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vāti saccāni paṭivijjhituṃ asamatthā bāhirakasamaṇabrāhmaṇā.
atk-s0302a:125_2: Jarāmaraṇaṃ nappajānantītiādīsu jarāmaraṇaṃ na jānanti dukkhasaccavasena,
atk-s0302a:125_3: jarāmaraṇasamudayaṃ na jānanti saha taṇhāya jāti jarāmaraṇassa samudayoti samudayasaccavasena,
atk-s0302a:125_7: jātisamudayaṃ na jānanti saha taṇhāya bhavo jātisamudayoti samudayasaccavasena.
atk-s0302a:125_8: Evaṃ saha taṇhāya samudayaṃ yojetvā sabbapadesu catusaccavasena attho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:125_9: Sāmaññatthaṃ vā brahmaññatthaṃ vāti ettha ariyamaggo sāmaññañceva brahmaññañca.
atk-s0302a:125_10: Ubhayatthāpi pana attho nāma ariyaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:125_11: Iti bhagavā imasmiṃ sutte ekādasasu ṭhānesu cattāri saccāni kathesīti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:127_1: Catutthe ime dhamme katame dhammeti ettakaṃ papañcaṃ katvā kathitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:127_2: desanaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena ime dhamme nappajānantītiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:129_1: Pañcame sammādiṭṭhi sammādiṭṭhīti yaṃ paṇḍitā devamanussā tesu tesu ṭhānesu sammādassanaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0302a:129_2: sabbampi taṃ dvīhi padehi saṅkhipitvā pucchati.
atk-s0302a:129_4: Yebhuyyenāti iminā ṭhapetvā ariyapuggale sesamahājanaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0302a:129_9: Sammappaññāya passatoti sammāpaññā nāma savipassanā maggapaññā,
atk-s0302a:129_11: Yā loke natthitāti saṅkhāraloke nibbattesu dhammesu paññāyantesveva yā natthīti ucchedadiṭṭhi uppajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:129_14: Yā loke atthitāti saṅkhāraloke bhijjamānesu dhammesu paññāyantesveva yā atthīti sassatadiṭṭhi uppajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:130_2: Lokanissaye passantassāpi hi paccayānaṃ anucchedena paccayuppannassa anucchedaṃ passato yā natthīti ucchedadiṭṭhi uppajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:130_4: Paccayanirodhaṃ passantassāpi paccayanirodhena paccayuppannanirodhaṃ passato yā atthīti sassatadiṭṭhi uppajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:131_0: Upayupādānābhinivesavinibandhoti upayehi ca upādānehi ca abhinivesehi ca vinibandho.
atk-s0302a:131_1: Tattha upayāti dve upayā taṇhupayo ca diṭṭhupayo ca.
atk-s0302a:131_3: Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo hi yasmā ahaṃ mamantiādīhi ākārehi tebhūmakadhamme upenti upagacchanti,
atk-s0302a:131_5: Yasmā pana te dhamme upādiyanti ceva abhinivisanti ca,
atk-s0302a:131_6: tasmā upādānāti ca abhinivesāti ca vuccanti.
atk-s0302a:132_4: tā ca tasmiṃ abhinivisanti ceva anusenti ca,
atk-s0302a:132_5: tasmā tadubhayaṃ cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ abhinivesānusayanti ca āha.
atk-s0302a:132_13: na añño ettha satto nāma atthī”ti kaṅkhaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0302a:133_3: sammādiṭṭhi hotīti evaṃ sattasaññāya pahīnattā ettakena sammādassanaṃ nāma hotīti missakasammādiṭṭhiṃ āha.
atk-s0302a:133_4: Ayameko antoti esa eko nikūṭanto lāmakanto paṭhamakaṃ sassataṃ.
atk-s0302a:133_5: Ayaṃ dutiyoti esa dutiyo sabbaṃ natthīti uppajjanakadiṭṭhisaṅkhāto nikūṭanto lāmakanto dutiyako ucchedoti attho.
atk-s0302a:135_4: Paṭipanno hotīti ettha sīlato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā paṭipannoti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:135_5: Dhammānudhammappaṭipannoti lokuttarassa nibbānadhammassa anudhammabhūtaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno.
atk-s0302a:135_7: Nibbidā virāgā nirodhāti nibbidāya ceva virāgena ca nirodhena ca.
atk-s0302a:135_8: Anupādā vimuttoti catūhi upādānehi kiñci dhammaṃ anupādiyitvā vimutto.
atk-s0302a:135_13: Evamettha ekena nayena dhammakathikassa pucchā kathitā,
atk-s0302a:135_14: dvīhi taṃ visesetvā sekkhāsekkhabhūmiyo niddiṭṭhāti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:137_1: Sattame acelo kassapoti liṅgena acelo niccelo,
atk-s0302a:137_3: Dūratovāti mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena parivutaṃ āgacchantaṃ dūrato eva addasa.
atk-s0302a:137_6: Antaragharanti “na pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdissāmī”ti ettha antonivesanaṃ antaragharaṃ.
atk-s0302a:137_7: “Okkhittacakkhu antaraghare gamissāmī”ti ettha indakhīlato paṭṭhāya antogāmo.
atk-s0302a:138_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā kathetukāmo yāvatatiyaṃ paṭikkhipīti?
atk-s0302a:138_2: Diṭṭhigatikā hi khippaṃ kathiyamāne gāravaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0302a:138_5: Dve tayo vāre paṭikkhitte pana gāravaṃ karonti,
atk-s0302a:138_6: “samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitumpi pañhaṃ pucchitumpi dukkara”nti yāvatatiyaṃ yācite kathiyamānaṃ sussūsanti saddahanti.
atk-s0302a:138_7: Iti bhagavā “ayaṃ sussūsissati saddahissatī”ti yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpetvā kathesi.
atk-s0302a:138_8: Apica yathā bhisakko telaṃ vā phāṇitaṃ vā pacanto mudupākakharapākānaṃ pākakālaṃ āgamayamāno pākakālaṃ anatikkamitvāva otāreti.
atk-s0302a:138_9: Evaṃ bhagavā sattānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ āgamayamāno “ettakena kālena imassa ñāṇaṃ paripākaṃ gamissatī”ti ñatvāva yāvatatiyaṃ yācāpesi.
atk-s0302a:139_3: Sayaṃkataṃ dukkhanti hi vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0302a:139_4: attā nāma koci dukkhassa kārako natthīti dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:139_11: ‘Bhavaṃ gotamo dukkhaṃ na jānāti na passatī’ti puṭṭho ‘jānāmi khvāha’nti vadati.
atk-s0302a:139_12: Kiñci nu kho mayā virajjhitvā pucchito”ti mūlato paṭṭhāya attano pucchameva sodhento evamāha.
atk-s0302a:139_14: bhagavāti idha satthari sañjātagāravo “bhava”nti avatvā “bhagavā”ti vadati.
atk-s0302a:140_2: Ettha ca satoti idaṃ bhummatthe sāmivacanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:140_4: so karoti so paṭisaṃvedayatīti kho, kassapa,
atk-s0302a:140_5: ādimhiyeva evaṃ sati pacchā sayaṃkataṃ dukkhanti ayaṃ laddhi hoti.
atk-s0302a:140_7: Iti vadanti etassa purimena ādisaddena anantarena ca sassatasaddena sambandho hoti.
atk-s0302a:140_10: iti evaṃ vadanto āditova sassataṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0302a:140_12: Tassa hi taṃ dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti,
atk-s0302a:140_13: kārakañca vedakañca ekameva gaṇhantaṃ etaṃ sassataṃ upagacchatīti attho.
atk-s0302a:141_0: Añño karotītiādi pana “paraṃkataṃ dukkha”nti laddhiyā paṭisedhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:141_3: añño karoti añño paṭisaṃvediyatīti kho pana, kassapa,
atk-s0302a:141_6: tena kataṃ añño paṭisaṃvediyatī”ti evaṃ uppannāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ sampayuttāya vedanāya abhitunnassa
atk-s0302a:141_7: viddhassa sato “paraṃkataṃ dukkha”nti ayaṃ laddhi hotīti.
atk-s0302a:141_12: Tassa hi taṃ dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti,
atk-s0302a:142_0: Ete teti ye sassatucchedasaṅkhāte ubho ante (anupagamma tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti, ete te, kassapa,
atk-s0302a:142_1: ubho ante) anupagamma pahāya anallīyitvā majjhena tathāgato dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0302a:142_7: na koci kārako vā vedako vā niddiṭṭho.
atk-s0302a:142_9: Ubho ante anupagammāti iminā hi tatiyapañho paṭikkhitto.
atk-s0302a:142_10: Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti iminā adhiccasamuppannatā ceva ajānanañca paṭikkhittanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:143_0: Labheyyanti idaṃ so bhagavato santike bhikkhubhāvaṃ patthayamāno āha.
atk-s0302a:143_1: Atha bhagavā yonena khandhake titthiyaparivāso paññatto,
atk-s0302a:143_3: itthannāmo aññatitthiyapubbo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye ākaṅkhāmi upasampadaṃ. Svāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0302a:143_4: saṅghaṃ cattāro māse parivāsaṃ yācāmī”tiādinā nayena samādiyitvā parivasati,
atk-s0302a:143_9: Upasampadatthikena pana nātikālena gāmappavesanādīni aṭṭha vattāni pūrentena parivasitabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:143_12: vitthārato panesa titthiyaparivāso samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya pabbajjakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:144_4: ayaṃ na parivāsāraho”ti idaṃ mayhaṃ pākaṭanti dasseti.

atk-s0302a:144_13: So tathā katvā taṃ pabbājetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.

atk-s0302a:146_8: Evañhi sati vedanāya eva vedanā katā hoti.
atk-s0302a:146_9: Evañca vadanto imissā vedanāya pubbepi atthitaṃ anujānāti,
atk-s0302a:146_11: Tassa hi taṃ dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti,

atk-s0302a:147_0: Aññā vedanātiādi “paraṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti laddhiyā paṭisedhanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:147_1: Idhāpi ayaṃ atthayojanā –“aññā vedanā añño vediyatī”ti kho,
atk-s0302a:147_3: ādimhiyeva evaṃ sati pacchā yā purimapakkhe kārakavedanā,
atk-s0302a:147_5: Tāya pana kataṃ añño vediyatīti evaṃ uppannāya ucchedadiṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ sampayuttāya vedanāya abhitunnassa
atk-s0302a:147_10: Tassa hi taṃ dassanaṃ etaṃ pareti,
atk-s0302a:147_12: Idhāpi hi imāni padāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āharitvā yojitāneva.
atk-s0302a:147_14: Tañca kho vipākasukhadukkhameva vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:149_2: Evamayaṃ kāyo samudāgatoti evaṃ avijjāya nivāritattā taṇhāya ca sampayuttattāyeva ayaṃ kāyo nibbatto.

atk-s0302a:149_4: Bahiddhā ca nāmarūpanti bahiddhā ca paresaṃ saviññāṇako kāyo.
atk-s0302a:149_5: Attano ca parassa ca pañcahi khandhehi chahi āyatanehi cāpi ayaṃ attho dīpetabbova.
atk-s0302a:149_7: Dvayaṃ paṭicca phassoti aññattha cakkhurūpādīni dvayāni paṭicca cakkhusamphassādayo vuttā,
atk-s0302a:149_11: Yehi phuṭṭhoti yehi kāraṇabhūtehi āyatanehi uppannena phassena phuṭṭho.
atk-s0302a:150_3: tasmiṃ parinibbute ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ime dhamme uppādetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0302a:150_4: bhagavatā pana no ime dhammā uppāditā.
atk-s0302a:150_5: Bhagavantañhi nissāya mayaṃ ime dhamme ājānāma paṭivijjhāmāti evaṃ bhagavaṃmūlakā no, bhante, dhammāti.
atk-s0302a:150_6: Bhagavaṃnettikāti bhagavā hi dhammānaṃ netā vinetā anunetā,
atk-s0302a:150_7: yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā dassetāti dhammā bhagavaṃnettikā nāma honti.
atk-s0302a:150_8: Bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇāti catubhūmakadhammā sabbaññutaññāṇassa āpāthaṃ āgacchamānā bhagavati paṭisaranti nāmāti bhagavaṃpaṭisaraṇā.
atk-s0302a:150_10: Apica mahābodhimaṇḍe nisinnassa bhagavato paṭivedhavasena phasso āgacchati “ahaṃ bhagavā kinnāmo”ti?
atk-s0302a:150_11: Tvaṃ phusanaṭṭhena phasso nāma. Vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā,
atk-s0302a:150_13: tvaṃ vijānanaṭṭhena viññāṇaṃ nāmāti evaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato pāṭiyekkaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ nāmaṃ
atk-s0302a:150_15: Bhagavantaṃyeva paṭibhātūti bhagavatova etassa bhāsitassa attho upaṭṭhātu,
atk-s0302a:151_0: Sā ceva avijjāti ettha kiñcāpi sā avijjā ca taṇhā ca kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhitvā niruddhā,
atk-s0302a:151_1: yathā pana ajjāpi yaṃ hiyyo bhesajjaṃ pītaṃ,
atk-s0302a:151_2: tadeva bhojanaṃ bhuñjāti sarikkhakattena tadevāti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:151_3: evamidhāpi sā ceva avijjā sā ca taṇhāti idampi sarikkhakattena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:151_6: Kāyūpago hotīti aññaṃ paṭisandhikāyaṃ upagantā hoti.
atk-s0302a:151_9: Iti imasmiṃ sutte sabbopi sapaṭisandhiko puthujjano “bālo”ti,
atk-s0302a:151_11: Sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino pana “paṇḍitā”ti vā “bālā”ti vā na vattabbā,
atk-s0302a:153_2: desessāmi paṭiccasamuppanne ca dhammeti satthā imasmiṃ sutte paccaye ca paccayanibbatte ca sabhāvadhamme desessāmīti ubhayaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:153_6: Ṭhitāva sā dhātūti ṭhitova so paccayasabhāvo,
atk-s0302a:153_7: na kadāci jāti jarāmaraṇassa paccayo na hoti.
atk-s0302a:153_8: Dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatāti imehipi dvīhi paccayameva katheti.
atk-s0302a:153_25: Passathāti cāhāti passatha iti ca vadati. Kinti?
atk-s0302a:154_5: So tehi tehi paccayehi anūnādhikeheva tassa tassa dhammassa sambhavato tathatāti,
atk-s0302a:154_6: sāmaggiṃ upagatesu paccayesu muhuttampi tato nibbattānaṃ dhammānaṃ asambhavābhāvato avitathatāti,

atk-s0302a:155_1: Ettha ca aniccanti na jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ,
atk-s0302a:155_2: aniccasabhāvānaṃ pana khandhānaṃ jarāmaraṇattā aniccaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0302a:155_4: Ettha ca saṅkhatanti paccayehi samāgantvā kataṃ.

atk-s0302a:156_2: Ahosiṃ nu khotiādīsu “ahosiṃ nu kho nanu kho”ti sassatākārañca adhiccasamuppattiākārañca nissāya atīte attano vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:156_4: ummattako viya bālaputhujjano yathā vā tathā vā pavattati.
atk-s0302a:156_5: Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgupapattiyo nissāya “khattiyo nu kho ahosiṃ,
atk-s0302a:156_7: Kathaṃ nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ rassaodātakaṇhapamāṇikaappamāṇikādīnaṃ aññataro”ti kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:156_8: Keci pana “issaranimmānādīni nissāya ‘kena nu kho kāraṇena ahosi’nti hetuto kaṅkhatī”ti vadanti.
