atk-s0302a:156_13: Bhavissāmi nu kho nanu khoti sassatākārañca ucchedākārañca nissāya anāgate attano vijjamānatañca avijjamānatañca kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:157_0: Etarahi vā paccuppannaṃ addhānanti idāni vā paṭisandhimādiṃ katvā cutipariyantaṃ sabbampi vattamānakālaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0302a:157_1: Ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī bhavissatīti attano khandhesu vicikicchī bhavissati.
atk-s0302a:157_2: Ahaṃ nu khosmīti attano atthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:157_9: so uṭṭhāya “ahaṃ nu kho cūḷamātāya putto”ti cintesi.
atk-s0302a:157_10: Evaṃ ahaṃ nu khosmīti kaṅkhā hoti.
atk-s0302a:157_11: No nu khosmīti attano natthibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:157_13: eko kira macche gaṇhanto udake ciraṭṭhānena sītibhūtaṃ attano ūruṃ macchoti cintetvā pahari.
atk-s0302a:157_14: Aparo susānapasse khettaṃ rakkhanto bhīto saṅkuṭito sayi,
atk-s0302a:157_15: so paṭibujjhitvā attano jaṇṇukāni dve yakkhāti cintetvā pahari.
atk-s0302a:158_0: Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyova samāno attano khattiyabhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:158_2: Devo pana samāno devabhāvaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi,
atk-s0302a:158_3: sopi pana “ahaṃ rūpī nu kho arūpī nu kho”tiādinā nayena kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:158_5: Apaccakkhā tesaṃ tattha tattha kule uppatti.
atk-s0302a:158_7: pabbajitāpi “kuppaṃ nu kho me kamma”ntiādinā nayena gahaṭṭhasaññino.
atk-s0302a:158_8: Manussāpi ca rājāno viya attani devasaññino honti.
atk-s0302a:158_10: Kevalañhettha abbhantare jīvo nāma atthīti gahetvā tassa saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu khosmi rassacaturassachaḷaṃsaaṭṭhaṃsasoḷasaṃsādīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:158_13: Sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ pana paccuppannaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:158_14: Kuto āgato so kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatigatiṭṭhānaṃ kaṅkhanto evaṃ kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:164_1: Dutiyaṃ bhagavatā attano ajjhāsayassa vasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:167_28: “Dasabalasamannāgato”ti ettha pana etaṃ saṅgahaṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0302a:167_29: Etañhi bāhirakaṃ lāmakaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ sīhādīnampi hoti.
atk-s0302a:167_30: Etañhi nissāya dukkhapariññā vā samudayappahānaṃ vā maggabhāvanā vā phalasacchikiriyā vā natthi.
atk-s0302a:167_31: Aññaṃ pana dasasu ṭhānesu akampanatthena upatthambhanatthena ca dasavidhaṃ ñāṇabalaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0302a:168_3: ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato jānanaṃ ekaṃ,
atk-s0302a:168_4: atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso yathābhūtaṃ vipākajānanaṃ ekaṃ,
atk-s0302a:169_0: “Idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0302a:169_1: Yampi tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
atk-s0302a:169_3: yaṃ balaṃ āgamma tathāgato āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti,
atk-s0302a:170_1: Atthavaṇṇanāpi nesaṃ vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyañceva papañcasūdaniyā ca majjhimaṭṭhakathāya sabbākārato vuttā.
atk-s0302a:171_0: Catūhi ca vesārajjehīti ettha sārajjapaṭipakkhaṃ vesārajjaṃ,
atk-s0302a:171_1: catūsu ṭhānesu vesārajjabhāvaṃ paccavekkhantassa uppannasomanassamayañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0302a:171_3: “Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā”tiādīsu codanāvatthūsu.
atk-s0302a:172_4: ‘Sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhā’ti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo
atk-s0302a:172_5: vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ saha dhammena paṭicodessatīti nimittametaṃ,
atk-s0302a:172_9: nimittaṃ asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesārajjappatto viharāmi.
atk-s0302a:172_10: ‘Khīṇāsavassa te paṭijānato ime āsavā aparikkhīṇā’ti tatra vata maṃ…pe…
atk-s0302a:172_11: ‘ye kho pana te antarāyikā dhammā vuttā,
atk-s0302a:172_12: te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā’ti tatra vata maṃ…pe…
atk-s0302a:172_13: ‘yassa kho pana te atthāya dhammo desito,
atk-s0302a:172_14: so na niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāyā’ti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā…pe…
atk-s0302a:173_7: sabbagavaseṭṭho sabbaparissayasaho seto pāsādiko mahābhāravaho asanisatasaddehipi asampakampiyo nisabho,
atk-s0302a:173_11: Ṭhānanti catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā avaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:173_13: Yatheva hi nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho usabhabalena samannāgato catūhi pādehi pathaviṃ uppīḷetvā acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0302a:173_14: evaṃ tathāgatopi dasahi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato catūhi vesārajjapādehi aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ uppīḷetvā
atk-s0302a:173_15: sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiyo acalaṭṭhānena tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0302a:173_16: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamāno ca taṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti upagacchati na paccakkhāti,
atk-s0302a:174_3: Khattiyaparisā brāhmaṇaparisā gahapatiparisā samaṇaparisā cātumahārājikaparisā tāvatiṃsaparisā māraparisā brahmaparisā”ti,
atk-s0302a:174_8: Yathā vā sīho sahanato ceva hananato ca sīhoti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:174_9: evaṃ tathāgato lokadhammānaṃ sahanato parappavādānañca hananato sīhoti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:174_11: Tattha yathā sīho sīhabalena samannāgato sabbattha visārado vigatalomahaṃso sīhanādaṃ nadati,
atk-s0302a:174_12: evaṃ tathāgatasīhopi tathāgatabalehi samannāgato aṭṭhasu parisāsu visārado vigatalomahaṃso,
atk-s0302a:175_0: Brahmacakkaṃ pavattetīti ettha brahmanti seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ,
atk-s0302a:175_2: Taṃ pana dhammacakkaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti paṭivedhañāṇañca desanāñāṇañca.
atk-s0302a:175_6: Tañhi abhinikkhamanato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:175_8: Tusitabhavanato vā yāva mahābodhipallaṅke arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:175_10: Dīpaṅkarato vā paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā uppajjamānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:175_17: Ubhayampi panetaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānaṃyeva orasañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:176_0: Idāni yaṃ iminā ñāṇena samannāgato sīhanādaṃ nadati,
atk-s0302a:176_2: Tattha iti rūpanti idaṃ rūpaṃ ettakaṃ rūpaṃ,
atk-s0302a:176_3: ito uddhaṃ rūpaṃ natthīti ruppanasabhāvañceva bhūtupādāyabhedañca ādiṃ katvā lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānavasena anavasesarūpapariggaho vutto.
atk-s0302a:176_4: Iti rūpassa samudayoti iminā evaṃ pariggahitassa rūpassa samudayo vutto.
atk-s0302a:176_5: Tattha itīti evaṃ samudayo hotīti attho.
atk-s0302a:176_7: kammasamudayā āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayoti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passatī”ti evaṃ veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:176_9: vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa nirodhaṃ passatī”ti ayaṃ vitthāro.
atk-s0302a:177_0: Iti vedanātiādīsupi ayaṃ vedanā ettakā vedanā,
atk-s0302a:177_7: Iti vedanāya samudayotiādīhi pana evaṃ pariggahitānaṃ vedanāsaññāsaṅkhāraviññāṇānaṃ samudayo vutto.
atk-s0302a:177_8: Tatrāpi itīti evaṃ samudayo hotīti attho.
atk-s0302a:177_9: Tesampi vitthāro “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo”ti rūpe vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:177_15: Vitthārato pana udayabbayavinicchayo sabbākāraparipūro visuddhimagge vutto.
atk-s0302a:178_0: Imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hotīti ayampi aparo sīhanādo.
atk-s0302a:178_2: imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye sati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:178_3: Imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa uppādā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:178_4: Imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hotīti imasmiṃ avijjādike paccaye asati idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0302a:178_5: Imassa nirodhā idaṃ nirujjhatīti imassa avijjādikassa paccayassa nirodhā idaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ phalaṃ nirujjhati.
atk-s0302a:178_6: Idāni yathā taṃ hoti ceva nirujjhati ca,
atk-s0302a:178_7: taṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ yadidaṃ avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:179_0: Evaṃ svākkhātoti evaṃ pañcakkhandhavibhajanādivasena suṭṭhu akkhāto kathito.
atk-s0302a:179_5: Chinnapilotikoti pilotikā vuccati chinnaṃ bhinnaṃ tattha tattha sibbitagaṇṭhitaṃ jiṇṇavatthaṃ,
atk-s0302a:179_6: taṃ yassa natthīti aṭṭhahatthaṃ navahatthaṃ vā ahatasāṭakaṃ nivattho,
atk-s0302a:179_16: Yathā hi catuhatthaṃ sāṭakaṃ gahetvā pariggahaṇaṃ karonto puriso ito cito ca añchanto kilamati,
atk-s0302a:179_17: evaṃ bāhirakasamaye pabbajitā attano parittakaṃ dhammaṃ “evaṃ sati evaṃ bhavissatī”ti kappetvā kappetvā vaḍḍhentā kilamanti.
atk-s0302a:179_18: Yathā pana aṭṭhahatthanavahatthena pariggahaṇaṃ karonto yathāruci pārupati na kilamati,
atk-s0302a:179_20: evaṃ imasmimpi dhamme kappetvā kappetvā vibhajanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0302a:179_21: tehi tehi kāraṇehi mayāva ayaṃ dhammo suvibhatto suvitthāritoti idampi sandhāya “chinnapilotiko”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:179_23: imasmiñca sāsane samaṇakacavaraṃ nāma patiṭṭhātuṃ na labhati.
atk-s0302a:185_0: Iti samaṇakacavarassa chinnattāpi ayaṃ dhammo chinnapilotiko nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:186_2: Kulaputtenāti dve kulaputtā ācārakulaputto jātikulaputto ca.
atk-s0302a:186_3: Tattha yo yato kutoci kulā pabbajitvā sīlādayo pañca dhammakkhandhe pūreti,
atk-s0302a:186_5: Yo pana yasakulaputtādayo viya jātisampannakulā pabbajito,
atk-s0302a:186_12: Idānissa caturaṅgaṃ dassento kāmaṃ taco cātiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:186_17: Idañca pana caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahantena navasu ṭhānesu samādhātabbaṃ purebhatte pacchābhatte
atk-s0302a:186_18: purimayāme majjhimayāme pacchimayāme gamane ṭhāne nisajjāya sayaneti.
atk-s0302a:187_2: kusīto viharatīti imasmiṃ sāsane yo kusīto puggalo,
atk-s0302a:187_7: Sadatthanti sobhanaṃ vā atthaṃ sakaṃ vā atthaṃ,
atk-s0302a:187_10: Kusītapuggalassa hi cha dvārāni aguttāni honti,
atk-s0302a:187_14: So sabrahmacārīnaṃ akkhimhi patitarajaṃ viya upaghātakaro hutvā dukkhaṃ viharati,
atk-s0302a:187_18: tena bhutto raṭṭhapiṇḍopi na mahapphalo hoti.
atk-s0302a:188_1: bhikkhaveti āraddhavīriyo puggalo imasmiṃyeva sāsane sukhaṃ viharati.
atk-s0302a:188_6: Āraddhavīriyassa hi cha dvārāni suguttāni honti,
atk-s0302a:188_8: ājīvaṭṭhamakaṃ sīlaṃ pariyodātaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ akkhimhi susītalañjanaṃ viya dhātugatacandanaṃ viya ca manāpo hutvā sukhaṃ viharati,
atk-s0302a:190_1: tathāgatā evaṃ vanditabbā”ti paṭikkhipitvā tāya yācito vanditabbākāraṃ ācikkhanto evamāha –
atk-s0302a:192_0: Samagge sāvake passa, esā buddhāna vandanā”ti. ;
atk-s0302a:193_0: Evaṃ āraddhavīriyo satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:193_2: Tassa hi buddhuppādo dhammadesanā saṅghasuppaṭipatti saphalā hoti saudrayā,
atk-s0302a:194_0: Hīnena aggassāti hīnāya saddhāya hīnena vīriyena hīnāya satiyā hīnena samādhinā hīnāya paññāya aggasaṅkhātassa arahattassa patti nāma na hoti.
atk-s0302a:194_1: Aggena ca khoti aggehi saddhādīhi aggassa arahattassa patti hoti.
atk-s0302a:194_4: Yañhi pivitvā antaravīthiyaṃ patito visaññī attano sāṭakādīnampi assāmiko hoti,
atk-s0302a:194_6: mayhaṃ pana sāsanaṃ evaṃ pasannañca pātabbañcāti dassento “maṇḍapeyya”nti āha.
atk-s0302a:195_5: Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ ācikkhanā desanā paññāpanā paṭṭhapanā vivaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:195_11: Bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo devā manussā ye vā panaññepi keci viññātāro,
atk-s0302a:195_21: assaddhiyaṃ kasaṭaṃ chaḍḍetvā saddhindriyassa adhimokkhamaṇḍaṃ pivatīti maṇḍapeyyantiādināpi nayenettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:195_24: tasmā vīriyasampayogaṃ katvā pivatha etaṃ maṇḍaṃ.
atk-s0302a:195_25: Bāhirakañhi bhesajjamaṇḍampi vejjassa asammukhā pivantānaṃ pamāṇaṃ vā uggamanaṃ vā niggamanaṃ vā na jānāmāti āsaṅkā hoti.
atk-s0302a:195_27: Evameva amhākaṃ dhammassāmi satthā sammukhībhūtoti vīriyaṃ katvā pivathāti maṇḍapāne nesaṃ niyojento tasmātiha,
atk-s0302a:195_31: Idāni niyojanānurūpaṃ sikkhitabbataṃ niddisanto attatthaṃ vā hi,
atk-s0302a:197_5: Evaṃ santepi “jānato”ti ñāṇalakkhaṇaṃ upādāya puggalaṃ niddisati.
atk-s0302a:197_11: Āsavānaṃ khayanti ettha āsavānaṃ pahānaṃ asamuppādo khīṇākāro natthibhāvoti ayampi āsavakkhayoti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:197_13: “Āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimutti”ntiādīsu hi khīṇākāro āsavakkhayoti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:197_14: “Yo āsavānaṃ khayo vayo bhedo paribhedo aniccatā antaradhāna”nti ettha bhaṅgo.
atk-s0302a:199_0: Khayasmiṃ paṭhamaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tato aññā anantarā”ti. ; –
atk-s0302a:200_1: So hi āsave khepento vūpasamento uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:202_4: No ajānato no apassatoti yo pana na jānāti na passati,
atk-s0302a:202_6: Etena ye ajānato apassatopi saṃsārādīhiyeva suddhiṃ vadanti,
atk-s0302a:203_0: Idāni yaṃ jānato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti,
atk-s0302a:203_5: Dabbajātiko eva hi koci bhikkhu chattaṃ kātuṃ jānāti,
atk-s0302a:203_7: tassa īdisāni kammāni vattasīse ṭhatvā karontassa sā jānanā saggamaggaphalānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:203_8: Yo pana sāsane pabbajitvā vejjakammādīni kātuṃ jānāti,
atk-s0302a:203_10: Tasmā yaṃ jānato passato ca āsavānaṃ khayo hoti,
atk-s0302a:203_11: tadeva dassento iti rūpantiādimāha. Evaṃ kho,
atk-s0302a:203_13: jānatoti evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ jānantassa.
atk-s0302a:203_14: Āsavānaṃ khayo hotīti āsavānaṃ khayante jātattā “āsavānaṃ khayo”ti laddhanāmaṃ arahattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:204_0: Evaṃ arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā idāni khīṇāsavassa āgamanīyaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ yampissa taṃ,
atk-s0302a:204_2: Tattha khayasmiṃ khayeñāṇanti āsavakkhayasaṅkhāte arahattaphale paṭiladdhe sati paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:204_3: Tañhi arahattaphalasaṅkhāte khayasmiṃ paṭhamavāraṃ uppanne pacchā uppannattā khayeñāṇanti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:204_7: Evaṃ ito paresupi labbhamānavasena paccayabhāvo veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:205_1: So hi kilese virājento khepento uppanno,
atk-s0302a:205_5: Balavavipassanāti bhayatūpaṭṭhāne ñāṇaṃ ādīnavānupassane ñāṇaṃ muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:205_9: Taruṇavipassanāti saṅkhāraparicchede ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇe ñāṇaṃ sammasane ñāṇaṃ maggāmagge ñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:205_15: Sā hi appanāpubbabhāgassa sukhassa paccayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:205_27: (So hi savikārāya jātiyā paccayo hoti.) Etenupāyena sesapadānipi veditabbāni.
atk-s0302a:206_1: Pabbatakandarapadarasākhāti ettha kandaraṃ nāma ‘ka’ntiladdhanāmena udakena dārito udakabhinno pabbatapadeso,
atk-s0302a:206_3: Padaraṃ nāma aṭṭhamāse deve avassante phalito bhūmippadeso.
atk-s0302a:207_0: Yathā pabbatamatthake devo vassitvā pabbatakandarādīni pūrento anupubbena mahāsamuddaṃ sāgaraṃ pūreti,
atk-s0302a:207_1: evaṃ avijjāpabbatamatthake tāva abhisaṅkhārameghassa vassanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:207_2: Assutavā hi bālaputhujjano avijjāya aññāṇī hutvā taṇhāya abhilāsaṃ katvā kusalākusalakammaṃ āyūhati,
atk-s0302a:207_5: Iti pabbatamatthake vuṭṭhadevassa kandarādayo pūretvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitakālo viya avijjāpabbatamatthake
atk-s0302a:207_6: vuṭṭhassa abhisaṅkhārameghassa paramparapaccayatāya anupubbena viññāṇādivaṭṭaṃ pūretvā ṭhitakālo.
atk-s0302a:207_7: Buddhavacanaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ agahitampi “idha tathāgato loke uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:207_8: agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajatī”ti imāya pāḷiyā vasena gahitamevāti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:207_11: So buddhānaṃ vā buddhasāvakānaṃ vā sammukhībhāvaṃ āgamma vaṭṭadosadīpakaṃ lakkhaṇāhaṭaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā vaṭṭavasena pīḷito hoti,
atk-s0302a:207_12: evamassa savikārā khandhajāti vaṭṭadukkhassa paccayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:207_13: So vaṭṭadukkhena pīḷito aparāparaṃ saddhaṃ janetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajati,
atk-s0302a:207_15: So pabbajjāmatteneva asantuṭṭho ūnapañcavassakāle nissayaṃ gahetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ pūrento dvemātikā
atk-s0302a:207_16: paguṇaṃ katvā kammākammaṃ uggahetvā yāva arahattā nijjaṭaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vasanto
atk-s0302a:207_24: So samādhinā cittakallataṃ janetvā taruṇavipassanāya kammaṃ karoti.
atk-s0302a:207_30: Evaṃ devassa anupubbena sāgaraṃ pūretvā ṭhitakālo viya khīṇāsavassa vimuttisāgaraṃ pūretvā ṭhitakālo veditabboti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:209_5: Yathā “gāmaṃ gamissāmī”ti nikkhantapuriso taṃ gāmaṃ appattopi “kahaṃ itthannāmo”ti vutte “gāmaṃ gato”ti vuccati, evaṃ.
atk-s0302a:209_6: Atippagoti tadā kira therassa atippagoyeva nikkhantadivaso ahosi,
atk-s0302a:209_7: atippagoyeva nikkhantabhikkhū bodhiyaṅgaṇe cetiyaṅgaṇe nivāsanapārupanaṭṭhāneti imesu ṭhānesu yāva bhikkhācāravelā hoti,
atk-s0302a:209_10: tāva paribbājakehi saddhiṃ ekadvekathāvāre karissāmī”ti cintayato yaṃnūnāhanti etadahosi.
atk-s0302a:209_11: Paribbājakānaṃ ārāmoti so kira ārāmo dakkhiṇadvārassa ca veḷuvanassa ca antarā ahosi.
atk-s0302a:209_13: Kiṃvādī kimakkhāyīti kiṃ vadati kiṃ ācikkhati,
atk-s0302a:209_14: kiṃ ettha samaṇassa gotamassa dassananti pucchanti.
atk-s0302a:209_18: Sahadhammiko vādānupātoti parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇo hutvā samaṇassa gotamassa vādānupāto vādappavatti
atk-s0302a:209_19: viññūhi garahitabbaṃ kāraṇaṃ koci appamattakopi kathaṃ nāgaccheyya?
atk-s0302a:209_21: kathaṃ sabbākārenapi samaṇassa gotamassa vāde gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na bhaveyyāti?
atk-s0302a:210_0: Iti vadanti phassapaccayā dukkhanti evaṃ vadantoti attho.
atk-s0302a:210_2: Te vata aññatra phassāti idaṃ “tadapi phassapaccayā”ti paṭiññāya sādhakavacanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:210_3: Yasmā hi na vinā phassena dukkhapaṭisaṃvedanā atthi,
atk-s0302a:210_4: tasmā jānitabbametaṃ yathā “tadapi phassapaccayā”ti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-s0302a:211_5: Idaṃ vacanaṃ “na kevalaṃ sāriputtova rājagahaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0302a:211_9: Na kevalañca tasseva sā titthiyehi saddhiṃ kathā jātā,
atk-s0302a:212_1: Vacanattho panettha accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttanti acchariyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:212_3: Ekena padenāti “phassapaccayā dukkha”nti iminā ekena padena.
atk-s0302a:212_7: Idāni thero jarāmaraṇādikāya paṭiccasamuppādakathāya taṃ atthagambhīrañceva gambhīrāvabhāsañca karonto sace maṃ,
atk-s0302a:212_9: tadeva padaṃ gahetvā vivaṭṭaṃ dassento channaṃtvevātiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:214_4: yasmā idaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ na kevalaṃ phassapaccayā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:214_11: tasmā tassa aparampi paccayavisesaṃ dassetuṃ kāye vā hānanda,
atk-s0302a:214_15: Ettha ca kāyadvāre kāmāvacarakusalākusalavasena vīsati cetanā labbhanti,
atk-s0302a:214_17: Manodvāre navahi rūpārūpacetanāhi saddhiṃ ekūnatiṃsāti tīsu dvāresu ekūnasattati cetanā honti,
atk-s0302a:214_19: Avijjāpaccayā cāti idaṃ tāpi cetanā avijjāpaccayā hontīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:214_20: Yasmā pana taṃ yathāvuttacetanābhedaṃ kāyasaṅkhārañceva vacīsaṅkhārañca manosaṅkhārañca parehi anussāhito sāmaṃ asaṅkhārikacittena karoti,
atk-s0302a:214_25: mātāpitūsu cetiyavandanādīni karontesu anukarontā dārakā viya kevalaṃ kammameva jānanto “imassa pana
atk-s0302a:214_26: kammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti vipākaṃ ajānantopi karoti,
atk-s0302a:214_27: tasmā taṃ dassetuṃ sāmaṃ vā taṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0302a:215_1: dhammesūti ye ime “sāmaṃ vā taṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0302a:215_2: kāyasaṅkhāra”ntiādīsu catūsu ṭhānesu vuttā chasattati dvesatā cetanādhammā,
atk-s0302a:215_4: Sabbepi hi te “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0302a:215_6: So kāyo na hotīti yasmiṃ kāye sati kāyasañcetanāpaccayaṃ ajjhattaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:215_19: Khīṇāsavena hi kataṃ kammaṃ neva kusalaṃ hoti nākusalaṃ.
atk-s0302a:215_21: tenassa te kāyādayo na hontīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:216_0: Khettaṃ taṃ na hotītiādīsupi viruhanaṭṭhena taṃ khettaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0302a:216_5: sā sañcetanā etesaṃ viruhanādīnaṃ atthānaṃ abhāvena tassa sukhadukkhassa neva khettaṃ,
atk-s0302a:217_0: Chaṭṭhaṃ upavāṇasuttaṃ uttānameva. Ettha pana vaṭṭadukkhameva kathitanti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:219_1: Sattame paṭipāṭiyā vuttesu pariyosānapadaṃ gahetvā katamañca,
atk-s0302a:219_4: Evaṃ paccayaṃ pajānātīti evaṃ dukkhasaccavasena paccayaṃ jānāti.
atk-s0302a:219_15: Amatadvāraṃ āhacca tiṭṭhatīti amataṃ nāma nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:221_2: Te hi parīti upasaggaṃ pakkhipitvā vuccamāne paṭivijjhituṃ sakkonti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:222_0: Dasame sabbaṃ uttānameva. Imesu dvīsu suttesu catusaccapaṭivedhova kathito. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:226_2: Saṅkhātadhammāseti saṅkhātadhammā vuccanti ñātadhammā tulitadhammā tīritadhammā.
atk-s0302a:226_4: Puthūti teyeva satta jane sandhāya puthūti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:226_9: Iriyanti vuttiṃ ācāraṃ gocaraṃ vihāraṃ paṭipattiṃ.
atk-s0302a:226_11: Sekkhānañca saṅkhātadhammānañca khīṇāsavānañca paṭipattiṃ mayā pucchito paṇḍita, mārisa,
atk-s0302a:227_0: Tuṇhī ahosīti kasmā yāva tatiyaṃ puṭṭho tuṇhī ahosi?
atk-s0302a:227_6: sā ca khandhavasena dhātuvasena āyatanavasena paccayākāravasenāti bahūhi kāraṇehi sakkā kathetuṃ.
atk-s0302a:227_7: Kathaṃ kathento nu kho satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetvā kathetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti?
atk-s0302a:227_9: “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño pattaṃ ādāya caranto sāvako nāma paññāya sāriputtasamo natthi.
atk-s0302a:227_10: Ayampi mayā pañhaṃ puṭṭho yāva tatiyaṃ tuṇhī eva.
atk-s0302a:227_13: Atha “ajjhāsaye”ti ñatvā pañhakathanatthāya nayaṃ dadamāno bhūtamidanti,
atk-s0302a:228_4: imaṃ pañhaṃ kathehī”ti therassa nayaṃ deti.
atk-s0302a:228_5: Sahanayadānena pana therassa tīre ṭhitapurisassa vivaṭo ekaṅgaṇo mahāsamuddo viya nayasatena nayasahassena pañhabyākaraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:228_9: Sammappaññāya passatīti saha vipassanāya maggapaññāya sammā passati.
atk-s0302a:228_10: Paṭipanno hotīti sīlato paṭṭhāya yāva arahattamaggā nibbidādīnaṃ atthāya paṭipanno hoti.
atk-s0302a:228_13: tasmā taṃ āhārasambhavaṃ nāma katvā dassetuṃ idaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:228_14: Iti imināpi pariyāyena sekkhapaṭipadā kathitā hoti.
atk-s0302a:228_18: tasmā taṃ āhāranirodhasambhavaṃ nāma katvā dassetuṃ idaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:228_19: Iti imināpi pariyāyena sekkhasseva paṭipadā kathitā.
atk-s0302a:228_21: Anupādā vimuttoti catūhi upādānehi kañci dhammaṃ agahetvā vimutto.
atk-s0302a:228_22: Sādhu sādhūti iminā therassa byākaraṇaṃ sampahaṃsetvā sayampi tatheva byākaronto puna “bhūtamida”ntiādimāhāti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:230_5: Assāsamalatthāti assāsaṃ avassayaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ na hi nūna alattha,
atk-s0302a:230_6: tayo magge tīṇi ca phalāni nūna nālatthāti dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:230_8: na sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatteyyāti ayaṃ therassa adhippāyo.
atk-s0302a:230_15: Āyatiṃ panāvusoti iminā “āyatiṃ paṭisandhi tumhākaṃ ugghāṭitā,
atk-s0302a:230_18: vicikicchāmīti iminā thero tattha vicikicchābhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:231_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti “imaṃ sutakāraṇaṃ bhagavato ārocessāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0302a:231_2: Khīṇā jātīti na therena evaṃ byākatā,
atk-s0302a:231_3: ayaṃ pana thero tuṭṭho pasanno evaṃ padabyañjanāni āropetvā āha.
atk-s0302a:231_4: Aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesīti taṃ sutvā satthā cintesi –
atk-s0302a:231_6: Na so kenaci kāraṇena evaṃ byākarissati.
atk-s0302a:231_8: Pakkosāpetvā naṃ pañhaṃ byākarāpessāmī”ti aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0302a:232_0: Sace taṃ sāriputtāti idaṃ bhagavā “na esa attano dhammatāya aññaṃ byākarissati,
atk-s0302a:232_2: taṃ kathentova aññaṃ byākarissatī”ti aññaṃ byākarāpetuṃ evaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0302a:232_5: tassa paccayassa khayā khīṇasmiṃ jātiyā paccaye jātisaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃ khīṇanti viditaṃ.
atk-s0302a:232_6: Idhāpi ca thero pañhe akaṅkhitvā ajjhāsaye kaṅkhati.
atk-s0302a:232_12: kilesā khīṇātiādīhi bahūhi kāraṇehi sakkā byākātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:232_13: kathaṃ kathento pana satthu ajjhāsayaṃ gahetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:233_6: Yasmā pana bhagavā uttari pañhaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0302a:233_7: tasmā tena taṃ byākaraṇaṃ anumoditanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:234_0: Kathaṃ jānato pana teti idaṃ kasmā ārabhi?
atk-s0302a:234_2: Thero kira sūkaranikhātaleṇadvāre dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasutte kathiyamāne tālavaṇṭaṃ
atk-s0302a:234_3: gahetvā satthāraṃ bījayamāno ṭhito tisso vedanā pariggahetvā sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ adhigato,
atk-s0302a:234_5: Imasmiṃ savisaye ṭhito sīhanādaṃ nadissatīti naṃ sandhāya satthā idaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0302a:234_7: Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhanti ettha kiñcāpi sukhā vedanā ṭhitisukhā vipariṇāmadukkhā,
atk-s0302a:234_10: vipariṇāmakoṭiyā pana sabbāva dukkhā nāma jātā.
atk-s0302a:234_11: Viditanti yasmā evaṃ vedanāttayaṃ dukkhanti viditaṃ,
atk-s0302a:235_1: Thero hi vedanā ekāti vā dve tisso catassoti vā avuttepi vuttanayena tāsaṃ tissoti paricchedaṃ aññāsi,
atk-s0302a:235_3: Dukkhasminti idaṃ bhagavā iminā adhippāyena āha –
atk-s0302a:235_5: yaṃ tayā ‘iminā kāraṇena vedanāsu taṇhā na upaṭṭhāsī’ti byākataṃ,
atk-s0302a:235_7: ‘Tisso vedanā’ti vibhajantena pana te atippapañco kato,
atk-s0302a:235_8: taṃ ‘dukkhasmi’nti byākarontenapi hi te subyākatameva bhaveyya.
atk-s0302a:235_10: taṃ dukkhanti ñātamattepi hi vedanāsu taṇhā na tiṭṭhati”.
atk-s0302a:236_1: katarena vimokkhena tayā aññā byākatāti attho?
atk-s0302a:236_11: Tasmā koci bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ saṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā te vavatthapetvā bahiddhā otāreti,
atk-s0302a:236_13: tassa ajjhatta saṅkhāre sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:236_14: Iti ajjhattaṃ abhiniveso ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0302a:236_15: Koci ajjhattaṃ saṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā te vavatthapetvā bahiddhā otāreti,
atk-s0302a:236_16: tassa bahiddhā saṅkhāre sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:236_17: Iti ajjhattaṃ abhiniveso bahiddhā vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0302a:236_21: tassa bahiddhā saṅkhāre sammasanakāle maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:236_22: Iti bahiddhā abhiniveso bahiddhā vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0302a:236_23: Koci bahiddhā saṅkhāresu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā te vavatthapetvā ajjhattaṃ otāreti,
atk-s0302a:236_25: Iti bahiddhā abhiniveso ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
atk-s0302a:236_26: Tatra thero “ajjhattasaṅkhāre pariggahetvā tesaṃ vavatthānakāle maggavuṭṭhānena arahattaṃ pattosmī”ti dassento ajjhattaṃ vimokkhā khvāhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:237_1: Tathā sato viharāmīti tenākārena satiyā samannāgato viharāmi.
atk-s0302a:237_2: Yathā sataṃ viharantanti yenākārena maṃ satiyā samannāgataṃ viharantaṃ.
atk-s0302a:237_3: Āsavā nānussavantīti cakkhuto rūpe savanti āsavanti sandanti pavattantīti evaṃ chahi dvārehi chasu ārammaṇesu
atk-s0302a:238_1: Tesvāhaṃ na kaṅkhāmīti tesu ahaṃ “kataro kāmāsavo,
atk-s0302a:238_6: Te me pahīnāti na vicikicchāmīti te mayhaṃ pahīnāti vicikicchaṃ na uppādemi.
atk-s0302a:238_7: Idaṃ bhagavā “evaṃ byākarontenapi tayā subyākataṃ bhaveyya ‘ajjhattaṃ vimokkhā khvāhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:238_8: āvuso’tiādīni pana te vadantena atippapañco kato”ti dassento āha.
atk-s0302a:239_0: Uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisīti paññattavarabuddhāsanato uṭṭhahitvā vihāraṃ antomahāgandhakuṭiṃ pāvisi asambhinnāya eva parisāya. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:239_1: Buddhā hi aniṭṭhitāya desanāya asambhinnāya parisāya uṭṭhāyāsanā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisantā puggalathomanatthaṃ vā pavisanti dhammathomanatthaṃ vā.
atk-s0302a:239_2: Tattha puggalathomanatthaṃ pavisanto satthā evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0302a:239_3: “imaṃ mayā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ vitthārena ca avibhattaṃ dhammapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū uggahetvā
atk-s0302a:239_4: ānandaṃ vā kaccāyanaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pucchissanti,
atk-s0302a:239_11: ahampi naṃ evameva byākareyya’nti evaṃ te puggale thomessāmi.
atk-s0302a:239_12: Tato tesu gāravaṃ janetvā bhikkhū upasaṅkamissanti,
atk-s0302a:239_13: tepi bhikkhū atthe ca dhamme ca niyojessanti,
atk-s0302a:239_14: te tehi niyojitā tisso sikkhā paripūretvā dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0302a:240_3: taṃ mama thomanaṃ sutvā gāravajātā bhikkhū imaṃ upasaṅkamitabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:240_5: taṃ tesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti dhammathomanatthaṃ pavisanto evaṃ cintesi yathā dhammadāyādasutte cintesi.
atk-s0302a:240_7: “mayi vihāraṃ paviṭṭhe āmisadāyādaṃ garahanto dhammadāyādañca thomento imissaṃyeva parisati nisinno sāriputto dhammaṃ desessati,
atk-s0302a:240_8: evaṃ dvinnampi amhākaṃ ekajjhāsayāya matiyā desitā ayaṃ desanā aggā ca garukā ca bhavissati pāsāṇacchattasadisā”ti.
atk-s0302a:241_0: Idha pana āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ ukkaṃsetvā pakāsetvā ṭhapetukāmo puggalathomanatthaṃ uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0302a:241_1: Īdisesu ṭhānesu bhagavā nisinnāsaneyeva antarahito cittagatiyā vihāraṃ pavisatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:241_4: sā ekavāraṃ bhinnā puna dussannipātā bhaveyyāti bhagavā adissamānena kāyena cittagatiyā eva pāvisi.
atk-s0302a:242_0: Evaṃ paviṭṭhe pana bhagavati bhagavato adhippāyānurūpameva sīhanādaṃ naditukāmo tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto
atk-s0302a:242_2: Pubbe appaṭisaṃviditanti idaṃ nāma pucchissatīti pubbe mayā aviditaṃ aññātaṃ.
atk-s0302a:242_6: evaṃ puccheyyuṃ kathaṃ jānatā pana tayā,
atk-s0302a:242_8: kathaṃ passatā aññā byākatā khīṇā jātī”ti imaṃ paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:242_14: jātī”ti evaṃ vissajjitaṃ paṭhamaṃ pañhaṃ anumodi.
atk-s0302a:243_0: Etadahosīti bhagavatā anumodite nayasatena nayasahassena pañhassa ekaṅgaṇikabhāvena pākaṭībhūtattā etaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0302a:243_1: Divasampāhaṃ bhagavato etamatthaṃ byākareyyanti sakaladivasampi ahaṃ bhagavato etaṃ paṭiccasamuppādatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:243_3: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti evaṃ kirassa ahosi –
atk-s0302a:244_0: Sā hi bhikkhu sāriputtassa dhammadhātūti ettha dhammadhātūti paccayākārassa vivaṭabhāvadassanasamatthaṃ sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:244_2: Yathā buddhānaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannā dhammā sabbaññutaññāṇassa pākaṭā honti,
atk-s0302a:244_3: evaṃ therassa sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ sabbepi sāvakañāṇassa gocaradhamme jānātīti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:246_1: Tatiye taṃ suṇāthāti taṃ ñāṇavatthudesanaṃ suṇātha.
atk-s0302a:246_3: Jarāmaraṇe ñāṇantiādīsu catūsu paṭhamaṃ savanamayañāṇaṃ sammasanañāṇaṃ paṭivedhañāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti catubbidhaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0302a:246_5: Tatiyaṃ pana ṭhapetvā sammasanañāṇaṃ tividhameva hoti,
atk-s0302a:246_9: Iminā dhammenāti iminā catusaccadhammena vā maggañāṇadhammena vā.
atk-s0302a:247_2: Akālikenāti kiñci kālaṃ anatikkamitvā paṭivedhānantaraṃyeva phaladāyakena.
atk-s0302a:247_5: Atītānāgate nayaṃ netīti “ye kho kecī”tiādinā nayena atīte ca anāgate ca nayaṃ neti.
atk-s0302a:247_6: Ettha ca na catusaccadhammena vā maggañāṇadhammena vā sakkā atītānāgate nayaṃ netuṃ,
atk-s0302a:247_7: catusacce pana maggañāṇena paṭividdhe parato paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:247_11: etarahīti yathā ahaṃ etarahi catusaccavasena jānāmi.
atk-s0302a:247_16: Imasmiṃ sutte khīṇāsavassa sekkhabhūmi kathitā hoti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:249_1: Catutthe sattasattarīti satta ca sattari ca.
atk-s0302a:249_4: tasmā tesaṃ ajjhāsayena idaṃ suttaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:249_6: Paccayākāro hi dhammānaṃ pavattiṭṭhitikāraṇattā dhammaṭṭhitīti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:249_13: Sattasattarīti ekekasmiṃ satta satta katvā ekādasasu padesu sattasattari.
atk-s0302a:251_1: Pañcame samudayo hotīti satthā idheva desanaṃ osāpesi.
atk-s0302a:251_6: athassāhaṃ vissajjessāmīti tassa okāsadānatthaṃ desanaṃ osāpesi.
atk-s0302a:251_13: yathā pana satasahassagghanike suvaṇṇathāle vaḍḍhitassa subhojanassa matthake āmalakamattepi gūthapiṇḍe
atk-s0302a:251_14: ṭhapite sabbaṃ bhojanaṃ dubbhojanaṃ hoti chaḍḍetabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:251_16: Iminā sattūpaladdhivādapadena gūthapiṇḍena taṃ bhojanaṃ dubbhojanaṃ viya ayampi sabbo duppañhova jātoti.
atk-s0302a:252_1: Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti yassa hi ayaṃ diṭṭhi,
atk-s0302a:252_4: Evaṃ gaṇhato sā diṭṭhi “satto ucchijjatī”ti gahitattā ucchedadiṭṭhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:252_5: Sace pana saṅkhārāva uppajjanti ceva nirujjhanti cāti gaṇheyya,
atk-s0302a:252_7: Ariyamaggo ca nāmeso vaṭṭaṃ nirodhento vaṭṭaṃ samucchindanto uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:252_8: tadeva taṃ vaṭṭaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiyā gahitākārassa sambhave sati vināva maggabhāvanāya nirujjhatīti maggabhāvanā niratthakā hoti.
atk-s0302a:253_0: Dutiyanaye aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti yassa ayaṃ diṭṭhi,
atk-s0302a:253_3: jīvitaṃ pana pañjarato sakuṇo viya yathāsukhaṃ gacchatī”ti gaṇhāti.
atk-s0302a:253_4: Evaṃ gaṇhato sā diṭṭhi “imasmā lokā jīvitaṃ paralokaṃ gata”nti gahitattā sassatadiṭṭhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:253_6: so ekasaṅkhārepi nicce dhuve sassate sati uppannopi vaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭetuṃ na sakkotīti maggabhāvanā niratthakā hoti.
atk-s0302a:253_7: Tena vuttaṃ “aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā bhikkhu diṭṭhiyā sati brahmacariyavāso na hotī”ti.
atk-s0302a:254_1: Sā hi sammādiṭṭhiyā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena visūkamiva attānaṃ āvaraṇato visūkāyikaṃ,
atk-s0302a:254_2: sammādiṭṭhiṃ ananuvattitvā tassā virodhena pavattanato visevitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:254_3: kadāci ucchedassa kadāci sassatassa gahaṇato virūpaṃ phanditaṃ vipphanditanti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:254_5: puna aviruhaṇaṭṭhena matthakacchinnatālo viya samūlaṃ tālaṃ uddharitvā tassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ viya ca katānīti attho.
atk-s0302a:256_3: yo vadeyyāti tassaṃ parisati diṭṭhigatiko pañhaṃ pucchitukāmo atthi,
atk-s0302a:256_4: so pana avisāradadhātuko uṭṭhāya dasabalaṃ pucchituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:256_5: tasmā tassa ajjhāsayena sayameva pucchitvā vissajjento satthā evamāha. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:258_1: Sattame na tumhākanti attani hi sati attaniyaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:258_4: Napi aññesanti añño nāma paresaṃ attā,
atk-s0302a:260_11: anusetīti dvādasannaṃ cetanānaṃ sahajātakoṭiyā ceva upanissayakoṭiyā ca anusayo gahito.
atk-s0302a:260_12: Ārammaṇametaṃ hotīti (cetanādidhammajāte sati kammaviññāṇassa uppattiyā avāritattā) etaṃ cetanādidhammajātaṃ paccayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:260_16: Patiṭṭhā viññāṇassa hotīti tassa kammaviññāṇassa patiṭṭhā hoti.
atk-s0302a:260_17: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhite viññāṇeti tasmiṃ kammaviññāṇe patiṭṭhite.
atk-s0302a:260_18: Virūḷheti kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāya nibbattamūle jāte.
atk-s0302a:261_3: No ce pakappetīti iminā taṇhādiṭṭhikappānaṃ appavattanakkhaṇo.
atk-s0302a:261_4: Atha ce anusetīti iminā tebhūmakavipākesu parittakiriyāsu rūpeti ettha appahīnakoṭiyā anusayo gahito.
atk-s0302a:261_5: Ārammaṇametaṃ hotīti anusaye sati kammaviññāṇassa uppattiyā avāritattā etaṃ anusayajātaṃ paccayova hoti.
atk-s0302a:262_0: No ceva cetetītiādīsu paṭhamapade tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā nivattā,
atk-s0302a:262_2: tatiyapade vuttappakāresu dhammesu yo appahīnakoṭiyā anusayito anusayo,
atk-s0302a:263_3: na ceteti na pakappeti na anusetīti idampi catukkaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:263_5: Dutiyanaye cetetīti tebhūmakakusalacetanā ceva catasso ca akusalacetanā gahitā.
atk-s0302a:263_6: Na pakappetīti aṭṭhasu cittesu taṇhādiṭṭhiyo nivattā.
atk-s0302a:263_8: catūsu akusalacetanāsu sahajātakoṭiyā ceva upanissayakoṭiyā ca anusayo gahito.
atk-s0302a:263_10: na pakappetīti aṭṭhasu cittesu taṇhādiṭṭhiyo nivattā,
atk-s0302a:263_11: anusetīti sutte āgataṃ vāretvā tebhūmakakusalākusalavipākakiriyārūpesu appahīnakoṭiyā upanissayo gahito.
atk-s0302a:264_5: Ettha ca viññāṇassa ceva āyatiṃ punabbhavassa ca antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:268_2: Sā hi piyarūpesu rūpādīsu namanaṭṭhena “natī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:268_3: Āgati gati hotīti āgatimhi gati hoti,
atk-s0302a:268_4: āgate paccupaṭṭhite kamme vā kammanimitte vā gahinimitte vā paṭisandhivasena viññāṇassa gati hoti.
atk-s0302a:268_5: Cutūpapātoti evaṃ viññāṇassa āgate paṭisandhivisaye gatiyā sati ito cavanasaṅkhātā cuti,
atk-s0302a:268_6: tatthūpapattisaṅkhāto upapātoti ayaṃ cutūpapāto nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:268_7: Evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte natiyā ca āgatigatiyā ca antare ekova sandhi kathitoti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:272_4: (sotāpattiyā ca aṅgaṃ,) yaṃ pubbabhāge sotāpattipaṭilābhāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0302a:272_6: paṭiladdhaguṇassa ca sotāpattiṃ patvā ṭhitassa aṅgaṃ,
atk-s0302a:272_11: Ñāyoti paṭiccasamuppannaṃ ñatvā ṭhitañāṇampi paṭiccasamuppādopi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:272_15: Sudiṭṭho hotīti aparāparaṃ uppajjitvā dassanavasena suṭṭhu diṭṭho.
atk-s0302a:273_0: Khīṇanirayotiādīsu āyatiṃ tattha anuppajjanatāya khīṇo nirayo mayhanti so ahaṃ khīṇanirayo.
atk-s0302a:273_5: Sambodhiparāyanoti uttarimaggattayasaṅkhāto sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ mayhanti sohaṃ sambodhiparāyano,
atk-s0302a:274_2: Verañca nāmetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti bāhiraṃ ajjhattikanti.
atk-s0302a:274_3: Ekena hi ekassa pitā mārito hoti,
atk-s0302a:274_4: so cintesi “etena kira me pitā mārito,
atk-s0302a:274_5: ahampi taṃyeva māressāmī”ti nisitaṃ satthaṃ ādāya carati.
atk-s0302a:274_8: Yā pana itarassa “ayaṃ kira maṃ māressāmīti carati,
atk-s0302a:274_9: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ māressāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:274_12: Yā pana taṃ niraye uppannaṃ disvā “etaṃ paharissāmī”ti jalitaṃ ayamuggaraṃ gaṇhato nirayapālassa cetanā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:274_14: Yā cassa “ayaṃ niddosaṃ maṃ paharissāmīti āgacchati,
atk-s0302a:274_15: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ paharissāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:274_24: surāmadamattena idaṃ nāma kata”ntiādinā nayena veruppatti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:274_31: taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge anussatiniddese vuttameva. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:278_2: Samudayanti dve samudayā khaṇikasamudayo ca paccayasamudayo ca.
atk-s0302a:278_8: Desessāmīti idaṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa samudayaatthaṅgamaṃ nibbattibhedaṃ nāma desessāmi,
atk-s0302a:278_10: Paṭiccāti nissayavasena ceva ārammaṇavasena ca paccayaṃ katvā.
atk-s0302a:278_11: Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phassoti tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phasso. Ayaṃ kho,
atk-s0302a:278_13: dukkhassa samudayoti ayaṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa nibbatti nāma.
atk-s0302a:278_15: Evañhi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti appaṭisandhiyaṃ. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:280_0: 44. Catutthe lokassāti saṅkhāralokassa. Ayamettha viseso. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:282_5: yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatena sakkā hoti bhagavato saddaṃ sotuṃ,
atk-s0302a:282_7: So kira gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanatthaṃ āgato attano kammaṃ pahāya bhagavato dhammaghosaṃ suṇanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:282_8: Addasāti tadā kira bhagavato āditova paccayākāraṃ manasikarontassa “idaṃ iminā paccayena hoti,
atk-s0302a:282_9: idaṃ iminā”ti āvajjato yāva bhavaggā ekaṅgaṇaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0302a:282_10: satthā manasikāraṃ pahāya vacasā sajjhāyaṃ karonto yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā,
atk-s0302a:282_11: “api nu kho imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ koci assosī”ti āvajjento taṃ bhikkhumaddasa.
atk-s0302a:283_1: Atha vā assosi noti amhākaṃ bhāsantānaṃ assosīti.
atk-s0302a:283_2: Uggaṇhāhītiādīsu sutvā tuṇhībhūtova paguṇaṃ karonto uggaṇhāti nāma.
atk-s0302a:283_3: Padānupadaṃ ghaṭetvā vācāya paricitaṃ karonto pariyāpuṇāti nāma.
atk-s0302a:283_4: Ubhayathāpi paguṇaṃ ādhārappattaṃ karonto dhāreti nāma.
atk-s0302a:283_7: Iti tīsupi imesu suttesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:285_0: 46. Chaṭṭhe aññataroti nāmavasena apākaṭo aññataro brāhmaṇo. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:287_0: 47. Sattame jāṇussoṇīti ṭhānantaravasena evaṃladdhanāmo asītikoṭivibhavo mahāpurohito. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:289_5: mahantaṃ gambhīranti upadhāritabbaṃ parittaṃ bhāvaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ.
atk-s0302a:289_9: devamanussādibhāvena paṭhamaṃ hutvā pacchā na hotīti ucchedaṃ sandhāya pucchati.
atk-s0302a:289_13: sabbaṃ puthutta”nti imā dve ucchedadiṭṭhiyoti veditabbā. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:291_0: 49. Navame kiṃ nu khoti saṃsayuppattiākāradassanaṃ. Samudayatīti uppajjati. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:293_0: 50. Dasame dvepi nayā ekato vuttā. Idameva purimena nānattaṃ, sesaṃ tādisamevāti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:297_2: Jarāmaraṇanti kasmā jarāmaraṇaṃ ekameva “anekavidhaṃ nānappakāraka”nti vatvā gahitanti ce?
atk-s0302a:297_4: Yathā hi cūḷāya gahite purise so puriso gahitova hoti,
atk-s0302a:297_5: evaṃ jarāmaraṇe gahite sabbadukkhaṃ gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0302a:297_6: Tasmā “yaṃ kho idaṃ anekavidhaṃ nānappakārakaṃ dukkhaṃ loke uppajjatī”ti nhatvā ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ viya sabbadukkhaṃ
atk-s0302a:297_7: dassetvā taṃ cūḷāya gaṇhanto viya jarāmaraṇaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:298_0: Jarāmaraṇanirodhasāruppagāminīti jarāmaraṇanirodhassa sāruppabhāvena nikkilesatāya parisuddhatāya sadisāva hutvā gāminīti attho.
atk-s0302a:298_1: Tathā paṭipanno ca hotīti yathā taṃ paṭipannoti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:298_5: Dukkhakkhayāya paṭipannoti sīlaṃ ādiṃ katvā jarāmaraṇadukkhassa nirodhatthāya paṭipanno.
atk-s0302a:299_0: Idāni arahattaphalapaccavekkhaṇaṃ satatavihārañca dassetvā desanā nivattetabbā siyā,
atk-s0302a:299_1: tathā akatvā avijjāgatoti idaṃ kasmā gaṇhātīti?
atk-s0302a:299_3: Apica puna vaṭṭaṃ ārabhitvā vivaṭṭe kathiyamāne bujjhanakasatto cettha atthi,
atk-s0302a:299_5: Tattha avijjāgatoti avijjāya gato upagato samannāgato.
atk-s0302a:299_8: Buddhānañhi sammutikathā paramatthakathāti dve kathā honti.
atk-s0302a:299_9: Tattha “satto naro puriso puggalo tisso nāgo”ti evaṃ pavattā sammutikathā nāma.
atk-s0302a:299_10: “Khandhā dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti evaṃ pavattā paramatthakathā nāma.
atk-s0302a:299_12: Te sammutiṃ kathentāpi paramatthaṃ kathentāpi saccameva kathenti.
atk-s0302a:304_2: Puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇanti kammaviññāṇaṃ kammapuññena upagataṃ sampayuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:304_4: Apuññaṃ ce saṅkhāranti dvādasacetanābhedaṃ apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti.
atk-s0302a:304_8: Ettha ca tividhassa kammābhisaṅkhārassa gahitattā dvādasapadiko paccayākāro gahitova hoti.
atk-s0302a:305_4: Ettha ca paṭhamameva avijjāya pahīnāya vijjā uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:305_5: Yathā pana caturaṅgepi tame rattiṃ padīpujjalena andhakāro pahīyati,
atk-s0302a:305_7: Na kiñci loke upādiyatīti loke kiñci dhammaṃ na gaṇhāti na parāmasati.
atk-s0302a:305_8: Anupādiyaṃ na paritassatīti anupādiyanto agaṇhanto neva taṇhāparitassanāya,
atk-s0302a:306_0: So sukhaṃ ce vedananti idaṃ kasmā ārabhi?
atk-s0302a:306_1: Khīṇāsavassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dassetvā satatavihāraṃ dassetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:306_6: Sukhaṃ abhinandantoyeva hi dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāma dukkhaṃ patvā sukhaṃ patthanato sukhassa ca vipariṇāmadukkhatoti.
atk-s0302a:307_0: Tattha pañcadvārikavedanā pacchā uppajjitvā paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati,
atk-s0302a:307_3: Pañcadvārikā pavatte pañcadvāravasena pavattamānā paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena adhimattā balavatī hoti,
atk-s0302a:307_5: saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya parihāyamānā asītinavutivassakāle mandā hoti.
atk-s0302a:307_6: Tadā hi sattā “cirarattaṃ ekato nisīdimhā nipajjimhā”ti vadantepi “na sañjānāmā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0302a:307_8: “sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ vā sāduṃ asāduṃ vā thaddhaṃ mudukanti vā na jānāmā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0302a:307_11: Sāpi anupubbena parihāyamānā maraṇasamaye hadayakoṭiṃyeva nissāya pavattati.
atk-s0302a:309_0: Yathā hi puriso pañcaudakamaggasampannaṃ vāpiṃ kareyya,
atk-s0302a:309_1: paṭhamaṃ deve vuṭṭhe pañcahi udakamaggehi udakaṃ pavisitvā antovāpiyaṃ āvāṭe pūreyya,
atk-s0302a:309_2: punappunaṃ deve vassante udakamagge pūretvā gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ottharitvā udakaṃ tiṭṭheyya tato tato vissandamānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:309_3: atha niddhamanatumbe vivaritvā khettesu kamme kariyamāne udakaṃ nikkhamantaṃ,
atk-s0302a:309_4: sassapākakāle (udakaṃ nikkhamantaṃ,) udakaṃ parihīnaṃ “macche gaṇhāmā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:310_0: Paṭhamaṃ deve vassante pañcahi maggehi udake pavisante āvāṭānaṃ pūraṇakālo viya hi paṭhamameva paṭisandhikkhaṇe
atk-s0302a:310_2: punappunaṃ deve vassante pañcannaṃ maggānaṃ pūritakālo viya pavatte pañcadvārikavedanāya pavattikālo,
atk-s0302a:310_3: gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle rajjanādivasena tassā adhimattabalavabhāvo,
atk-s0302a:310_5: tāva pūrāya vāpiyā ṭhitakālo viya paññāsavassakāle tassā ṭhitakālo,
atk-s0302a:310_6: niddhamanatumbesu vivaṭesu kammante kariyamāne udakassa nikkhamanakālo viya saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya tassā parihāni,
atk-s0302a:310_7: udake bhaṭṭhe udakamaggesu parittodakassa ṭhitakālo viya asītinavutivassakāle pañcadvārikavedanāya mandakālo,
atk-s0302a:310_8: āvāṭesuyeva udakassa patiṭṭhānakālo viya hadayavatthukoṭiṃ nissāya manodvārikavedanāya pavattikālo,
atk-s0302a:310_9: āvāṭesu parittepi udake sati “vāpiyaṃ udakaṃ atthī”ti vattabbakālo viya yāva sā pavattati,
atk-s0302a:310_11: Yathā pana āvāṭesu udake chinne “natthi vāpiyaṃ udaka”nti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:310_13: Imaṃ vedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno”ti.
atk-s0302a:312_5: ādittakumbhakārapāko viya hi tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā,
atk-s0302a:312_9: daṇḍakena uṇhakumbhaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā same bhūmibhāge kumbhassa ṭhapitakālo viya āraddhavipassakassa rūpasattakaṃ
atk-s0302a:312_10: arūpasattakaṃ vipassantassa kammaṭṭhāne ca paguṇe vibhūte upaṭṭhahamāne tathārūpaṃ utusappāyādiṃ labhitvā
atk-s0302a:312_11: ekāsane nisinnassa vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ patvā catūhi apāyehi attabhāvaṃ uddharitvā
atk-s0302a:312_13: Khīṇāsavo pana uṇhakumbho viya arahattappattadivaseyeva na parinibbāti,
atk-s0302a:312_14: sāsanappaveṇiṃ pana ghaṭayamāno paṇṇāsasaṭṭhivassāni ṭhatvā carimakacittappattiyā upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāti.
atk-s0302a:312_15: Athassa kumbhassa viya kapallāni anupādiṇṇakasarīrāneva avasissantīti.
atk-s0302a:312_16: Sarīrāni avasissantīti pajānātīti idaṃ pana khīṇāsavassa anuyogāropanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:313_2: Evametanti yadetaṃ tividhe abhisaṅkhāre asati paṭisandhiviññāṇassa appaññāṇantiādi,
atk-s0302a:313_5: Esevanto dukkhassāti ayameva vaṭṭadukkhassa anto ayaṃ paricchedo,
atk-s0302a:315_1: Dutiye upādāniyesūti catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ paccayesu tebhūmakadhammesu.
atk-s0302a:315_6: Evameva khoti ettha aggikkhandho viya hi tayo bhavā,
atk-s0302a:315_9: sukkhatiṇagomayādipakkhipanaṃ viya assādānupassino puthujjanassa taṇhādivasena chahi dvārehi kusalākusalakammakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:315_10: Tiṇagomayādīsu khīṇesu punappunaṃ tesaṃ pakkhipanena aggikkhandhassa vaḍḍhanaṃ viya bālaputhujjanassa
atk-s0302a:316_0: Na kālena kālaṃ sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyyāti tañhi koci atthakāmo evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-s0302a:316_1: “bho kasmā uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya kalāpe bandhitvā sukkhatiṇakaṭṭhānaṃ pacchiyañca pūretvā sukkhagomayāni pakkhipanto etaṃ aggiṃ jālesi?
atk-s0302a:316_2: Api nu te atthi itonidānaṃ kāci vaḍḍhīti?
atk-s0302a:316_6: Ahañhi imaṃ aggiṃ jagganto neva nhāyituṃ na bhuñjituṃ na nipajjituṃ labhāmīti.
atk-s0302a:316_7: Tena hi bho kiṃ te iminā niratthakena aggijālanena?
atk-s0302a:316_8: Ehi tvaṃ etāni ābhatāni tiṇādīni ettha nikkhipa,
atk-s0302a:316_10: tvaṃ pana asukasmiṃ ṭhāne sītodakā pokkharaṇī atthi,
atk-s0302a:316_12: mālāgandhavilepanehi attānaṃ maṇḍetvā sunivattho supārutova pādukāhi nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaramāruyha
atk-s0302a:316_13: vātapānaṃ vivaritvā mahāvīthiyaṃ virocamāno nisīda ekaggo sukhasamappito hutvā,
atk-s0302a:316_14: tattha te nisinnassa tiṇādīnaṃ khayena sayameva ayaṃ aggi appaṇṇattibhāvaṃ gamissatī”ti.
atk-s0302a:316_16: Tatheva ca tattha nisinnassa so aggi upādānakkhayena appaṇṇattibhāvaṃ gaccheyya.
atk-s0302a:317_0: Evameva khoti ettha pana idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ –
atk-s0302a:317_1: cattālīsāya kaṭṭhavāhānaṃ jalamāno mahāaggikkhandho viya hi tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:317_4: tena purisena tassa dinnaovādo viya tathāgatena “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0302a:317_6: evaṃ vaṭṭadukkhā muccissasī”ti tassa tebhūmakadhammesu kammaṭṭhānassa kathitakālo,
atk-s0302a:317_7: tassa purisassa yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitvā pāsāde nisinnakālo viya yogino sugatovādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0302a:317_8: suññāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassa tebhūmakadhammesu vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā anukkamena yathānurūpaṃ āhārasappāyādiṃ labhitvā,
atk-s0302a:317_10: tassa nhānavilepanādīhi sudhotamaṇḍitakāyattā tasmiṃ nisinnassa ekaggasukhasamappitakālo viya yogino
atk-s0302a:317_11: ariyamaggapokkharaṇiyaṃ maggañāṇodakena sunhātasudhotakilesamalassa hirottappasāṭake nivāsetvā sīlavilepanānulittassa
atk-s0302a:317_12: arahattamaṇḍanena attabhāvaṃ maṇḍetvā vimuttipupphadāmaṃ piḷandhitvā iddhipādapādukā āruyha nibbānanagaraṃ
atk-s0302a:317_13: pavisitvā dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha satipaṭṭhānamahāvīthiyaṃ virocamānassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0302a:317_15: Tassa pana purisassa tasmiṃ nisinnassa tiṇādīnaṃ khayena aggikkhandhassa appaṇṇattigamanakālo viya khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0302a:317_16: yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa mahāvaṭṭavūpasamo
atk-s0302a:319_3: Telaṃ āsiñceyya vaṭṭiṃ upasaṃhareyyāti dīpapaṭijagganatthaṃ telabhājanañca mahantañca vaṭṭikapālaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0302a:319_4: samīpe niccaṃ ṭhitova tele khīṇe telaṃ āsiñceyya,
atk-s0302a:319_6: Sesamettha saddhiṃ opammasaṃsandanena purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:321_0: 54. Catutthe upamaṃ paṭhamaṃ katvā pacchā attho vutto. Sesaṃ tādisameva. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:323_1: Pañcame uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantīti pathavīrasañca āporasañca upari āropenti.
atk-s0302a:323_2: Ojāya āropitattā hatthasatubbedhassa rukkhassa aṅkuraggesu bindubindūni viya hutvā sineho tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0302a:323_6: mūlehi ojāya ārohanaṃ viya chahi dvārehi kammārohanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:323_7: ojāya abhiruḷhattā mahārukkhassa yāvakappaṭṭhānaṃ viya vaṭṭanissitabālaputhujjanassa chahi dvārehi kammaṃ
atk-s0302a:323_8: āyūhantassa aparāparaṃ vaṭṭassa vaḍḍhanavasena dīgharattaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:324_1: Khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chindeyyāti khuddakamahantāni khaṇḍākhaṇḍāni karonto chindeyya.
atk-s0302a:324_8: rukkhassa mūle chinnakālo viya yogino ācariyasantike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā manasikarontassa paññā,
atk-s0302a:324_9: khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chindanakālo viya saṅkhepato catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ manasikāro,
atk-s0302a:324_11: sakalikaṃ sakalikaṃ karaṇakālo viya upādārūpassa ceva rūpakkhandhārammaṇassa viññāṇassa cāti imesaṃ vasena nāmarūpapariggaho,
atk-s0302a:324_12: mūlānaṃ upacchedanaṃ viya tasseva nāmarūpassa paccayapariyesanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:324_13: vātātape visosetvā agginā ḍahanakālo viya anupubbena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aññataraṃ sappāyaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0302a:324_14: kammaṭṭhāne vibhūte upaṭṭhahamāne ekapallaṅke nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ karontassa aggaphalappatti,
atk-s0302a:324_15: masikaraṇaṃ viya arahattappattadivaseyeva aparinibbāyantassa yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhita kālo,
atk-s0302a:324_16: mahāvāte opunanaṃ nadiyā pavāhanaṃ viya ca upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa vaṭṭavūpasamo veditabbo. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:326_0: 56. Chaṭṭhepi upamaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā attho vutto, idameva nānattaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:328_3: Paṃsuṃ dadeyyāti thaddhapharusapaṃsuṃ haritvā mudugomayacuṇṇamissaṃ madhurapaṃsuṃ pakkhipeyya.
atk-s0302a:328_10: rukkhassa vuḍḍhiāpajjanaṃ viya puthujjanassa tīhi dvārehi kammaṃ āyūhato aparāparaṃ vaṭṭappavatti.
atk-s0302a:330_1: Dasame kurūsu viharatīti kurūti evaṃ bahuvacanavasena laddhavohāre janapade viharati.
atk-s0302a:330_2: Kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamoti evaṃnāmako kurūnaṃ nigamo,
atk-s0302a:330_6: Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti cha nisajjadose vivajjento dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalassa abhimukhaṭṭhāne chabbaṇṇānaṃ buddharasmīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:330_7: anto pavisitvā pasannalākhārasaṃ vigāhanto viya suvaṇṇapaṭaṃ pārupanto viya rattakambalavitānamajjhaṃ
atk-s0302a:330_8: pavisanto viya dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko āyasmā ānando nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:331_0: Kāya pana velāya kena kāraṇena ayamāyasmā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamantoti?
atk-s0302a:331_2: Taṃ divasaṃ kira ayamāyasmā kulasaṅgahatthāya gharadvāre gharadvāre sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ nikkhipanto viya
atk-s0302a:331_3: kammāsadhammaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto satthu vattaṃ dassetvā satthari gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe
atk-s0302a:331_4: satthāraṃ vanditvā attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gantvā antevāsikesu vattaṃ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṃ paṭisammajjitvā
atk-s0302a:331_5: cammakkhaṇḍaṃ paññapetvā udakatumbato udakena hatthapāde sītalaṃ katvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno sotāpattiphalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0302a:331_7: Atha paricchinnakālavasena samāpattito vuṭṭhāya paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāresi.
atk-s0302a:331_11: majjhato paṭṭhāya ubho ante pāpento tikkhattuṃ dvādasapadaṃ paccayākāraṃ sammasi.
atk-s0302a:331_12: Tassevaṃ sammasantassa paccayākāro vibhūto hutvā uttānakuttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:331_14: “ayaṃ paccayākāro sabbabuddhehi gambhīro ceva gambhīrāvabhāso cāti kathito,
atk-s0302a:331_15: mayhaṃ kho pana padesañāṇe ṭhitassa sāvakassa sato uttāno viya vibhūto pākaṭo hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:331_16: mayhaṃyeva nu kho esa uttānako viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:331_17: udāhu aññesampīti attano upaṭṭhānakāraṇaṃ satthu ārocessāmī”ti nisinnaṭṭhānato uṭṭhāya cammakkhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0302a:332_5: Ekañhi uttānameva gambhīrāvabhāsaṃ hoti pūtipaṇṇarasavasena kāḷavaṇṇaṃ purāṇaudakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:332_7: Ekaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānāvabhāsaṃ hoti maṇibhāsaṃ vippasannaudakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:332_9: Ekaṃ uttānaṃ uttānāvabhāsaṃ hoti pātiādīsu udakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:332_10: Ekaṃ gambhīraṃ gambhīrāvabhāsaṃ hoti sinerupādakamahāsamudde udakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:332_13: Ayañhi gambhīro ca gambhīrāvabhāso cāti ekameva nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-s0302a:332_14: Evarūpo samānopi atha ca pana me uttānakuttānako viya khāyati,
atk-s0302a:332_16: bhanteti evaṃ attano vimhayaṃ pakāsento pañhaṃ pucchitvā tuṇhībhūto nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:333_0: Bhagavā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ānando bhavaggagahaṇāya hatthaṃ pasārento viya sineruṃ bhinditvā miñjaṃ
atk-s0302a:333_1: nīharituṃ vāyamamāno viya vinā nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmo viya pathaviṃ parivattetvā pathavojaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0302a:333_2: vāyamamāno viya buddhavisayaṃ pañhaṃ attano uttānuttānanti vadati,
atk-s0302a:333_3: handassa gambhīrabhāvaṃ ācikkhāmī”ti cintetvā mā hevantiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:334_3: “Mā heva”nti ca idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ussādentopi bhaṇati apasādentopi.
atk-s0302a:334_6: tena te gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako viya khāyati,
atk-s0302a:335_1: cha māse subhojanarasapuṭṭhassa kira katayogassa mahāmallassa samajjasamaye katamallapāsāṇaparicayassa
atk-s0302a:335_6: “Ukkhipituṃ na sakkomā”ti vutte sayaṃ gantvā “kuhiṃ imassa bhāriyaṭṭhāna”nti vatvā dvīhi hatthehi dve
atk-s0302a:335_7: pāsāṇe ukkhipitvā kīḷāguḷe viya khipitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:335_8: Tattha mallassa mallapāsāṇo lahukoti na aññesampi lahukoti vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:335_9: Cha māse subhojanarasapuṭṭho mallo viya hi kappasatasahassaṃ abhinīhārasampanno āyasmā ānando.
atk-s0302a:335_11: evaṃ therassa mahāpaññatāya paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:336_0: Mahāsamudde ca timi nāma mahāmaccho dviyojanasatiko,
atk-s0302a:336_3: ānando timinando ajjhāroho mahātimīti ime cattāro yojanasahassikā.
atk-s0302a:336_5: Tassa kira dakkhiṇakaṇṇaṃ cālentassa pañcayojanasate padese udakaṃ calati,
atk-s0302a:336_9: Dve pana kaṇṇe cāletvā naṅguṭṭhena paharitvā sīsaṃ aparāparaṃ katvā kīḷituṃ āraddhassa sattaṭṭhayojanasate
atk-s0302a:336_10: ṭhāne bhājane pakkhipitvā uddhane āropitaṃ viya udakaṃ pakkuthati.
atk-s0302a:336_11: Yojanasatamatte padese udakaṃ piṭṭhiṃ chādetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0302a:336_16: Tattha kāyūpapannassa timirapiṅgalassa mahāsamuddo uttānoti aññesañca khuddakamacchānaṃ uttānoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:336_17: evameva ñāṇūpapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:336_25: tasmiṃ supaṇṇavātaṃ dassetuṃ āraddhe sattaṭṭhayojanasataṃ ṭhānaṃ nappahoti.
atk-s0302a:336_30: Tattha kāyūpapannassa supaṇṇarañño ākāso parittoti aññesañca khuddakapakkhīnaṃ parittoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:336_31: evameva ñāṇūpapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:337_0: Rāhu asurindo pana pādantato yāva kesantā yojanānaṃ cattāri sahassāni aṭṭha ca satāni honti.
atk-s0302a:337_9: Tassa mahāsamuddaṃ otiṇṇassa gambhīraṃ udakaṃ jāṇuppamāṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:337_14: Tattha kāyūpapannassa rāhuno mahāsamuddo uttānoti aññesañca uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:337_15: Evameva ñāṇūpapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:337_16: Etamatthaṃ sandhāya bhagavā mā hevaṃ, ānanda, mā hevaṃ,
atk-s0302a:338_0: Therassa hi catūhi kāraṇehi gambhīro paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:339_0: Ito kira satasahassime kappe padumuttaro nāma satthā loke uppajji.
atk-s0302a:339_5: So puttassa jātadivase mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamma pabbajitvā padhānamanuyutto anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā,
atk-s0302a:339_6: “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti udānaṃ udānetvā sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅke vītināmetvā “pathaviyaṃ pādaṃ ṭhapessāmī”ti pādaṃ abhinīhari.
atk-s0302a:339_7: Atha pathaviṃ bhinditvā mahantaṃ padumaṃ uṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:340_4: Tassa ekādasahatthena pādena dvādasahatthāya kaṇṇikāya akkantamattāya navaghaṭappamāṇā reṇu uṭṭhāya aṭṭhapaññāsahatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:340_7: Tassa devilo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0302a:340_8: amitā ca asamā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0302a:340_10: Padumuttaro bhagavā pitusaṅgahaṃ kurumāno bhikkhusatasahassaparivāro haṃsavatiyā rājadhāniyā vasati.
atk-s0302a:341_1: Tassa rājā haṃsavatito vīsayojanasate bhogaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0302a:341_2: So kadāci āgantvā pitarañca satthārañca passati.
atk-s0302a:341_9: Rājā tuṭṭho “sīghaṃ mama putto āgacchatū”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:341_12: “mayhaṃ pitā tuṭṭho sace me varaṃ deti,
atk-s0302a:341_22: tasmā deve varaṃ dadamāne temāsaṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ varaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0302a:341_30: bhagavantaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanto jīvitaṃ avañjhaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:341_31: idaṃ me varaṃ dehī”ti āha. Na sakkā, tāta,
atk-s0302a:341_39: ahaṃ bhagavato cittaṃ jānissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:342_0: Tena ca samayena bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0302a:342_1: So maṇḍalamāḷe sannisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:342_8: icchiticchitakkhaṇe satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmā”ti. Ko pana, bhante,
atk-s0302a:342_17: rājaputtā”ti taṃ gahetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe ṭhapetvā gandhakuṭiṃ āruhi.
atk-s0302a:342_28: bhikkhū pana “na mayaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmā”ti maṃ therassa santikaṃ pāhesuṃ,
atk-s0302a:342_29: thero pana ekavacaneneva dassesi, thero, bhante,
atk-s0302a:342_32: vallabho esa bhikkhu mayhaṃ sāsaneti. Bhante,
atk-s0302a:342_33: buddhānaṃ sāsane kiṃ katvā vallabho hotīti?
atk-s0302a:342_34: Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā, kumārāti.
atk-s0302a:342_35: Bhagavā ahampi thero viya buddhasāsane vallabho hotukāmo,
atk-s0302a:342_37: “atthi nu kho gatena attho”ti oloketvā “atthī”ti disvā “suññāgāre kho,
atk-s0302a:342_43: mayā pesite bhikkhusatasahassena saddhiṃ āgacchathā”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā pitu santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0302a:342_46: mayā pahite tumhe bhagavantaṃ peseyyāthā”ti pitaraṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā yojane yojane vihāraṃ kāretvā vīsayojanasataṃ addhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:342_47: Gantvā attano nagare vihāraṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sobhanassa nāma kuṭumbikassa uyyānaṃ disvā satasahassena kiṇitvā satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā vihāraṃ kāresi.
atk-s0302a:342_49: sesabhikkhūnañca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānatthāya kuṭileṇamaṇḍape kārāpetvā pākāraparikkhepaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakañca
atk-s0302a:342_50: niṭṭhāpetvā pitu santikaṃ pesesi “niṭṭhitaṃ mayhaṃ kiccaṃ,
atk-s0302a:343_0: Rājā bhagavantaṃ bhojetvā “bhagavā sumanassa kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:343_2: Bhagavā satasahassabhikkhuparivāro yojane yojane vihāresu vasamāno agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:343_3: Kumāro “satthā āgacchatī”ti sutvā yojanaṃ paccuggantvā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamāno vihāraṃ pavesetvā –
atk-s0302a:346_1: So vassūpanāyikadivase dānaṃ datvā attano puttadāre ca amacce ca pakkosāpetvā āha –“satthā amhākaṃ santikaṃ dūrato āgato,
atk-s0302a:346_4: Tasmā ahaṃ imaṃ temāsaṃ dve sāṭake nivāsetvā dasa sīlāni samādiyitvā idheva vasissāmi,
atk-s0302a:346_5: tumhe khīṇāsavasatasahassassa imināva nīhārena temāsaṃ dānaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0302a:347_0: So sumanattherassa vasanaṭṭhānasabhāgeyeva ṭhāne vasanto yaṃ thero bhagavato vattaṃ karoti,
atk-s0302a:347_4: upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase bhikkhūsatasahassassa
atk-s0302a:347_6: yadetaṃ mayā magge yojanantarikavihārakārāpanato paṭṭhāya puññaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0302a:347_10: Tasmā ahampi bhagavā anāgate sumanatthero viya ekassa buddhassa upaṭṭhāko homī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena patitvā vanditvā nipanno.
atk-s0302a:347_14: “anāgate ito satasahassime kappe gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0302a:349_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0302a:350_1: Kumāro sutvā “buddhā nāma advejjhakathā hontī”ti dutiyadivaseyeva tassa bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchanto viya ahosi.
atk-s0302a:350_2: So tasmiṃ buddhuppāde vassasatasahassaṃ dānaṃ datvā sagge nibbattitvā kassapabuddhakālepi piṇḍāya carato
atk-s0302a:350_3: therassa pattaggahaṇatthaṃ uttarisāṭakaṃ datvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0302a:350_4: Puna sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasirājā hutvā aṭṭhannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ paṇṇasālāyo kāretvā maṇiādhārake
atk-s0302a:350_5: upaṭṭhapetvā catūhi paccayehi dasavassasahassāni upaṭṭhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0302a:351_0: Kappasatasahassaṃ pana dānaṃ dadamānova amhākaṃ bodhisattena saddhiṃ tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cuto
atk-s0302a:351_1: amitodanasakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā anupubbena katābhinikkhamano sammāsambodhiṃ patvā paṭhamagamanena
atk-s0302a:351_2: kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā tato nikkhamante bhagavati bhagavato parivāratthaṃ rājakumāresu pabbajantesu bhaddiyādīhi
atk-s0302a:351_3: saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa santike
atk-s0302a:351_6: tassimāya pubbūpanissayasampattiyā gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:352_0: Titthavāsoti pana garūnaṃ santike uggahaṇasavanaparipucchanadhāraṇāni vuccanti.
atk-s0302a:352_3: Sotāpannānañca nāma paccayākāro uttānako hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:352_5: Bahussutānaṃ catuhatthe ovarake padīpe jalamāne mañcapīṭhaṃ viya nāmarūpaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0302a:352_7: Iti bāhusaccabhāvenapissa gambhīropi paccayākāro uttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:352_10: Sā sabbāpi therassa uttānakā viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:352_11: Tena bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ussādento mā hevantiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:352_14: tena te gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako viya khāyati.
atk-s0302a:352_15: Tasmā “mayhameva nu kho esa uttānako viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:353_2: “atha ca pana me uttānakuttānako viya khāyatī”ti mā hevaṃ avaca.
atk-s0302a:353_3: Yadi hi te esa uttānakuttānako viya khāyati,
atk-s0302a:353_4: kasmā tvaṃ attano dhammatāya sotāpanno nāhosi,
atk-s0302a:353_5: mayā dinnanaye ṭhatvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhi? Ānanda,
atk-s0302a:353_8: atha kasmā oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgānusayaṃ paṭighānusayanti ime
atk-s0302a:353_9: cattāro kilese samugghātetvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ na sacchikarosi,
atk-s0302a:353_10: teyeva aṇusahagate cattāro kilese samugghātetvā anāgāmiphalaṃ na sacchikarosi,
atk-s0302a:353_12: mānānusayaṃ bhavarāgānusayaṃ avijjānusayanti ime aṭṭha kilese samugghātetvā arahattaṃ na sacchikarosi?
atk-s0302a:353_13: Kasmā vā satasahassakappādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pūritapāramino sāriputtamoggallānā viya sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ na paṭivijjhasi,
atk-s0302a:353_14: satasahassakappādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramino paccekabuddhā viya ca paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ na paṭivijjhasi?
atk-s0302a:353_15: Yadi vā te sabbathāva esa uttānako hutvā upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:353_16: Atha kasmā satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri aṭṭha soḷasa vā asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramino buddhā viya sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ na sacchikarosi?
atk-s0302a:353_19: tvaṃ nāma sāvakapadesañāṇe ṭhito atigambhīraṃ paccayākāraṃ “uttānako viya me upaṭṭhātī”ti vadasi.
atk-s0302a:353_20: Tassa te idaṃ vacanaṃ buddhānaṃ kathāya paccanīkaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:353_21: Tādisena nāma bhikkhunā buddhānaṃ kathāya paccanīkaṃ kathetabbanti na yuttametaṃ.
atk-s0302a:353_23: imaṃ paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantasseva kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkantāni.
atk-s0302a:353_24: Paccayākārapaṭivijjhanatthāya ca pana me adinnadānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0302a:353_26: “Ajja paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhissāmī”ti pana me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ vidhamantassa ayaṃ mahāpathavī dvaṅgulamattampi nākampi,
atk-s0302a:353_30: “avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ navahi ākārehi paccayo hotī”ti diṭṭhamatteyeva dasasahassilokadhātu ayadaṇḍena ākoṭitakaṃsathālo
atk-s0302a:353_31: viya viravasataṃ viravasahassaṃ muñcamānā vātāhate paduminipaṇṇe udakabindu viya pakampittha.
atk-s0302a:354_4: Yathā nāma dunnikkhittaṃ mūsikacchinnaṃ pesakārānaṃ tantaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ ākulaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:354_7: mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaraṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:354_8: Evameva sattā imasmiṃ paccayākāre khalitā ākulā byākulā honti,
atk-s0302a:354_10: Tattha tantaṃ paccattapurisakāre ṭhatvā sakkāpi bhaveyya ujuṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:354_11: ṭhapetvā pana dve bodhisatte añño satto attano dhammatāya paccayākāraṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:354_12: Yathā pana ākulaṃ tantaṃ kañjiyaṃ datvā kocchena pahaṭaṃ tattha tattha guḷakajātaṃ hoti gaṇṭhibaddhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:354_13: evamime sattā paccayesu pakkhalitvā paccaye ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontā dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatavasena guḷakajātā honti gaṇṭhibaddhā.
atk-s0302a:354_15: sabbe te paccayaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontāyeva.
atk-s0302a:355_3: Yathā hi tadubhayampi ākulaṃ aggena vā aggaṃ,
atk-s0302a:355_4: mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaranti purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:356_0: Muñjapabbajabhūtāti muñjatiṇaṃ viya pabbajatiṇaṃ viya ca bhūtā tādisā jātā.
atk-s0302a:356_1: Yathā hi tāni tiṇāni koṭṭetvā katarajju jiṇṇakāle katthaci patitaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ tiṇānaṃ “idaṃ aggaṃ,
atk-s0302a:356_4: tampi paccattapurisakāre ṭhatvā sakkā bhaveyya ujuṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:356_5: ṭhapetvā pana dve bodhisatte añño satto attano dhammatāya paccayākāraṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0302a:356_6: evamayaṃ pajā paccayaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontī diṭṭhigatavasena gaṇṭhikajātā hutvā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattati.

atk-s0302a:360_3: sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu mahāsamudde vātakkhittā nāvā viya yante yuttagoṇo viya ca
atk-s0302a:360_5: Iti sabbametaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ apasādento āha.
atk-s0302a:364_2: Puthujjanoti puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādikāraṇehi puthujjano.
atk-s0302a:364_5: Apica puthūnaṃ gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjano,
atk-s0302a:364_6: puthu vā ayaṃ visuṃyeva saṅkhaṃ gato,
atk-s0302a:364_8: Evametehi “assutavā puthujjano”ti dvīhipi padehi ye te –
atk-s0302a:367_3: Cātumahābhūtikasminti catumahābhūtakāye catumahābhūtehi nibbatte catumahābhūtamayeti attho.
atk-s0302a:368_0: Tasmāti yasmā ime cattāro vuḍḍhihāninibbattibhedā paññāyanti,
atk-s0302a:368_2: Iti bhagavā cātumahābhūtike kāye rūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ ayuttarūpaṃ katvā arūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ yuttarūpaṃ karoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:368_3: Tesañhi bhikkhūnaṃ rūpasmiṃ gāho balavā adhimatto,
atk-s0302a:368_4: tena tesaṃ rūpe gāhassa pariggahetabbarūpataṃ dassetvā nikkaḍḍhanto arūpe patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ evamāha.
atk-s0302a:369_1: Tañhi cittavatthutāya cittagocaratāya sampayuttadhammacittatāya ca cittaṃ,
atk-s0302a:370_2: Paṭhamañhi tena rūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ ayuttarūpaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0302a:370_4: atha “tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpato gāho nikkhamitvā arūpaṃ gato”ti ñatvā taṃ nikkaḍḍhituṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:370_8: Kiṃ atirekavassasataṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ rūpaṃ nāma atthi?
atk-s0302a:370_9: Nanu paṭhamavaye pavattaṃ rūpaṃ majjhimavayaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0302a:370_23: tattha tattheva odhi odhi pabbaṃ pabbaṃ hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya paṭapaṭāyantā saṅkhārā bhijjantīti?

atk-s0302a:371_0: Rattiyā ca divasassa cāti rattimhi ca divase ca.
atk-s0302a:371_3: aññaṃ nirujjhatīti yaṃ rattiṃ uppajjati ca nirujjhati ca,
atk-s0302a:371_4: tato aññadeva divā uppajjati ca nirujjhati cāti attho.
atk-s0302a:371_6: anuppannameva aññaṃ nirujjhatīti evaṃ pana attho na gahetabbo.
atk-s0302a:371_7: “Rattiyā ca divasassa cā”ti idaṃ purimapaveṇito parittakaṃ paveṇiṃ gahetvā paveṇivaseneva vuttaṃ,
atk-s0302a:371_8: ekarattiṃ pana ekadivasaṃ vā ekameva cittaṃ ṭhātuṃ samatthaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:372_4: ekaccharākkhaṇe pavattassa cittassa ettakā vīhī lakkhaṃ ṭhapīyamānā parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyu”nti.
atk-s0302a:373_2: taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhātīti iminā na so gaṇhitabbasākhaṃ alabhitvā bhūmiṃ otarati.
atk-s0302a:373_3: Atha kho tasmiṃ mahāvane vicaranto taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhantoyeva caratīti ayamattho dassito.
atk-s0302a:374_2: Tasmiṃ vane vicaraṇamakkaṭo viya ārammaṇavane uppajjanakacittaṃ.
atk-s0302a:374_4: Yathā so araññe vicaranto makkaṭo taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ pahāya taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0302a:374_5: evamidaṃ ārammaṇavane vicarantaṃ cittampi kadāci rūpārammaṇaṃ gahetvā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:374_11: Yathā ca so araññe vicaranto makkaṭo sākhaṃ alabhitvā oruyha bhūmiyaṃ nisinnoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:374_13: evameva ārammaṇavane vicarantaṃ cittampi ekaṃ olubbhārammaṇaṃ alabhitvā uppannanti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:374_14: ekajātiyaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ gahetvāva uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:374_15: Ettāvatā ca pana bhagavatā rūpato nīharitvā arūpe gāho patiṭṭhāpito,
atk-s0302a:375_5: athassa visaṃ harissāmīti cheko bhisakko āgantvā vamanaṃ kāretvā heṭṭhā garuḷo,
atk-s0302a:375_6: upari nāgoti mantaṃ parivattetvā visaṃ upari āropesi.
atk-s0302a:375_7: So yāva akkhippadesā āruḷhabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ito paraṃ abhiruhituṃ na dassāmi,
atk-s0302a:375_9: heṭṭhā nāgoti mantaṃ parivattetvā kaṇṇe dhumetvā daṇḍakena paharitvā visaṃ otāretvā daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:375_10: Tatrassa ṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā agadalepena visaṃ nimmathetvā nhāpetvā “sukhī hohī”ti vatvā yenakāmaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0302a:376_0: Tattha āsīvisena daṭṭhassa kāye visapatiṭṭhānaṃ viya imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpe adhimattagāhakālo,
atk-s0302a:376_2: mantaṃ parivattetvā upari visassa āropitakālo viya tathāgatena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpato gāhaṃ nīharitvā arūpe patiṭṭhāpitakālo,
atk-s0302a:376_3: yāva akkhippadesā āruḷhavisassa upari abhiruhituṃ adatvā puna mantabalena otāretvā daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapanaṃ
atk-s0302a:376_4: viya satthārā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ arūpato gāhaṃ nīharitvā rūpe patiṭṭhāpitakālo.
atk-s0302a:376_5: Daṭṭhaṭṭhāne ṭhitassa visassa agadalepena nimmathanaṃ viya ubhayato gāhaṃ nīharaṇatthāya imissā desanāya āraddhakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:376_6: Tattha nibbindaṃ virajjatīti iminā maggo kathito,
atk-s0302a:378_3: Nanu ca cakkhusamphasso sukhavedanāya paccayo na hotīti?
atk-s0302a:378_14: Tejo abhinibbattatīti aggicuṇṇo nikkhamatīti na gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:380_10: Sabbadisāsu hissa yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahoghaṃ viya sabbapāramiyo “ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ
atk-s0302a:380_17: Sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ
atk-s0302a:380_18: āhacca tiṭṭhanti ceva anuppavattanti ca andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya.

atk-s0302a:382_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvara-
atk-s0302a:383_1: etarahi saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0302a:383_2: aññaṃ ekasaṅghampi samanupassāmi evaṃ lābhaggayasaggapattaṃ yatharivāyaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0302a:384_0: Svāyaṃ bhagavato ca saṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṃ mahānadīnaṃ udakaṃ viya appameyyo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:384_4: Kiṃ nu kho bhikkhū āhārapariggāhakena satisampajaññena samannāgatā majjhattā nicchandarāgā hutvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjituṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0302a:385_0: So addasa ekacce adhunā pabbajite kulaputte apaccavekkhitvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjamāne.
atk-s0302a:385_2: “mayā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūrentena na cīvarādihetu pūritā,
atk-s0302a:385_4: Imepi bhikkhū mama santike pabbajantā na cīvarādihetu pabbajitā,
atk-s0302a:385_6: Te idāni asārameva sāraṃ anatthameva ca atthaṃ karontī”ti evamassa dhammasaṃvego udapādi.
atk-s0302a:385_9: apaccavekkhitāhāraparibhogo pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ katvā paññapetabbo bhaveyya.
atk-s0302a:385_12: Yathā pana kathite pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ viya naṃ passissanti.
atk-s0302a:385_14: yaṃ āvajjitvā āvajjitvā anāgate bhikkhū cattāro paccaye paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjissantī”ti.
atk-s0302a:386_0: Cattāro pana āhāre vitthāretvā idāni tesu ādīnavaṃ dassetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0302a:386_3: Tattha jāyampatikāti jāyā ceva pati ca.
atk-s0302a:386_4: Parittaṃ sambalanti puṭabhattasattumodakādīnaṃ aññataraṃ appamattakaṃ pātheyyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:386_7: Kantāranti corakantāraṃ vāḷakantāraṃ amanussakantāraṃ nirudakakantāraṃ appabhakkhakantāranti pañcavidhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:386_12: Yattha balavāmukhayakkhiniādīnaṃ amanussānaṃ vasena bhayaṃ atthi,
atk-s0302a:386_14: Yattha pātuṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā udakaṃ natthi,
atk-s0302a:386_16: Yattha khāditabbaṃ vā bhuñjitabbaṃ vā antamaso kandamūlādimattampi natthi,
atk-s0302a:386_22: Idha pana nirudakaṃ appabhakkhaṃ yojanasatikakantāraṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0302a:386_24: Paṭipajjeyyunti chātakabhayena ceva rogabhayena ca rājabhayena ca upaddutā paṭipajjeyyuṃ “etaṃ kantāraṃ
atk-s0302a:386_25: nittharitvā dhammikassa rañño nirupaddave raṭṭhe sukhaṃ vasissāmā”ti maññamānā.
atk-s0302a:387_0: Ekaputtakoti ukkhipitvā gahito anukampitabbayutto athirasarīro ekaputtako.
atk-s0302a:388_0: Ayaṃ panettha bhūtamatthaṃ katvā ādito paṭṭhāya saṅkhepato atthavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0302a:388_1: dve kira jāyampatikā puttaṃ gahetvā parittena pātheyyena yojanasatikaṃ kantāramaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:388_5: “bhadde ito samantā paññāsayojanāni gāmo vā nigamo vā natthi.
atk-s0302a:388_6: Tasmā yaṃ taṃ purisena kātabbaṃ bahumpi kasigorakkhādikammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:388_7: na dāni sakkā taṃ mayā kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:388_8: ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti.
atk-s0302a:388_10: “sāmi mayā dāni yaṃ taṃ itthiyā kātabbaṃ bahumpi suttakantanādikammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:388_12: ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti.
atk-s0302a:388_15: Na hi mando kumāro mātarā vinā jīvituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0302a:388_30: “mayā puttaṃ patthentiyā govatakukkuravatadevatāyācanādīhipi tāva anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0302a:388_32: Na sakkomi ahaṃ puttaṃ māretu”nti vatvā “tāta,
atk-s0302a:388_35: Te taṃ disvā paridevitvā vuttanayena maṃsāni gahetvā khādantā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:389_0: Tesaṃ so puttamaṃsāhāro navahi kāraṇehi paṭikūlattā neva davāya hoti,
atk-s0302a:389_6: Sajātimaṃsatāya ñātimaṃsatāya puttamaṃsatāya piyaputtamaṃsatāya taruṇamaṃsatāya āmakamaṃsatāya abhogamaṃsatāya aloṇatāya adhūpitatāyāti.
atk-s0302a:389_7: Evañhi te navahi kāraṇehi paṭikūlaṃ taṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādantā na sārattā giddhamānasā hutvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:389_9: Na aṭṭhinhārucammanissitaṭṭhānāni apanetvā thūlathūlaṃ varamaṃsameva khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:389_12: thokaṃ thokaṃ pana ekadivasaṃ yāpanamattameva khādiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:389_15: Na aññaṃ kiñci migamaṃsaṃ vā moramaṃsādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ khādāmāti sammūḷhā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:389_17: Na “aho vata mayaṃ punapi evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādeyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ katvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:389_19: Na “ettakaṃ kantāre khāditvā avasiṭṭhaṃ kantāraṃ atikkamma loṇambilādīhi yojetvā khādissāmā”ti sannidhiṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0302a:389_20: kantārapariyosāne pana “pure mahājano passatī”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā nikhaṇiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:389_22: Na “koci añño amhe viya evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādituṃ na labhatī”ti mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akaṃsu,
atk-s0302a:389_24: “Kiṃ iminā aloṇena anambilena adhūpitena duggandhenā”ti na hīḷetvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:389_26: Na “tuyhaṃ bhāgo mayhaṃ bhāgo tava putto mama putto”ti aññamaññaṃ atimaññiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:389_28: Imaṃ nesaṃ evarūpaṃ nicchandarāgādiparibhogaṃ sampassamāno satthā bhikkhusaṅghampi taṃ kāraṇaṃ anujānāpento taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
atk-s0302a:389_30: api nu te davāya vā āhāraṃ āhāreyyuntiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:390_0: Evameva khoti navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasena piyaputtamaṃsasadiso katvā daṭṭhabboti attho.
atk-s0302a:390_6: tāni panetāni gamanapāṭikulyatādīni visuddhimagge āhārapāṭikulyatāniddese vitthāritāneva.
atk-s0302a:390_7: Iti imesaṃ navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasena puttamaṃsūpamaṃ katvā āhāro paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:391_0: Yathā te jāyampatikā pāṭikulyaṃ piyaputtamaṃsaṃ khādantā na sārattā giddhamānasā hutvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:391_3: Yathā ca te na aṭṭhinhārucammanissitaṃ apanetvā thūlathūlaṃ varamaṃsameva khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:391_5: evaṃ sukkhabhattamandabyañjanādīni piṭṭhihatthena apaṭikkhipitvā vaṭṭakena viya kukkuṭena viya ca odhiṃ
atk-s0302a:391_6: adassetvā tato tato sappimaṃsādisaṃsaṭṭhavarabhojanaṃyeva vicinitvā abhuñjantena sīhena viya sapadānaṃ
atk-s0302a:392_0: Yathā ca te na yāvadatthaṃ kaṇṭhappamāṇaṃ khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:392_1: thokaṃ thokaṃ pana ekekadivasaṃ yāpanamattameva khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:392_2: evameva āharahatthakādibrāhmaṇānaṃ aññatarena viya yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ abhuñjantena catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ
atk-s0302a:392_3: vā ālopānaṃ okāsaṃ ṭhapetvāva dhammasenāpatinā viya paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:392_4: So kira pañcacattālīsa vassāni tiṭṭhamāno “pacchābhatte ambiluggārasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ katvā ekadivasampi āhāraṃ
atk-s0302a:392_5: na āhāresi”nti vatvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0302a:395_0: Yathā ca te na aññamaññaṃ maccharāyantā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:395_2: evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā amaccharāyitvā “imaṃ sabbaṃ gaṇhantassa sabbaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0302a:395_6: Yathā ca te na “aññaṃ kiñci mayaṃ migamaṃsaṃ vā moramaṃsādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ khādāmā”ti sammūḷhā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:395_8: evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā “ahaṃ khādāmi bhuñjāmī”ti attūpaladdhisammohaṃ anuppādetvā “kabaḷīkārāhāro na jānāti ‘cātumahābhūtikakāyaṃ vaḍḍhemī’ti,
atk-s0302a:396_0: Yathā ca te na “aho vata mayaṃ punapi evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādeyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ katvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:396_2: evameva paṇītabhojanaṃ laddhā ‘aho vatāhaṃ svepi punadivasepi evarūpaṃ labheyyaṃ’,
atk-s0302a:396_3: lūkhaṃ vā pana laddhā “hiyyo viya me ajja paṇītabhojanaṃ na laddha”nti patthanaṃ vā anusocanaṃ vā akatvā nittaṇhena –
