atk-s0302a:400_1: kantārapariyosāne pana “pure mahājano passatī”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā nikhaṇiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:405_0: Imaṃ ovādaṃ anussarantena catūsu paccayesu yaṃ yaṃ labhati,
atk-s0302a:405_2: sesaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ vissajjetvā sannidhiṃ parivajjantena paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:405_3: Yathā ca te na “koci añño amhe viya evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādituṃ na labhatī”ti mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akaṃsu,
atk-s0302a:405_5: evameva paṇītabhojanaṃ labhitvā “ahamasmi lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātādīna”nti na māno vā dappo vā kātabbo.
atk-s0302a:405_7: arahattahetu panāyaṃ pabbajjā”ti paccavekkhitvā nihatamānadappeneva paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:406_0: Yathā ca te “kiṃ iminā aloṇena anambilena adhūpitena duggandhenā”ti hīḷetvā na khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:406_2: evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā “kiṃ iminā assagoṇabhattasadisena lūkhena nirasena,
atk-s0302a:406_3: suvānadoṇiyaṃ taṃ pakkhipathā”ti evaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vā “ko imaṃ bhuñjissati,
atk-s0302a:406_4: kākasunakhādīnaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ dāyakaṃ vā ahīḷentena –
atk-s0302a:408_0: Appaṃ dānaṃ na hīḷeyya, dātāraṃ nāvajāniyā”ti. ; –
atk-s0302a:409_3: tava putto mama putto”ti aññamaññaṃ atimaññiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:409_6: evamevaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā yathā ekacco “ko tumhādisānaṃ dassati nikkāraṇā ummāresu pakkhalantānaṃ
atk-s0302a:409_7: āhiṇḍantānaṃ vijātamātāpi vo dātabbaṃ na maññati,
atk-s0302a:409_8: mayaṃ pana gatagataṭṭhāne paṇītāni cīvarādīni labhāmā”ti sīlavante sabrahmacārī atimaññati,
atk-s0302a:410_0: “So tena lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññati.
atk-s0302a:411_0: Evaṃ kañci anatimaññitvā sabbehi sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ samaggena sammodamānena hutvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:412_0: Pariññāteti ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññāti imāhi tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:412_1: Idha bhikkhu “kabaḷīkārāhāro nāma ayaṃ savatthukavasena ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:412_6: Iti ojaṭṭhamakaṃ jivhāpasādo tassa paccayāni mahābhūtānīti ime dhammā rūpakkhandho nāma,
atk-s0302a:412_7: taṃ pariggaṇhato uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā cattāro arūpakkhandhā.
atk-s0302a:412_8: Iti sabbepime pañcakkhandhā saṅkhepato nāmarūpamattaṃ hotī”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0302a:412_9: So te dhamme sarasalakkhaṇato vavatthapetvā tesaṃ paccayaṃ pariyesanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passati.
atk-s0302a:412_10: Ettāvatānena kabaḷīkārāhāramukhena sappaccayassa nāmarūpassa yāthāvato diṭṭhattā kabaḷīkārāhāro ñātapariññāya pariññāto hoti.
atk-s0302a:412_11: So tadeva sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena sammasati.
atk-s0302a:412_13: Tasmiṃyeva nāmarūpe chandarāgāvakaḍḍhanena anāgāmimaggena parijānatā pahānapariññāya pariññāto hotīti.
atk-s0302a:413_1: Ettha pana tisso pariññā ekapariññā sabbapariññā mūlapariññāti.
atk-s0302a:413_4: tena pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññātova hotīti. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:413_6: Sāyeva hi taṇhā cakkhudvāre uppannā rūparāgo nāma hoti,
atk-s0302a:413_8: Iti yathā ekasseva corassa pañcamagge hanato ekasmiṃ magge gahetvā sīse chinne pañcapi maggā khemā honti,
atk-s0302a:413_9: evaṃ jivhādvāre rasataṇhāya pariññātāya pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññāto hotīti ayaṃ ekapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:414_1: Patte pakkhittapiṇḍapātasmiñhi ekasmiṃyeva pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo labbhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:414_2: Parisuddhaṃ tāvassa vaṇṇaṃ olokayato rūparāgo hoti,
atk-s0302a:414_3: uṇhe sappimhi tattha āsiñcante paṭapaṭāti saddo uṭṭhahati,
atk-s0302a:414_4: tathārūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā khādantassa murumurūti saddo uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:414_9: Iti imasmiṃ āhāre satisampajaññena pariggahetvā nicchandarāgaparibhogena paribhutte sabbopi so pariññāto hotīti ayaṃ sabbapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:415_3: Brāhmaṇatissabhaye kira dvādasa vassāni jāyampatikānaṃ upanijjhānacittaṃ nāma nāhosi. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:415_5: Bhaye pana vūpasante yojanasatiko tambapaṇṇidīpo dārakānaṃ jātamaṅgalehi ekamaṅgalo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:415_6: Iti mūlabhūte āhāre pariññāte pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññātova hotīti ayaṃ mūlapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:416_0: Natthi taṃ saṃyojananti tena rāgena saddhiṃ pahānekaṭṭhatāya pahīnattā natthi.
atk-s0302a:416_2: “Ettakena pana mā vosānaṃ āpajjiṃsū”ti etesaṃyeva rūpādīnaṃ vasena pañcasu khandhesu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yāva arahattā kathetuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0302a:417_0: Dutiye niccammāti khurato paṭṭhāya yāva siṅgamūlā sakalasarīrato uddālitacammā kiṃsukarāsivaṇṇā.
atk-s0302a:417_1: Kasmā pana aññaṃ hatthiassagoṇādiupamaṃ agahetvā niccammagāvūpamā gahitāti?
atk-s0302a:417_3: Mātugāmo hi uppannaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ titikkhituṃ adhivāsetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:417_4: evameva phassāhāro abalo dubbaloti dassanatthaṃ sadisameva upamaṃ āhari.
atk-s0302a:417_11: Sā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne taṃ taṃṭhānasannissayamūlikaṃ pāṇakhādanabhayaṃ sampassamānā neva attano sakkārasammānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:417_13: evameva bhikkhu phassāhāramūlakaṃ kilesapāṇakakhādanabhayaṃ sampassamāno tebhūmakaphassena anatthiko hoti.
atk-s0302a:418_8: tesaṃ vatthārammaṇāni rūpakkhandho”ti evaṃ sappaccayassa nāmarūpassa yāthāvato dassanaṃ ñātapariññā.
atk-s0302a:418_9: Tattheva tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccādito tulanaṃ tīraṇapariññā.
atk-s0302a:418_10: Tasmiṃyeva pana nāmarūpe chandarāganikkaḍḍhano arahattamaggo pahānapariññā.
atk-s0302a:418_11: Tisso vedanāti evaṃ phassāhāre tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte tisso vedanā pariññātāva honti tammūlakattā taṃsampayuttattā ca.
atk-s0302a:418_12: Iti phassāhāravasena desanā yāva arahattā kathitā.
atk-s0302a:419_0: Tatiye aṅgārakāsūti aṅgārānaṃ kāsu. Kāsūti rāsipi vuccati āvāṭopi.
atk-s0302a:426_4: Jālāya vā hi dhūme vā sati vāto samuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:427_4: Tesaṃ taṃ purisaṃ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuṃ upakaḍḍhanakālo viya puthujjanassa kammāyūhanakālo.
atk-s0302a:427_6: Aṅgārakāsunidānaṃ dukkhaṃ viya kammanidānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:428_2: Tisso taṇhāti kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti imā pariññātā honti. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:428_4: Na hi hetumhi appahīne phalaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0302a:428_5: Iti manosañcetanāhāravasenapi yāva arahattā desanā kathitā.
atk-s0302a:429_1: Kathaṃ so purisoti so puriso kathaṃbhūto,
atk-s0302a:430_4: āgucāriṃ purisaṃ “tīhi sattisatehi hanathā”ti raññā āṇattakālo viya kammaraññā vaṭṭasannissitaputhujjanaṃ gahetvā paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanakālo.
atk-s0302a:430_5: Tattha kiñcāpi tīṇi sattisatāni viya paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:430_9: dinnāya pana paṭisandhiyā pavatte vipākadukkhaṃ sattipahaṭavaṇamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0302a:431_3: Viññāṇasmiñhi pariññāte taṃ pariññātameva hoti tammūlakattā sahuppannattā ca.
atk-s0302a:431_4: Iti viññāṇāhāravasenapi yāva arahattā desanā kathitāti.
atk-s0302a:433_5: Patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ virūḷhanti kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāya patiṭṭhitañceva virūḷhañca.
atk-s0302a:433_8: Atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhīti idaṃ imasmiṃ vipākavaṭṭe ṭhitassa āyativaṭṭahetuke saṅkhāre sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:433_9: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti atthi.
atk-s0302a:434_3: Yathā rajakacittakārā parisuddhesu phalakādīsu rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti,
atk-s0302a:434_5: Tattha yathā akusalena cittakārena samuṭṭhāpitaṃ rūpaṃ virūpaṃ hoti dussaṇṭhitaṃ amanāpaṃ,
atk-s0302a:434_6: evameva ekacco kammaṃ karonto ñāṇavippayuttena cittena karoti,
atk-s0302a:434_7: taṃ kammaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ sampattiṃ adatvā dubbaṇṇaṃ dussaṇṭhitaṃ mātāpitūnampi amanāpaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0302a:434_8: Yathā pana kusalena cittakārena samuṭṭhāpitaṃ rūpaṃ surūpaṃ hoti susaṇṭhitaṃ manāpaṃ,
atk-s0302a:434_9: evameva ekacco kammaṃ karonto ñāṇasampayuttena cittena karoti,
atk-s0302a:434_10: taṃ kammaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ sampattiṃ datvā suvaṇṇaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ viya rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0302a:435_0: Ettha ca āhāraṃ viññāṇena saddhiṃ saṅkhipitvā āhāranāmarūpānaṃ antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:435_1: vipākavidhiṃ nāmarūpena saṅkhipitvā nāmarūpasaṅkhārānaṃ antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:435_2: saṅkhārānañca āyatibhavassa ca antare eko sandhīti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:436_2: Evameva khoti ettha khīṇāsavassa kammaṃ sūriyarasmisamaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:436_4: sā kevalaṃ patiṭṭhāya abhāvena appatiṭṭhā nāma jātā,
atk-s0302a:436_7: tehi pana katakammaṃ kusalākusalaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-s0302a:436_9: Evamassa kammaṃ natthitāya eva appatiṭṭhaṃ nāma jātanti.
atk-s0302a:438_1: Pañcame nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇanti ettha “saṅkhāresu sati viññāṇa”nti ca “avijjāya sati saṅkhārā”ti ca vattabbaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0302a:438_4: tehi saddhiṃ ayaṃ vipassanā na ghaṭīyati.
atk-s0302a:439_0: Nanu ca avijjāsaṅkhāresu adiṭṭhesu na sakkā buddhena bhavitunti.
atk-s0302a:439_3: Tasmā yathā nāma godhaṃ anubandhanto puriso taṃ kūpaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ disvā otaritvā paviṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā godhaṃ gahetvā pakkameyya,
atk-s0302a:439_6: Evaṃ mahāpurisopi godhaṃ anubandhanto puriso viya bodhipallaṅke nisinno jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya “imassa ayaṃ paccayo,
atk-s0302a:439_7: imassa ayaṃ paccayo”ti pariyesanto yāva nāmarūpadhammānaṃ paccayaṃ disvā tassapi paccayaṃ pariyesanto viññāṇameva addasa.
atk-s0302a:439_9: parato tucchakūpassa abhinnaṭṭhānaṃ viya avijjāsaṅkhāradvayaṃ atthi,
atk-s0302a:439_10: tadetaṃ heṭṭhā vipassanāya gahitattā pāṭiyekkaṃ sammasanūpagaṃ na hotīti na aggahesi.
atk-s0302a:440_7: Ettāvatā jāyetha vātiādīsu viññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honte,
atk-s0302a:440_9: dvīsupi aññamaññapaccayesu hontesu ettakena jāyetha vā upapajjetha vā.
atk-s0302a:440_10: Ito hi paraṃ kimaññaṃ jāyetha vā upapajjetha vā,
atk-s0302a:440_11: nanu etadeva jāyati ca upapajjati cāti?
atk-s0302a:441_0: Evaṃ saddhiṃ aparāparacutipaṭisandhīhi pañca padāni dassetvā puna taṃ ettāvatāti vuttamatthaṃ niyyātento yadidaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:441_1: viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti vatvā tato paraṃ anulomapaccayākāravasena viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpamūlakaṃ āyatijarāmaraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:442_1: Uddhāpavantanti āpato uggatattā uddhāpanti laddhavohārena pākāravatthunā samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0302a:442_2: Ramaṇīyanti samantā catunnaṃ dvārānaṃ abbhantare ca nānābhaṇḍānaṃ sampattiyā ramaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:442_5: Kārento ca paṭhamaṃ aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo pesetvā “sampuṇṇa”nti pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni pañcakulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:442_6: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni pañcapaññāsakulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:442_7: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni tiṃsa kulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:442_8: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparaṃ kulasahassaṃ peseyya.
atk-s0302a:442_9: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni ekādasanahutāni kulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:442_10: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni caturāsītikulasahassāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:442_15: iminā nayena kulāni pesetvā na sakkā pūretuṃ,
atk-s0302a:442_16: bheriṃ pana carāpetvā ‘amhākaṃ nagaraṃ imāya ca imāya ca sampattiyā sampannaṃ,
atk-s0302a:442_19: imañcimañca parihāraṃ labhissantī’ti nagarassa ceva vaṇṇaṃ lokassa ca parihāralābhaṃ ghosāpethā”ti vadeyya.
atk-s0302a:442_21: Tato manussā nagaraguṇañceva parihāralābhañca sutvā sabbadisāhi samosaritvā nagaraṃ pūreyyuṃ.
atk-s0302a:442_22: Taṃ aparena samayena iddhañceva assa phītañca.
atk-s0302a:442_23: Taṃ sandhāya tadassa nagaraṃ aparena samayena iddhañceva phītañcātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:444_1: araññapavane caramānapuriso viya hi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya pāramiyo pūrayamāno mahāpuriso daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0302a:444_2: tassa purisassa pubbakehi manussehi anuyātamaggadassanaṃ viya mahāsattassa anupubbena bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa
atk-s0302a:444_4: purisassa taṃ ekapadikamaggaṃ anugacchato aparabhāge mahāmaggadassanaṃ viya mahāsattassa uparivipassanāya ciṇṇante lokuttaramaggadassanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:444_5: purisassa teneva maggena gacchato purato nagaradassanaṃ viya tathāgatassa nibbānanagaradassanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:444_10: Tassa purisassa catunnaṃ dvārānaṃ diṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatassa catunnaṃ maggānaṃ diṭṭhakālo,
atk-s0302a:444_11: tassa catūhi dvārehi nagaraṃ paviṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatassa catūhi maggehi nibbānaṃ paviṭṭhakālo,
atk-s0302a:444_12: tassa nagarabbhantare bhaṇḍavavatthānakālo viya tathāgatassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇena paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammavavatthānakālo.
atk-s0302a:444_13: Nagarassa agārakaraṇatthaṃ kulapariyesanakālo viya satthu phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya veneyyasatte volokanakālo,
atk-s0302a:444_14: tena purisena yācitassa rañño ekaṃ mahākuṭumbikaṃ diṭṭhakālo viya mahābrahmunā yācitassa bhagavato aññāsikoṇḍaññattheraṃ diṭṭhakālo,
atk-s0302a:444_15: rañño mahākuṭumbikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “nagaravāsaṃ karohī”ti pahitakālo viya bhagavato ekasmiṃ pacchābhatte
atk-s0302a:444_16: aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā āsāḷhipuṇṇamadivase bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatanaṃ pavisitvā theraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ
atk-s0302a:444_18: mahākuṭumbikena aṭṭhārasa purisakoṭiyo gahetvā nagaraṃ ajjhāvuṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatena dhammacakke pavattite
atk-s0302a:444_19: therassa aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitakālo,
atk-s0302a:444_21: tato sampuṇṇaṃ nagaranti pucchitvā na tāvāti vutte pañca kulāni ādiṃ katvā yāva caturāsītikulasahassapesanaṃ
atk-s0302a:444_22: viya tathāgatassa pañcamadivasato paṭṭhāya anattalakkhaṇasuttādīni desetvā pañcavaggiye ādiṃ katvā yasapamukhā
atk-s0302a:444_27: tirokuṭṭānumodane caturāsītisahassānīti ettakassa janassa ariyamaggaṃ otāretvā nibbānanagaraṃ pesitakālo,
atk-s0302a:444_28: atha tena nayena nagare apūriyamāne bheriṃ carāpetvā nagarassa vaṇṇaghosanaṃ kulānaṃ parihāralābhaghosanaṃ
atk-s0302a:444_29: viya ca māsassa aṭṭha divase tattha tattha nisīditvā dhammakathikānaṃ nibbānavaṇṇassa ceva nibbānappattānaṃ
atk-s0302a:444_31: tato sabbadisāhi āgantvā manussānaṃ nagarasamosaraṇaṃ viya tattha tattha dhammakathaṃ sutvā tato tato
atk-s0302a:444_32: nikkhamitvā pabbajjaṃ ādiṃ katvā anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannānaṃ aparimāṇānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ nibbānasamosaraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:445_8: Yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitanti yāva dasasahassacakkavāḷe devamanussehi paricchedo atthi,
atk-s0302a:445_9: etasmiṃ antare suppakāsitaṃ sudesitaṃ tathāgatenāti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:447_3: Tasmiṃ kira janapade manussā sahetukā paññavanto.
atk-s0302a:447_6: te gambhīraṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ dhammakathaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthā honti.
atk-s0302a:447_9: saṃyuttake cūḷanidānādisuttanti evamādīni aññāni gambhīrāni suttāni tattheva kathesi.
atk-s0302a:447_12: Na so bhikkhu bhagavato cittaṃ ārādhesīti paccayākāravasena byākārāpetukāmassa bhagavato tathā abyākaritvā
atk-s0302a:448_4: Aññattha hi evaṃ vuttaṃ nāma natthi.

atk-s0302a:517_10: tadeva ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppanno pariḷāho rūpapariḷāho nāma,
atk-s0302a:517_11: sahāye gaṇhitvā tassa pariyesanaṃ rūpapariyesanā nāma,
atk-s0302a:517_12: pariyesitvā laddhaṃ saha taṇhāya ārammaṇaṃ rūpalābho nāma.
atk-s0302a:518_2: pāḷiṃ pana parivaṭṭetvā vuttappakāre ārammaṇe uppannā saññā rūpasaññā,
atk-s0302a:518_3: tasmiṃyeva saṅkappo rūpasaṅkappo tasmiṃ chando rūpacchando,
atk-s0302a:518_6: pariyesitvā laddhaṃ saha taṇhāya ārammaṇaṃ rūpalābho.
atk-s0302a:518_9: Rūpasamphasso rūpasamphassajā vedanāti idaṃ dvayaṃ labbhatī”ti.
atk-s0302a:518_11: Ārammaṇañhi sāṇipākārehi vā parikkhittaṃ tiṇapaṇṇādīhi vā paṭicchannaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:518_13: suṭṭhu naṃ passissāmī”ti olokayato tasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppannā saññā rūpasaññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:518_14: Tasmiṃyeva uppannā saṅkappādayo rūpasaṅkappādayo nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:518_15: Etthāpi ca saññāsaṅkappaphassavedanāchandā ekajavanavārepi nānājavanavārepi labbhanti,
atk-s0302a:522_2: Ālokassapi ālokakasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā uppannajjhānassāpīti sahārammaṇassa jhānassa etaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0302a:522_6: Iti bhagavā anusandhikusalassa bhikkhuno tattha nisīditvā pañhaṃ pucchitukāmassa okāsaṃ dento desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:523_0: Andhakāraṃ paṭiccāti andhakāro hi ālokena paricchinno,
atk-s0302a:523_10: Rūpāvacarasamāpattiyā hi sati ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpatti nāma hoti rūpasamatikkamo vā,
atk-s0302a:523_13: Nirodhaṃ paṭiccāti catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ paṭisaṅkhāappavattiṃ paṭicca.
atk-s0302a:523_17: Ettha ca catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodhova nirodhasamāpattīti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:524_0: Kathaṃ samāpatti pattabbāti kathaṃ samāpattiyo kīdisā samāpattiyo nāma hutvā pattabbāti?
atk-s0302a:524_1: Saññāsamāpatti pattabbāti saññāya atthibhāvena saññāsamāpattiyo saññāsamāpattiyo nāma hutvā pattabbā.
atk-s0302a:524_2: Saṅkhārāvasesasamāpatti pattabbāti sukhumasaṅkhārānaṃ avasiṭṭhatāya saṅkhārāvasesasamāpatti nāma hutvā pattabbā.
atk-s0302a:524_3: Nirodhasamāpatti pattabbāti nirodhova nirodhasamāpatti nirodhasamāpatti nāma hutvā pattabbāti attho. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:527_1: Kāmapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko saṅkappo appanā byappanā cetaso abhiniropanā micchāsaṅkappo,
atk-s0302a:527_3: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare
atk-s0302a:527_4: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:528_0: Ettha sabbasaṅgāhikā asambhinnāti dve kathā honti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:528_1: Kāmadhātuggahaṇena hi byāpādadhātuvihiṃsādhātuyo gahitā hontīti ayaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikā.
atk-s0302a:528_2: Tāsaṃ pana dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ visuṃ āgatattā sesadhammā kāmadhātūti ayaṃ asambhinnakathā.
atk-s0302a:528_3: Ayamidha gahetabbā imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ ārammaṇavasena vā sampayogavasena vā paṭicca kāmasaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:528_4: Kāmasaññaṃ paṭiccāti kāmasaññaṃ pana sampayogavasena vā upanissayavasena vā paṭicca kāmasaṅkappo nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:529_0: Byāpādadhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha byāpādavitakkopi byāpādadhātu byāpādopi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:530_3: Dasasu āghātavatthūsu cittassa āghāto paṭivirodho kopo pakopo…pe…
atk-s0302a:531_0: Imaṃ byāpādadhātuṃ sahajātapaccayādivasena paṭicca byāpādasaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:532_0: Vihiṃsādhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha vihiṃsāvitakkopi vihiṃsādhātu vihiṃsāpi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:533_3: Idhekacco pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā rajjuyā vā aññataraññatarena vā satte viheṭheti.
atk-s0302a:533_4: Yā evarūpā heṭhanā viheṭhanā hiṃsanā vihiṃsanā rosanā parūpaghāto,
atk-s0302a:534_0: Imaṃ vihiṃsādhātuṃ sahajātapaccayādivasena paṭicca vihiṃsāsaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:535_2: Evameva khoti ettha sukkhatiṇadāyo viya ārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:535_5: Yathā sukkhatiṇadāye ṭhapitaṃ tiṇukkaṃ khippaṃ vāyamitvā anibbāpentassa te pāṇā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0302a:535_6: Evameva ye samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā uppannaṃ akusalasaññaṃ vikkhambhanatadaṅgasamucchedappahānehi nappajahanti,
atk-s0302a:536_1: Na khippameva pajahatīti vikkhambhanādivasena sīghaṃ nappajahati.
atk-s0302a:536_3: Na byantīkarotīti bhaṅgamattampi anavasesento na vigatantaṃ karoti.
atk-s0302a:536_4: Na anabhāvaṃ gametīti na anuabhāvaṃ gameti.
atk-s0302a:537_1: bhikkhaveti ettha nekkhammavitakkopi nekkhammadhātu sabbepi kusalā dhammā. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:539_1: Nekkhammadhātuggahaṇena hi itarāpi dve dhātuyo gahaṇaṃ gacchanti kusaladhammapariyāpannattā,
atk-s0302a:539_3: Tā pana dhātuyo visuṃ dīpetabbāti tā ṭhapetvā sesā sabbakusalā nekkhammadhātūti ayaṃ asambhinnā.
atk-s0302a:539_4: Imaṃ nekkhammadhātuṃ sahajātādipaccayavasena paṭicca nekkhammasaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:540_0: Abyāpādadhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti ettha abyāpādavitakkopi abyāpādadhātu abyāpādopi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:541_3: Yā sattesu metti mettāyanā mettāyitattaṃ mettācetovimutti,
atk-s0302a:542_0: Imaṃ abyāpādadhātuṃ paṭicca vuttanayeneva abyāpādasaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:543_0: Avihiṃsādhātuṃ, bhikkhaveti etthāpi avihiṃsāvitakkopi avihiṃsādhātu karuṇāpi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:544_3: Yā sattesu karuṇā karuṇāyanā karuṇāyitattaṃ karuṇācetovimutti,
atk-s0302a:545_0: Imaṃ avihiṃsādhātuṃ paṭicca vuttanayeneva avihiṃsāsaññā nāma uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:547_2: bhikkhaveti ito paṭṭhāya ajjhāsayaṃ dhātūti dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:547_3: Uppajjati saññāti ajjhāsayaṃ paṭicca saññā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:547_6: Idhāpi “kaccāno pañhaṃ pucchissatī”ti tassa okāsadānatthaṃ ettāvatāva desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:547_9: Kiṃ paṭicca paññāyatīti kismiṃ sati hotīti?
atk-s0302a:547_11: Asammāsambuddhesu tesu sammāsambuddhā eteti evaṃ uppannaṃ titthiyasāvakānampi diṭṭhiṃ pucchatiyeva.
atk-s0302a:548_0: Idāni yasmā tesaṃ avijjādhātuṃ paṭicca sā diṭṭhi hoti,
atk-s0302a:548_2: tasmā mahatiṃ dhātuṃ paṭicca tassā uppattiṃ dīpento mahatī kho esātiādimāha. Hīnaṃ, kaccāna,
atk-s0302a:548_5: Sā panesā itthibhāvaṃ vā makkaṭāditiracchānabhāvaṃ vā patthentassa uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:548_6: Hīno puggaloti yassete hīnā dhammā uppajjanti,
atk-s0302a:548_10: Hīnaṃ ācikkhatīti so ācikkhantopi hīnameva ācikkhati,
atk-s0302a:548_12: Upapattīti dve upapattiyo paṭilābho ca nibbatti ca.
atk-s0302a:548_15: Tassa hi pañcasu nīcakulesu uppajjanato hīnā nibbatti,
atk-s0302a:548_21: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne nibbattiyeva adhippetāti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:552_4: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ mahāpaññānaṃ yadidaṃ sāriputto”ti mahāpaññesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:552_5: Iti naṃ “khandhantaraṃ dhātvantaraṃ āyatanantaraṃ satipaṭṭhānabodhipakkhiyadhammantaraṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ
atk-s0302a:552_7: Sopi tesaṃ pathaviṃ pattharento viya sinerupādato vālikaṃ uddharanto viya cakkavāḷapabbataṃ bhindanto
atk-s0302a:552_8: viya sineruṃ ukkhipanto viya ākāsaṃ vitthārento viya candimasūriye uṭṭhāpento viya ca pucchitapucchitaṃ katheti.
atk-s0302a:553_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ iddhimantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahāmoggallāno”ti iddhimantesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:553_3: Iti naṃ “parikammaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ vikubbanaṃ pucchissāmā”ti iddhimantova parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:554_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti dhutavādesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:554_3: Iti naṃ “dhutaṅgaparihāraṃ ānisaṃsaṃ samodhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhedaṃ pucchissāmā”ti dhutavādāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:555_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti dibbacakkhukesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:555_3: Iti naṃ “dibbacakkhussa parikammaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ upakkilesaṃ pucchissāmā”ti dibbacakkhukāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:556_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ puṇṇo mantāṇiputto”ti dhammakathikesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:556_3: Iti naṃ “dhammakathāya saṅkhepavitthāragambhīruttānavicitrakathādīsu taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ pucchissāmā”ti dhammakathikāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:556_5: dhammakathikena nāma ādito parisaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0302a:556_7: ante catusaccavasena kūṭaṃ gaṇhitu”nti evaṃ taṃ taṃ dhammakathānayaṃ ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:557_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vinayadharānaṃ yadidaṃ upālī”ti vinayadharesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:557_3: Iti naṃ “garukalahukaṃ satekicchaatekicchaṃ āpattānāpattiṃ pucchissāmā”ti vinayadharāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:558_2: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando”ti bahussutesu etadagge ṭhapito.
atk-s0302a:558_3: Iti naṃ “dasavidhaṃ byañjanabuddhiṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ anusandhiṃ pubbāparaṃ pucchissāmā”ti bahussutāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:559_1: tena naṃ “kulasaṅgaṇhanaparihāraṃ nānappakārakaṃ kohaññataṃ pucchissāmā”ti pāpicchāva parivārenti.
atk-s0302a:559_2: Sopi tesaṃ taṃ taṃ niyāmaṃ ācikkhati.
atk-s0302a:560_1: “Devadatto satthari paduṭṭhacitto anatthampi kātuṃ upakkameyyā”ti ārakkhaggahaṇatthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:560_6: Kiṃ pana devadatto bhagavato anatthaṃ kātuṃ samattho,
atk-s0302a:562_1: Chaṭṭhe gūtho gūthena saṃsandati sametīti samuddantare janapadantare cakkavāḷantare ṭhitopi vaṇṇenapi
atk-s0302a:562_2: gandhenapi rasenapi nānattaṃ anupagacchanto saṃsandati sameti,
atk-s0302a:562_5: Ayaṃ pana aniṭṭhaupamā hīnajjhāsayānaṃ hīnaajjhāsayassa sarikkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ āhaṭā,
atk-s0302a:563_2: Asaṃsaggena chijjatīti ekato ṭhānanisajjādīni akarontassa asaṃsaggena adassanena chijjati.
atk-s0302a:565_1: Sattame assaddhā assaddhehītiādīsu buddhe vā dhamme vā saṅghe vā saddhāvirahitā nirojā nirasā puggalā
atk-s0302a:565_2: samuddassa orimatīre ṭhitā pārimatīrepi ṭhitehi assaddhehi saddhiṃ tāya assaddhatāya ekasadisā nirantarā honti.
atk-s0302a:565_8: duppaññā khandhādiparicchedikāya paññāya abhāvena nippaññā tādiseheva duppaññehi,
atk-s0302a:565_12: bahussutā sutadharā āgamadharā tantipālakā vaṃsānurakkhakā bahussutehi,
atk-s0302a:565_15: paññavanto mahāpaññehi vajirūpamañāṇehi paññavantehi saddhiṃ dūre ṭhitāpi tāya paññāsampattiyā saṃsandanti samenti. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:567_1: Aṭṭhamādīni teyeva assaddhādidhamme tikavasena katvā desitāni.
atk-s0302a:567_2: Tattha aṭṭhame assaddhādimūlakā kaṇhapakkhasukkapakkhavasena pañca tikā vuttā,
atk-s0302a:567_6: dvādasame kusītamūlako eko tiko vuttoti sabbepi pañcasu suttantesu pannarasa tikā honti.
atk-s0302a:571_5: Evaṃ vuccamāne bujjhanakapuggalānaṃ ajjhāsayena hi etāni vuttāni.
atk-s0302a:573_4: Tattha tatiye surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhāyinoti surāmerayasaṅkhātaṃ majjaṃ yāya pamādacetanāya pivanti,
atk-s0302a:574_6: paresaṃ atthabhañjakaṃ tucchaṃ alikaṃ vācaṃ bhāsitāroti attho.
atk-s0302a:574_13: Micchā pāpikā viññugarahitā etesaṃ diṭṭhīti micchādiṭṭhikā,
atk-s0302a:574_14: kammapathapariyāpannāya “natthi dinna”ntiādivatthukāya micchattapariyāpannāya aniyyānikadiṭṭhiyā samannāgatāti attho.
atk-s0302a:574_15: Sammā sobhanā viññupasatthā etesaṃ diṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhikā,
atk-s0302a:574_16: kammapathapariyāpannāya “atthi dinna”ntiādikāya kammassakatadiṭṭhiyā sammattapariyāpannāya maggadiṭṭhiyā ca samannāgatāti attho.
atk-s0302a:575_0: Yo pana tesaṃ pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo abhijjhā
atk-s0302a:575_1: byāpādo micchādiṭṭhīti kaṇhapakkhe dasavidho attho hoti.
atk-s0302a:575_6: Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
atk-s0302a:575_7: So guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo,
atk-s0302a:575_13: Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo,
atk-s0302a:576_11: Atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbo.
atk-s0302a:577_3: yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo hoti.
atk-s0302a:577_4: Tasmiṃ pana parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:577_8: Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ,
atk-s0302a:577_9: taṃ taṃ guṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
atk-s0302a:578_10: kusāvahāroti imesaṃ avahārānaṃ vasena pavattāti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0302a:579_2: Lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro.
atk-s0302a:579_3: Tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitā piturakkhitā mātāpiturakkhitā bhāturakkhitā
atk-s0302a:579_4: bhaginirakkhitā ñātirakkhitā gottarakkhitā dhammarakkhitā sārakkhā saparidaṇḍāti māturakkhitādayo dasa,
atk-s0302a:579_5: dhanakkītā chandavāsinī bhogavāsinī paṭavāsinī odapattakinī obhatacumbaṭā dāsī ca bhariyā ca kammakārī
atk-s0302a:579_6: ca bhariyā ca dhajāhaṭā muhuttikāti etā dhanakkītādayo dasāti vīsati itthiyo.
atk-s0302a:579_8: dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññe purisā.
atk-s0302a:579_10: So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo,
atk-s0302a:580_0: Musāti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjanako vacīpayogo kāyappayogo vā,
atk-s0302a:580_5: Lakkhaṇato pana atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
atk-s0302a:580_9: Api ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya natthītiādinayappavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0302a:580_11: Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena “ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī”ti pūraṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo,
atk-s0302a:580_19: So kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā vācāya vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0302a:580_20: Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti,
atk-s0302a:581_5: Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusaṃ karoti,
atk-s0302a:582_1: attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā pisuṇavācā.
atk-s0302a:582_9: iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsikoti piyakamyatā vā,
atk-s0302a:583_2: eko kira dārako mātu vacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0302a:583_5: Athassa tatheva araññe mahiṃsī uṭṭhāsi. Dārako,
atk-s0302a:583_11: Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti.
atk-s0302a:583_12: Mātāpitaro hi kadāci puttake evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0302a:583_14: uppalapattampi ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti.
atk-s0302a:583_15: Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti –
atk-s0302a:583_19: Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti,
atk-s0302a:583_21: Na hi mārāpetukāmassa “imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā”ti vacanaṃ apharusavācā hoti.
atk-s0302a:585_2: Sā “aho vatidaṃ mamassā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā adinnādānaṃ viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca.
atk-s0302a:585_3: Tassā dve sambhārā parabhaṇḍaṃ attano pariṇāmanañca.
atk-s0302a:585_4: Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
atk-s0302a:585_5: yāva na “aho vatidaṃ mamassā”ti attano pariṇāmetīti.
atk-s0302a:586_5: Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
atk-s0302a:586_6: yāva na “aho vatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vinasseyyā”ti tassa vināsaṃ cinteti.
atk-s0302a:587_1: Sā “natthi dinna”ntiādinā nayena viparītadassanalakkhaṇā samphappalāpo viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca.
atk-s0302a:587_5: vatthuno ca gahitākāraviparītatā yathā ca naṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0302a:588_0: Imesaṃ pana dasannaṃ akusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:588_1: Tattha dhammatoti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanādhammāva honti,
atk-s0302a:588_4: micchādiṭṭhi cāti ime aṭṭha kammapathā eva honti,
atk-s0302a:588_7: Abhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā lobho akusalamūlaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:589_7: Samphappalāpo diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena sattārammaṇo vā saṅkhārārammaṇo vā,
atk-s0302a:590_1: Kiñcāpi hi rājāno coraṃ disvā hasamānāpi “gacchatha naṃ ghātethā”ti vadanti,
atk-s0302a:592_1: Yāya pana viratiyā ete paṭiviratā nāma honti,
atk-s0302a:592_2: sā bhedato tividhā hoti sampattavirati samādānavirati samucchedaviratīti.
atk-s0302a:592_3: Tattha asamādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ attano jātivayabāhusaccādīni paccavekkhitvā “ayuttaṃ amhākaṃ evarūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:592_4: kātu”nti sampattaṃ vatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ uppajjamānā virati sampattaviratīti veditabbā sīhaḷadīpe
atk-s0302a:592_6: Tassa kira daharakāleyeva mātu rogo uppajji.
atk-s0302a:592_8: Tato cakkanassa bhātā “gaccha tāta khettaṃ āhiṇḍāhī”ti cakkanaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0302a:592_10: Tasmiñca samaye eko saso taruṇasassaṃ khādituṃ āgato hoti.
atk-s0302a:592_11: So taṃ disvā vegena dhāvanto valliyā baddho “kiri kirī”ti saddamakāsi.
atk-s0302a:592_12: Cakkano tena saddena gantvā taṃ gahetvā cintesi “mātu bhesajjaṃ karomī”ti.
atk-s0302a:592_15: yvāhaṃ mātu jīvitakāraṇā paraṃ jīvitā voropeyya”nti.
atk-s0302a:592_16: Atha naṃ “gaccha araññe sasehi saddhiṃ tiṇodakaṃ paribhuñjā”ti muñci.
atk-s0302a:592_22: nābhijānāmi sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropetā”ti saccaṃ vatvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0302a:593_0: Samādinnasikkhāpadānaṃ pana sikkhāpadasamādāne ca tatuttari ca attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā vatthuṃ avītikkamantānaṃ
atk-s0302a:593_3: So kira ambariyavihāravāsīpiṅgalabuddharakkhitattherassa santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā khettaṃ kasati.
atk-s0302a:593_11: yvāhaṃ bhāvanīyassa garuno santike sikkhāpadaṃ gahetvā bhindeyya”nti.
atk-s0302a:593_14: na sikkhāpada”nti aṃse ṭhapitaṃ tikhiṇadaṇḍavāsiṃ araññe chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0302a:594_1: yassā uppattito pabhuti pāṇaṃ ghātessāmīti ariyapuggalānaṃ cittampi na uppajjatīti.
atk-s0302a:595_1: evaṃ imesampi kusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlatoti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:595_2: Tattha dhammatoti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanāpi vaṭṭanti viratiyopi,
atk-s0302a:596_2: ante tayo kammapathā ceva mūlāni ca.
atk-s0302a:596_3: Anabhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā alobho kusalamūlaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:597_3: Yathā pana nibbānārammaṇo ariyamaggo kilese pajahati,
atk-s0302a:597_4: evaṃ jīvitindriyādiārammaṇāpete kammapathā pāṇātipātādīni dussīlyāni pajahantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:598_0: Vedanātoti sabbe sukhavedanā vā honti majjhattavedanā vā. Kusalaṃ patvā hi dukkhavedanā nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:599_0: Mūlatoti paṭipāṭiyā satta ñāṇasampayuttacittena viramantassa alobhaadosaamohavasena timūlā honti,
atk-s0302a:599_4: Alobho pana attanāva attano mūlaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0302a:601_0: 112. Chaṭṭhaṃ aṭṭhamaggaṅgavasena bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:607_6: vitthārato pana vīsatikoṭṭhāsādivasena etā kathetabbā. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:609_1: Dutiye ayaṃ pathavīdhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ pathavīdhātunissayo assādo.
atk-s0302a:609_3: “idha me aṅgulaṃ pavesituṃ vāyamathā”ti vā hatthaṃ pasāretvā,
atk-s0302a:609_9: Ayaṃ pathavīdhātuyā ādīnavoti yena ākārena sā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā,
atk-s0302a:609_11: Chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānanti nibbānaṃ āgamma pathavīdhātuyā chandarāgo vinīyati ceva pahīyati ca,
atk-s0302a:610_0: Ayaṃ āpodhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ āpodhātunissayo assādo.
atk-s0302a:610_2: “kiṃ ayaṃ nipannakālato paṭṭhāya passāvaṭṭhānābhimukho nikkhamati ceva pavisati ca,
atk-s0302a:610_3: appamattakampissa kammaṃ karontassa sedatintaṃ vatthaṃ pīḷetabbatākāraṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0302a:610_5: mayaṃ pana sāyaṃ nipannā pātova uṭṭhahāma,
atk-s0302a:610_7: mahākammaṃ karontānaṃ sedamattampi no na uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:610_8: asanisaddena viya dhammaṃ kathentānaṃ sarīre usumākāramattampi no natthī”ti evaṃ pavattānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:611_0: Ayaṃ tejodhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ tejodhātunissayo assādo.
atk-s0302a:611_2: “kiṃ ime kiñcideva yāgubhattakhajjamattaṃ ajjhoharitvā thaddhakucchino nisīditvā sabbarattiṃ aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ pariyesanti,
atk-s0302a:611_3: phusitamattesupi sarīre patitesu aṅgārakaṭāhaṃ ottharitvā pārupitvāva nipajjanti?
atk-s0302a:611_4: Mayaṃ pana atithaddhampi maṃsaṃ vā pūvaṃ vā khādāma,
atk-s0302a:611_6: tāvadeva no sabbaṃ pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilīyati,
atk-s0302a:611_7: sattāhavaddalikāya vattamānāya sarīre sītānudahanamattampi no natthī”ti evaṃ pavattānaṃ vasena veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:612_0: Ayaṃ vāyodhātuyā assādoti ayaṃ vāyodhātunissayo assādo.
atk-s0302a:612_2: “imesaṃ appamattakampi kammaṃ karontānaṃ anumodanamattampi kathentānaṃ sarīraṃ vāto vijjhati,
atk-s0302a:612_5: kucchivātasīsavātakaṇṇavātādīhi niccupaddutā telaphāṇitādīni vātabhesajjāneva karontā atināmenti,
atk-s0302a:612_6: amhākaṃ pana mahākammaṃ karontānampi tiyāmarattiṃ dhammaṃ kathentānampi ekadivaseneva dasa yojanāni gacchantānampi
atk-s0302a:612_7: hatthapādasaṃsīdanamattaṃ vā piṭṭhirujjanamattaṃ vā na hotī”ti,
atk-s0302a:612_9: Evaṃ pavattā hi etā dhātuyo assādenti nāma.
atk-s0302a:613_1: Anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti uttaravirahitaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ,
atk-s0302a:613_4: “Bodhirukkhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho”ti ca “antarā ca bodhiṃ antarā ca gaya”nti ca āgataṭṭhānesu hi rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:613_5: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo.
atk-s0302a:614_9: Buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ deti abhiseko viya rañño sabbalokissariyabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0302a:614_10: Tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi na hoti.
atk-s0302a:615_0: Abhisambuddhoti paccaññāsinti “abhisambuddho ahaṃ patto paṭivijjhitvā ṭhito”ti evaṃ paṭijāniṃ.
atk-s0302a:615_1: Ñāṇañca pana me dassanaṃ udapādīti adhigataguṇadassanasamatthaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇañca me udapādi.
atk-s0302a:615_2: Akuppā me vimuttīti “ayaṃ mayhaṃ arahattaphalavimutti akuppā”ti evaṃ ñāṇaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0302a:615_3: Tattha dvīhākārehi akuppatā veditabbā kāraṇato ca ārammaṇato ca.
atk-s0302a:615_4: Sā hi catūhi maggehi samucchinnakilesānaṃ puna anivattanatāya kāraṇatopi akuppā,
atk-s0302a:615_5: akuppadhammaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattatāya ārammaṇatopi akuppā.
atk-s0302a:615_7: Natthi dāni punabbhavoti idāni puna añño bhavo nāma natthīti.
atk-s0302a:616_0: Imasmiṃ sutte cattāri saccāni kathitāni. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:616_6: Ettha hi yaṃ pathavīdhātuṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
atk-s0302a:616_13: Yā imesu tīsu ṭhānesu diṭṭhi saṅkappo vācā kammanto ājīvo vāyāmo sati samādhi,
atk-s0302a:618_0: 116. Tatiye acarinti ñāṇacārena acariṃ, anubhavanacārenāti attho. Yāvatāti yattako. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:620_1: Catutthe nissaṭātiādīni ādito vuttapaṭisedhena yojetvā “na nissaṭā,
atk-s0302a:620_4: na vimariyādikatena cetasā vihariṃsū”ti evaṃ veditabbāni.
atk-s0302a:620_7: Tattha ca yassa upaḍḍhā kilesā pahīnā,
atk-s0302a:620_11: tassa cittaṃ pahīnakilese vā vaṭṭaṃ vā sandhāya vimariyādikataṃ,
atk-s0302a:620_12: appahīnakilese vā vaṭṭaṃ vā sandhāya na vimariyādikataṃ.
atk-s0302a:620_13: Idha pana ubhayassāpi pahīnattā “vimariyādikatena cetasā”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0302a:620_14: mariyādaṃ akatvā ṭhitena atikkantamariyādena cetasāti attho.
atk-s0302a:620_15: Iti tīsupi imesu suttesu catusaccameva kathitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:622_1: Pañcame ekantadukkhāti atikkamitvā ṭhitassa tattakāro viya ekanteneva dukkhā.
atk-s0302a:624_0: 119-123. Chaṭṭhasattamesu vivaṭṭaṃ, avasāne tīsu catusaccamevāti. Chaṭṭhādīni.
atk-s0302a:632_2: vassasataṃ vassasahassaṃ ñāṇena anugantvāpi amataggo aviditaggo,

atk-s0302a:632_6: Pubbā koṭi na paññāyatīti purimamariyādā na dissati.
atk-s0302a:632_7: Yadaggena cassa purimā koṭi na paññāyati,

atk-s0302a:632_19: evarūpānaṃ pana jambudīpānaṃ satepi sahassepi satasahassepi tiṇādīni tena upakkamena pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyuṃ,
atk-s0302a:632_26: Sā hi punappunaṃ marantehi sarīranikkhepena vaḍḍhitā.

atk-s0302a:636_8: Pubbadakkhiṇapassehi nikkhantā rajatamaṇirasmiyo ekato hutvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhena gantvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0302a:636_11: uttarapācīnapassehi nikkhantā suvaṇṇarajatarasmiyo ekato hutvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhena gantvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti.

atk-s0302a:638_5: Tattha ajādikāle ca manussesu cāpi “devī sumanā tissā”ti evaṃ nānānāmikānaṃ kucchiyaṃ nibbattakāle aggahetvā
