atk-s0302a:660_6: Tīhena ārohantīti ettāvatā kira dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ antare yojanaṃ pathavī ussannā,
atk-s0302a:661_0: Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato uttariṃ appaṃ dasa vā vīsaṃ vā vassāni.
atk-s0302a:661_2: uttamakoṭiyā pana saṭṭhi vā asīti vā vassāni jīvanti.
atk-s0302a:661_3: Vassasataṃ pana appatvā pañcavassadasavassādikāle mīyamānāva bahukā.
atk-s0302a:661_5: koṇāgamano tiṃsavassasahassāyukakāle nibbattoti idaṃ anupubbena parihīnasadisaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0302a:661_8: Kakusandho tāva bhagavā imasmiṃyeva kappe cattālīsavassasahassāyukakāle nibbatto āyuppamāṇaṃ pañca koṭṭhāse
atk-s0302a:661_9: katvā cattāro ṭhatvā pañcame vijjamāneyeva parinibbuto.
atk-s0302a:661_10: Taṃ āyu parihāyamānaṃ dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ hutvā tato parihāyamānaṃ tiṃsavassasahassāyukakāle ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:661_12: Tasmimpi tatheva parinibbute taṃ āyu dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ hutvā parihāyitvā vīsavassasahassakāle ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:661_14: Tasmimpi tatheva parinibbute taṃ āyu dasavassakālaṃ patvā puna vaḍḍhamānaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ hutvā parihāyitvā vassasatakālaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-s0302a:661_16: Evaṃ anupubbena parihāyitvā vaḍḍhitvā vaḍḍhitvā parihīnanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:661_17: Tattha ca yaṃ āyuparimāṇesu mandesu buddhā nibbattanti,
atk-s0302a:668_3: atha kho yathāladdhādīnaṃ itarītarena yena kenaci santuṭṭhoti attho.
atk-s0302a:668_4: Cīvarasmiñhi tayo santosā yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti.
atk-s0302a:669_1: idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā,
atk-s0302a:669_6: Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā,
atk-s0302a:669_8: so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:669_11: so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā cīvarāni labhitvā –
atk-s0302a:669_15: idaṃ appalābhīnaṃ hotū”ti datvā tesaṃ purāṇacīvaraṃ vā saṅkārakūṭādito vā pana nantakāni uccinitvā tehi saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhārentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:670_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0302a:670_5: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ labhati,
atk-s0302a:670_7: so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno taṃ datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ bhutvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:670_13: tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ piṇḍāya vā caritvā missakāhāraṃ bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:671_0: Idha pana bhikkhu senāsanaṃ labhati manāpaṃ vā amanāpaṃ vā,
atk-s0302a:671_1: so tena neva somanassaṃ na paṭighaṃ uppādeti,
atk-s0302a:671_4: Yo pana attano pakativiruddhaṃ vā byādhiviruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0302a:671_6: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:671_8: Aparo mahāpuñño leṇamaṇḍapakūṭāgārādīni bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati,
atk-s0302a:671_9: so tāni cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitabahussutaappalābhagilānānaṃ datvā yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:671_13: niddābhibhūtassa paṭibujjhato pāpavitakkā pātubhavantī”ti paṭisañcikkhitvā tādisaṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati,
atk-s0302a:671_14: so taṃ paṭikkhipitvā abbhokāsarukkhamūlādīsu vasanto santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:672_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā,
atk-s0302a:672_6: so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato telaṃ gahetvā vā aññadeva vā pariyesitvā bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:672_11: appalābhagilānānaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatena yena kenaci yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:672_12: Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ catumadhuraṃ “gaṇha, bhante,
atk-s0302a:672_13: yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno sacassa tesu aññatarenapi rogo vūpasammati,
atk-s0302a:672_14: atha “muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇita”nti catumadhuraṃ paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti.
atk-s0302a:673_8: Ayaṃ tādisoti dassetuṃ itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:673_11: Yathā ca ekacco “kathaṃ nu kho cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti puññavantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kohaññaṃ karonto uttasati paritassati,
atk-s0302a:673_12: ayaṃ evaṃ aladdhā ca cīvaraṃ na paritassati.
atk-s0302a:673_17: Ādīnavadassāvīti anesanāpattiyañca gadhitaparibhoge ca ādīnavaṃ passamāno.
atk-s0302a:673_19: “yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā”ti vuttanissaraṇameva jānanto paribhuñjatīti attho.
atk-s0302a:673_20: Itarītarena piṇḍapātenātiādīsupi yathāladdhādīnaṃ yena kenaci piṇḍapātena,
atk-s0302a:674_2: ovadissāmīti ettha yathā mahākassapatthero catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi santuṭṭho,
atk-s0302a:674_3: tumhepi tathārūpā bhavathāti ovadanto kassapena ovadati nāma.
atk-s0302a:674_4: Yo vā panassa kassapasadisoti etthāpi yo vā panaññopi kassapasadiso mahākassapatthero viya catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi santuṭṭho bhaveyya,
atk-s0302a:674_5: tumhepi tathārūpā bhavathāti ovadanto kassapasadisena ovadati nāma.
atk-s0302a:674_6: Tathattāya paṭipajjitabbanti “sammāsambuddhassa imāya imasmiṃ santuṭṭhisutte vuttasallekhācārapaṭipattiyā kathanaṃ nāma bhāro,
atk-s0302a:674_7: amhākampi imaṃ paṭipattiṃ paripūraṃ katvā pūraṇaṃ bhāroyeva,
atk-s0302a:674_8: āgato kho pana bhāro gahetabbo”ti cintetvā yathā mayā kathitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:676_1: Dutiye anātāpīti yaṃ vīriyaṃ kilese ātapati,
atk-s0302a:676_3: Anottappīti nibbhayo kilesuppattito kusalānuppattito ca bhayarahito.
atk-s0302a:676_6: Anuttarassa yogakkhemassāti arahattassa tañhi anuttarañceva catūhi ca yogehi khemaṃ.
atk-s0302a:677_0: Anuppannātiādīsu ye pubbe appaṭiladdhapubbaṃ cīvarādiṃ vā paccayaṃ upaṭṭhākasaddhivihārika-
atk-s0302a:677_1: antevāsīnaṃ vā aññatarato manuññavatthuṃ paṭilabhitvā taṃ subhaṃ sukhanti ayoniso gaṇhantassa aññataraṃ
atk-s0302a:677_2: vā pana ananubhūtapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yathā tathā vā ayoniso āvajjentassa lobhādayo pāpakā akusalā dhammā
atk-s0302a:677_5: Aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā nāma pāpakā dhammā natthi.
atk-s0302a:677_6: Anubhūtapubbepi ca vatthumhi ārammaṇe vā yassa pakatibuddhiyā vā uddesaparipucchāya vā pariyattinavakammayonisomanasikārānaṃ
atk-s0302a:677_7: vā aññataravasena pubbe anuppajjitvā pacchā tādisena paccayena sahasā uppajjanti,
atk-s0302a:677_9: Tesuyeva pana vatthārammaṇesu punappunaṃ uppajjamānā nappahīyanti nāma,
atk-s0302a:677_12: vitthārato pana uppannānuppannabhedo ca pahānappahānavidhānañca sabbaṃ visuddhimagge ñāṇadassanavisuddhiniddese kathitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:678_0: Anuppannā me kusalā dhammāti appaṭiladdhāpi sīlasamādhimaggaphalasaṅkhātā anavajjadhammā.
atk-s0302a:678_2: Nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti te sīlādidhammā parihānivasena puna anuppattiyā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:678_5: “Uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā”ti imassa pana sammappadhānassa vasenāyaṃ desanā katā.
atk-s0302a:678_7: paṭhamamaggo nirujjhamāno anatthāya saṃvatteyyāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0302a:678_8: Iti imasmiṃ sutte ime cattāro sammappadhānā pubbabhāgavipassanāvasena kathitāti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:680_3: apica kho yathā cando gaganatalaṃ pakkhandamāno na kenaci saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā sinehaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā nikantiṃ vā patthanaṃ vā pariyuṭṭhānaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0302a:680_4: na ca na hoti mahājanassa piyo manāpo,
atk-s0302a:680_5: tumhepi evaṃ kenaci saddhiṃ santhavādīnaṃ akaraṇena bahujanassa piyā manāpā candūpamā hutvā khattiyakulādīni cattāri kulāni upasaṅkamathāti attho.
atk-s0302a:680_8: evaṃ kilesandhakāravidhamanena ñāṇālokapharaṇena cāpi candūpamā hutvāti evamādīhipi nayehi ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0302a:681_0: Apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittanti teneva santhavādīnaṃ akaraṇena kāyañca cittañca apakassitvā,
atk-s0302a:681_2: Yo hi bhikkhu araññepi na vasati,
atk-s0302a:681_16: Evarūpā hutvā kulāni upasaṅkamathāti dīpento “apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa citta”nti āha.
atk-s0302a:682_2: Āgantuko hi paṭipāṭiyā sampattagehaṃ pavisitvā sace naṃ gharasāmikā disvā,
atk-s0302a:682_3: “amhākaṃ puttabhātaro vippavāsaṃ gatā evaṃ vicariṃsū”ti anukampamānā nisīdāpetvā bhojenti,
atk-s0302a:682_5: na tehi saddhiṃ santhavaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0302a:682_7: evaṃ tumhepi paṭipāṭiyā sampattagharaṃ pavisitvā yaṃ iriyāpathesu pasannā manussā denti,
atk-s0302a:682_9: tesaṃ kiccakaraṇīye abyāvaṭā hutvā nikkhamathāti dīpeti.
atk-s0302a:683_0: Imassa pana niccanavakabhāvassa āvibhāvatthaṃ dvebhātikavatthu kathetabbaṃ –
atk-s0302a:683_1: vasāḷanagaragāmato kira dve bhātikā nikkhamitvā pabbajitā,
atk-s0302a:683_2: te cūḷanāgatthero ca mahānāgatthero cāti paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:683_3: Te cittalapabbate tiṃsa vassāni vasitvā arahattaṃ pattā “mātaraṃ passissāmā”ti āgantvā vasāḷanagaravihāre
atk-s0302a:683_5: Mātāpi tesaṃ uḷuṅkena yāguṃ nīharitvā ekassa patte ākiri.
atk-s0302a:683_9: Thero “pacchimaṃ theraṃ puccha upāsike”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0302a:683_15: Evaṃ mātarāpi saddhiṃ chinnasanthavo bhikkhu niccanavako nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:684_10: idhekacco saṅghamajjhe pallatthikāya vā nisīdati pāde pādaṃ ādhāyitvā vāti evamādi.
atk-s0302a:684_14: Bhojanasālāya pana vuḍḍhānaṃ āsanaṃ na deti,
atk-s0302a:684_18: Nhānatitthe ca yadidaṃ “daharo vuḍḍhoti pamāṇaṃ akatvā āgatapaṭipāṭiyā nhāyitabba”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0302a:684_19: tampi anādiyanto pacchā āgantvā udakaṃ otaritvā vuḍḍhe ca nave ca bādhati.
atk-s0302a:684_20: Bhikkhācāramagge pana aggāsanaaggodakaaggapiṇḍānaṃ atthāya purato gacchati bāhāya bāhaṃ paharanto.
atk-s0302a:685_3: Tathā pubbe vuttappakārassa gaṇassa majjhe puggalassa ca santike,
atk-s0302a:685_4: tattheva manussehi pañhaṃ puṭṭho vuḍḍhataraṃ anāpucchā vissajjeti.
atk-s0302a:685_5: Antaraghare pana “itthannāme kiṃ atthi? Kiṃ yāgu,
atk-s0302a:686_0: Anekaṭṭhānaṃ manopāgabbhiyaṃ nāma tesu tesu ṭhānesu kāyavācāhi ajjhācāraṃ anāpajjitvāpi manasāva kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vitakkanaṃ.
atk-s0302a:686_1: Apica dussīlasseva sato “sīlavāti maṃ jano jānātū”ti evaṃ pavattā pāpicchatāpi manopāgabbhiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:686_2: Iti sabbesampi imesaṃ pāgabbhiyānaṃ abhāvena appagabbhā hutvā upasaṅkamathāti vadati.
atk-s0302a:687_3: Apakasseva kāyanti tādisāni ṭhānāni yo khiḍḍādipasuto kāyaṃ anapakassa ekatobhāriyaṃ akatvāva vāyupatthambhakaṃ
atk-s0302a:687_4: aggāhāpetvā cittampi anapakassa “ettha patito hatthapādabhañjanādīni pāpuṇātī”ti anādīnavadassāvitāya
atk-s0302a:687_7: Yo pana udakatthiko vā aññena vā kenaci kiccena oloketukāmo kāyaṃ apakassa ekato bhāriyaṃ katvā vāyupatthambhakaṃ gāhāpetvā,
atk-s0302a:688_3: Yathā anapakaṭṭhakāyacitto tāni olokento puriso tattha patati,
atk-s0302a:688_4: evaṃ arakkhitehi kāyādīhi kulāni upasaṅkamanto bhikkhu kulesu bajjhati,
atk-s0302a:688_6: Yathā pana apakaṭṭhakāyacitto puriso tattha na patati,
atk-s0302a:688_7: evaṃ rakkhiteneva kāyena rakkhitehi cittehi rakkhitāya vācāya suppaṭṭhitāya satiyā apakaṭṭhakāyacitto
atk-s0302a:688_8: hutvā kulāni upasaṅkamanto bhikkhu kulesu na bajjhati.
atk-s0302a:688_18: yathā ca taṃ khāṇukaṇṭakādayo na vijjhanti,
atk-s0302a:688_20: Yathā so nirupaddavo yathāruci oloketvā sukhī yenakāmaṃ pakkamati,
atk-s0302a:688_21: evaṃ bhikkhu kulāni nissāya cīvarādayo paccaye paṭisevanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto
atk-s0302a:688_22: arahattaṃ patvā lokuttarasukhena sukhito yenakāmaṃ agatapubbaṃ nibbānadisaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0302a:689_0: Idāni yo hīnādhimuttiko micchāpaṭipanno evaṃ vadeyya “sammāsambuddho ‘tividhaṃ pāgabbhiyaṃ pahāya niccanavakattena
atk-s0302a:689_1: candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamathā’ti vadanto aṭṭhāne ṭhapeti,
atk-s0302a:689_3: yaṃ na sakkā kātuṃ taṃ kāretī”ti,
atk-s0302a:690_0: Ākāse pāṇiṃ cālesīti nīle gaganantare yamakavijjutaṃ cārayamāno viya heṭṭhābhāgaṃ uparibhāgaṃ ubhatopassesu pāṇiṃ sañcāresi.
atk-s0302a:690_1: Idañca pana tepiṭake buddhavacane asambhinnapadaṃ nāma.
atk-s0302a:690_5: bhikkhaveti idampi purimanayeneva paravādaṃ pacchinditvā atthi evarūpo bhikkhūti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:691_1: Tathattāya paṭipajjeyyunti sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūrayamānā,
atk-s0302a:691_2: samādhivipassanā maggaphalānaṃ āgataṭṭhāne tāni tāni sampādayamānā tathābhāvāya paṭipajjeyyuṃ.
atk-s0302a:691_6: bhikkhaveti idampi purimanayeneva paravādaṃ pacchinditvā atthi evarūpo bhikkhūti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:691_7: Kassapena vāti ettha candopamādivasena yojanaṃ katvā purimanayeneva attho veditabbo. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:695_2: Garukānīti taṃ satthu santikā laddhakālato paṭṭhāya chinnabhinnaṭṭhāne suttasaṃsibbanena ceva aggaḷadānena ca anekāni paṭalāni hutvā garukāni jātāni.
atk-s0302a:695_3: Nibbasanānīti pubbe bhagavatā nivāsetvā apanītatāya evaṃladdhanāmāni.
atk-s0302a:695_4: Tasmāti yasmā tvaṃ jiṇṇo ceva garupaṃsukūlo ca.
atk-s0302a:695_5: Gahapatānīti paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ vissajjetvā gahapatīhi dinnacīvarāni dhārehīti vadati.
atk-s0302a:695_6: Nimantanānīti piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ vissajjetvā salākabhattādīni nimantanāni bhuñjāhīti vadati.
atk-s0302a:695_7: Mama ca santiketi āraññikaṅgaṃ vissajjetvā gāmantasenāsaneyeva vasāhīti vadati.
atk-s0302a:696_0: Nanu ca yathā rājā senāpatiṃ senāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā tassa rājūpaṭṭhānādinā attano kammena ārādhentasseva
atk-s0302a:696_1: taṃ ṭhānantaraṃ gahetvā aññassa dadamāno ayuttaṃ nāma karoti,
atk-s0302a:696_2: evaṃ satthā mahākassapattherassa paccuggamanatthāya tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ gantvā rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya
atk-s0302a:696_3: ca antare bahuputtakarukkhamūle nisinno tīhi ovādehi upasampādetvā tena saddhiṃ attano cīvaraṃ parivattetvā
atk-s0302a:696_5: so tasmiṃ kattukamyatāchandena satthu cittaṃ ārādhentasseva paṃsukūlādīni vissajjāpetvā gahapaticīvarapaṭiggahaṇādīsu niyojento ayuttaṃ nāma karotīti.
atk-s0302a:696_9: yathā pana aghaṭṭitā bheriādayo saddaṃ na vissajjenti,
atk-s0302a:696_10: evaṃ aghaṭṭitā evarūpā puggalā na sīhanādaṃ nadantīti nadāpetukāmo sīhanādajjhāsayena evamāha.
atk-s0302a:696_12: dīgharattaṃ āraññiko cevā”tiādinā nayena sīhanādaṃ nadati.
atk-s0302a:697_6: Āraññiko pana gāvutaṃ vā aḍḍhayojanaṃ vā atikkamitvā araññaṃ ajjhogāhetvā vasanto dīpibyagghasīhādīnaṃ sadde suṇāti,
atk-s0302a:699_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
atk-s0302a:702_0: “Purato pacchato vāpi, aparo ce na vijjati;
atk-s0302a:703_0: Tattheva phāsu bhavati, ekassa ramato vane”ti.
atk-s0302a:705_1: Apiṇḍapātiko hi gāmato dūravihāre vasamāno kālasseva “yāguṃ vā pārivāsikabhattaṃ vā lacchāmi,
atk-s0302a:705_2: āsanasālāya vā pana uddesabhattādīsu kiñcideva mayhaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti makkaṭakasuttāni chindanto sayitagorūpāni
atk-s0302a:705_4: Manusse khettakammādīnaṃ atthāya gehā nikkhanteyeva sampāpuṇituṃ migaṃ anubandhanto viya vegena gacchanto turitacārī hoti.
atk-s0302a:705_5: Antarā kiñcideva disvā “asukaupāsako vā asukaupāsikā vā gehe,
atk-s0302a:705_9: sayaṃ pacchimadisaṃ gantukāmo pācīnadisāya salākaṃ labhitvā aññaṃ pacchimadisāya laddhasalākaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0302a:705_12: tumhākaṃ salākaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”ti salākaṃ parivatteti.
atk-s0302a:705_13: Ekaṃ vā pana salākabhattaṃ āharitvā paribhuñjanto “aparassāpi salākabhattassa pattaṃ dethā”ti manussehi vutte, “bhante,
atk-s0302a:705_15: ahaṃ mayhaṃ patte bhattaṃ pakkhipitvā tumhākaṃ pattaṃ dassāmī”ti aññassa pattaṃ dāpetvā bhatte āhaṭe
atk-s0302a:705_16: attano patte pakkhipitvā pattaṃ paṭidento pattaṃ parivatteti nāma.
atk-s0302a:705_18: iminā ca bhiyyo dūragāme salākā laddhā,
atk-s0302a:705_19: tattha agacchanto puna sattāhaṃ salākaṃ na labhatīti alābhabhayena gacchati,
atk-s0302a:705_20: evaṃ gacchanto palibuddho hutvā gacchati nāma.
atk-s0302a:705_29: udāhu uṇha”nti evaṃ tattha ca bahusaṃsayo hoti.
atk-s0302a:706_0: Piṇḍapātiko pana kālasseva vuṭṭhāya vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0302a:706_1: kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā kālaṃ sallakkhetvā mahājanassa uḷuṅkabhikkhādīni dātuṃ pahonakakāle gacchatīti
atk-s0302a:706_3: ekekaṃ padavāraṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā vipassanto gacchatīti na turitacārī hoti,
atk-s0302a:706_11: Ekasmiṃ gāme vā vīthiyā vā alabhitvā aññattha carati.
atk-s0302a:706_12: Tasmimpi alabhitvā aññattha caranto missakodanaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā amataṃ viya paribhuñjitvā gacchati.
atk-s0302a:707_4: Paṃsukūliko pana na vassāvāsikaṃ pariyesanto carati,
atk-s0302a:709_4: Evaṃ panassa ahosi “ime na ciraṃ ṭhassanti,
atk-s0302a:709_6: so mayi parinibbute sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ nisīditvā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ katvā mama sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇakālapavattanakaṃ karissati,
atk-s0302a:709_12: Appadakkhiṇaggāhinoti anusāsaniṃ sutvā padakkhiṇaṃ na gaṇhanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ na paṭipajjanti,
atk-s0302a:709_15: sutapariyattiṃ nissāya ativiya vādaṃ karonteti attho.
atk-s0302a:709_16: Ko bahutaraṃ bhāsissatīti dhammaṃ kathento ko bahuṃ bhāsissati, kiṃ tvaṃ,
atk-s0302a:709_19: eko bahuṃ bhāsanto asahitaṃ amadhuraṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0302a:709_22: Eko pana bahuñca sundarañca kathento ciraṃ na bhāsati,
atk-s0302a:711_4: Na santi bhikkhū ovādakāti imassa puggalassa ovādakā anusāsakā kalyāṇamittā natthīti idaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0302a:713_1: Aṭṭhame tathā hi panāti pubbe sovacassatāya,
atk-s0302a:713_4: Ko nāmāyaṃ bhikkhūti ko nāmo ayaṃ bhikkhu?
atk-s0302a:713_9: Sabrahmacārikāmoti “ime maṃ parivāretvā carantū”ti evaṃ kāmeti icchati patthetīti sabrahmacārikāmo.
atk-s0302a:713_11: Brahmacārupaddavenāti yo sabrahmacārīnaṃ catūsu paccayesu adhimattacchandarāgo upaddavoti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:715_2: Yāni pana ito paraṃ vivicceva kāmehītiādinā nayena cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni,
atk-s0302a:715_3: sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamātiādinā nayena catasso arūpasamāpattiyo,
atk-s0302a:715_4: sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhanti evaṃ nirodhasamāpatti,
atk-s0302a:715_5: anekavihitaṃ iddhividhantiādinā nayena pañca lokikābhiññā ca vuttā.
atk-s0302a:715_7: taṃ sabbaṃ anupadavaṇṇanāya ceva bhāvanāvidhānena ca saddhiṃ visuddhimagge vitthāritameva.
atk-s0302a:715_8: Chaḷabhiññāya pana āsavānaṃ khayāti āsavānaṃ khayena.
atk-s0302a:717_6: Nanu ca so sayampi tepiṭako bahussuto,
atk-s0302a:717_9: Buddhapaṭibhāgassa pana sāvakassa kathaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññissantīti yācati.
atk-s0302a:717_10: Bahukicco tvaṃ bahukaraṇīyoti kiṃ thero navakammādipasuto,
atk-s0302a:717_12: satthari pana parinibbute catasso parisā ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0302a:718_3: Paṇḍito hi ñāṇasaṅkhātena vedena īhati sabbakiccāni karoti,
atk-s0302a:718_7: Dhammaṃ bhāsitabbaṃ maññatīti tipiṭakadharassa dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa sammukhe sayaṃ araññavāsī paṃsukūliko
atk-s0302a:718_15: Mā te saṅgho uttari upaparikkhīti mā bhikkhusaṅgho atirekaokāse taṃ upaparikkhīti.
atk-s0302a:718_19: tāya saddhiṃ santhavo vā sineho vā bhavissatī”ti mā taṃ saṅgho evaṃ amaññīti.
atk-s0302a:719_0: Idāni attano buddhapaṭibhāgabhāvaṃ dīpento taṃ kiṃ maññasi,
atk-s0302a:719_5: purimapādato paṭṭhāya yāva kumbhā vidatthādhikasattahatthubbedhanti attho.
atk-s0302a:719_9: buddhapaṭibhāgassa pana sāvakassa upavādaṃ vatvā mahākassapatthere chahi abhiññāhi sīhanādaṃ nadante
atk-s0302a:719_10: tassā kāsāvāni kaṇṭakasākhā viya kacchusākhā viya ca sarīraṃ khādituṃ āraddhāni,
atk-s0302a:719_11: tāni hāretvā setakāni nivatthakkhaṇeyevassā cittassādo udapādīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:721_1: Ekādasame dakkhiṇāgirisminti rājagahaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitassa girino dakkhiṇabhāge janapado dakkhiṇāgiri nāma,
atk-s0302a:721_3: Cārikā ca nāma duvidhā hoti turitacārikā ca aturitacārikā ca.
atk-s0302a:721_4: Tattha yaṃ ekacco ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā pattacīvaraṃ aṃse laggetvā chattaṃ ādāya sarīrato
atk-s0302a:721_6: yaṃ vā pana buddhā kiñcideva bodhaneyyasattaṃ disvā yojanasatampi yojanasahassampi khaṇena gacchanti,
atk-s0302a:721_8: Devasikaṃ pana gāvutaṃ aḍḍhayojanaṃ tigāvutaṃ yojananti ettakaṃ addhānaṃ ajjatanāya nimantanaṃ adhivāsayato janasaṅgahaṃ karoto gamanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:722_0: Nanu ca thero pañcavīsati vassāni chāyā viya dasabalassa pacchato pacchato gacchantova ahosi,
atk-s0302a:722_2: so kismiṃ kāle bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ cārikaṃ carituṃ okāsaṃ labhatīti?
atk-s0302a:722_4: Parinibbute kira satthari mahākassapatthero satthu parinibbāne sannipatitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe
atk-s0302a:722_6: mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ vasantā dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyissāma,
atk-s0302a:722_7: tumhe pure vassūpanāyikāya attano palibodhaṃ ucchinditvā rājagahe sannipatathā”ti vatvā attanā rājagahaṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:722_8: Ānandattheropi bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ ādāya mahājanaṃ saññāpento sāvatthiṃ gantvā tato nikkhamma rājagahaṃ gacchanto dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ cārikaṃ cari.
atk-s0302a:723_0: Yebhuyyena kumārabhūtāti ye te hīnāyāvattā nāma,
atk-s0302a:723_1: te yebhuyyena kumārakā daharā taruṇā ekavassikadvevassikā bhikkhū ceva anupasampannakumārakā ca.
atk-s0302a:723_5: “ānandatthero satthu vissāsiko aṭṭha vare yācitvā upaṭṭhahati,
atk-s0302a:723_9: tasmiṃ āgate mayaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ kātuṃ labhissāmā”ti.
atk-s0302a:723_10: Iminā tāva kāraṇena nesaṃ ñātakā te pabbājesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:723_11: Satthari pana parinibbute tesaṃ sā patthanā upacchinnā,
atk-s0302a:724_4: Tattha hi tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ akappiyanimantanaṃ sādiyitvā ekato paṭiggaṇhantānampi anāpatti,
atk-s0302a:725_1: Pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāyāti dummaṅkūnaṃ niggaheneva pesalānaṃ uposathapavāraṇā vattanti,
atk-s0302a:725_5: Mā pāpicchā pakkhaṃ nissāya saṅghaṃ bhindeyyunti yathā devadatto sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñjanto pāpicche nissāya saṅghaṃ bhindi,
atk-s0302a:725_6: evaṃ aññepi pāpicchā gaṇabandhena kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñjamānā gaṇaṃ vaḍḍhetvā taṃ pakkhaṃ nissāya mā saṅghaṃ bhindeyyunti,
atk-s0302a:725_8: Kulānuddayatāya cāti bhikkhusaṅghe uposathapavāraṇaṃ katvā samaggavāsaṃ vasante manussā salākabhattādīni datvā saggaparāyaṇā bhavanti,
atk-s0302a:725_9: iti imāya kulānuddayatāya ca paññattanti attho.
atk-s0302a:726_0: Sassaghātaṃ maññe carasīti sassaṃ ghātento viya āhiṇḍasi.
atk-s0302a:726_1: Kulūpaghātaṃ maññe carasīti kulāni upaghātento viya hananto viya āhiṇḍasi.
atk-s0302a:726_5: ete tuyhaṃ pāyena yebhuyyena navakā ekavassikaduvassikā daharā ceva sāmaṇerā ca palujjanti bhijjanti.
atk-s0302a:726_6: Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti ayaṃ kumārako attano pamāṇaṃ na jānātīti theraṃ tajjento āha.
atk-s0302a:727_0: Kumārakavādā na muccāmāti kumārakavādato na muccāma.
atk-s0302a:727_1: Tathā hi pana tvanti idamassa evaṃ vattabbatāya kāraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:727_3: yasmā tvaṃ imehi navehi bhikkhūhi indriyasaṃvararahitehi saddhiṃ vicarasi,
atk-s0302a:727_4: tasmā kumārakehi saddhiṃ vicaranto kumārakoti vattabbataṃ arahasīti.
atk-s0302a:728_0: Aññatitthiyapubbo samānoti idaṃ yasmā therassa imasmiṃ sāsane neva ācariyo na upajjhāyo paññāyati,
atk-s0302a:729_5: Tattha aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddisitunti ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ aññaṃ mayhaṃ satthāti evaṃ uddisituṃ na jānāmi.
atk-s0302a:729_6: Sambādho gharāvāsotiādīsu sacepi saṭṭhihatthe ghare yojanasatantarepi vā dve jāyampatikā vasanti,
atk-s0302a:729_11: Pabbajito hi kūṭāgāraratanamayapāsādadevavimānādīsu pihitadvāravātapānesu paṭicchannesu vasantopi neva laggati na sajjati na bajjhati,
atk-s0302a:729_13: Apica sambādho gharāvāso kusalakiriyāya okāsābhāvato rajāpatho asaṃvutasaṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ viya rajānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:729_15: abbhokāso pabbajjā kusalakiriyāya yathā sukhaṃ okāsasabbhāvato.
atk-s0302a:730_2: yadetaṃ sikkhattayabrahmacariyaṃ ekampi divasaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ caritabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:730_3: ekadivasampi ca kilesamalena amalīnaṃ katvā carimakacittaṃ pāpetabbatāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:730_5: idaṃ na sukaraṃ agāraṃ ajjhāvasatā agāramajjhe vasantena ekantaparipuṇṇaṃ…pe… carituṃ,
atk-s0302a:730_6: yaṃnūnāhaṃ kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kasāyarasapītatāya kāsāyāni brahmacariyaṃ carantānaṃ anucchavikāni vatthāni
atk-s0302a:730_7: acchādetvā paridahitvā agārasmā nikkhamitvā anagāriyaṃ pabbajjeyyanti.
atk-s0302a:730_8: Ettha ca yasmā agārassa hitaṃ kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ agāriyanti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:731_0: Paṭapilotikānanti jiṇṇapilotikānaṃ terasahatthopi hi navasāṭako dasānaṃ chinnakālato paṭṭhāya pilotikāti vuccati.
atk-s0302a:731_1: Iti mahārahāni vatthāni chinditvā kataṃ saṅghāṭiṃ sandhāya “paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:731_2: Addhānamaggappaṭipannoti aḍḍhayojanato paṭṭhāya maggo addhānanti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:732_2: imassatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya anupubbikathā kathetabbā –
atk-s0302a:732_3: atīte kira kappasatasahassamatthake padumuttaro nāma satthā udapādi,
atk-s0302a:732_4: tasmiṃ haṃsavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya kheme migadāye viharante vedeho nāma kuṭumbiko asītikoṭidhanavibhavo
atk-s0302a:732_5: pātova subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya gandhapupphādīni gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0302a:732_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā mahānisabhattheraṃ nāma tatiyasāvakaṃ “etadaggaṃ,
atk-s0302a:732_9: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ nisabho”ti etadagge ṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:732_10: Upāsako taṃ sutvā pasanno dhammakathāvasāne mahājane uṭṭhāya gate satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0302a:732_11: sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethā”ti āha. Mahā kho, upāsaka,
atk-s0302a:732_15: ekaṃ sāmaṇerampi vihāre asesetvā bhikkhaṃ adhivāsethāti.
atk-s0302a:732_17: Upāsako satthu adhivāsanaṃ viditvā gehaṃ gantvā mahādānaṃ sajjetvā punadivase satthu kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0302a:732_18: Satthā pattacīvaramādāya bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto upāsakassa gharaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisinno dakkhiṇodakāvasāne
atk-s0302a:733_0: Tasmiṃ antare mahānisabhatthero piṇḍāya caranto tameva vīthiṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0302a:733_1: Upāsako disvā uṭṭhāya gantvā theraṃ vanditvā “pattaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0302a:733_7: Upāsako therassa pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātassa pūretvā nīharitvā adāsi.
atk-s0302a:733_8: Tato theraṃ anugantvā nivatto satthu santike nisīditvā evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0302a:733_9: mahānisabhatthero ‘satthā gehe nisinno’ti vuttepi pavisituṃ na icchi,
atk-s0302a:733_10: atthi nu kho etassa tumhākaṃ guṇehi atireko guṇo”ti.
atk-s0302a:733_14: so bhikkhu na evaṃ nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ udikkhati.
atk-s0302a:733_19: Iti tassa ayañca ayañca guṇo”ti mahāsamuddaṃ pūrayamānova kathesi.
atk-s0302a:733_20: Upāsako pakatiyāpi jalamānadīpo telena āsitto viya suṭṭhutaraṃ pasanno hutvā cintesi –
atk-s0302a:733_22: anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike dhutavādānaṃ aggabhāvatthāya patthanaṃ karissāmī”ti?
atk-s0302a:734_0: So punapi satthāraṃ nimantetvā teneva niyāmena satta divasāni dānaṃ datvā sattame divase aṭṭhasaṭṭhibhikkhusatasahassassa
atk-s0302a:734_1: ticīvarāni datvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā evamāha – “yaṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0302a:734_2: satta divasāni dānaṃ dentassa mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ mettaṃ vacīkammaṃ mettaṃ manokammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:734_3: imināhaṃ na aññaṃ devasampattiṃ vā sakkamārabrahmasampattiṃ vā patthemi,
atk-s0302a:734_4: idaṃ pana me kammaṃ anāgate ekassa buddhassa santike mahānisabhattherena pattaṭṭhānantaraṃ pāpuṇanatthāya
atk-s0302a:734_7: samijjhissati nu kho”ti olokento samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā āha –
atk-s0302a:734_9: anāgate satasahassakappamatthake gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0302a:734_10: tassa tvaṃ tatiyasāvako mahākassapatthero nāma bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0302a:734_11: Taṃ sutvā upāsako “buddhānaṃ dve kathā nāma natthī”ti punadivase pattabbaṃ viya taṃ sampattiṃ amaññittha.
atk-s0302a:734_12: So yāvatāyukaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tattha kālaṅkato sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:735_0: Tato paṭṭhāya devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavanto ito ekanavutikappe vipassimhi sammāsambuddhe bandhumatīnagaraṃ
atk-s0302a:735_1: nissāya kheme migadāye viharante devalokā cavitvā aññatarasmiṃ parijiṇṇe brāhmaṇakule nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:735_2: Tasmiñca kāle “vipassī bhagavā sattame sattame saṃvacchare dhammaṃ kathetī”ti mahantaṃ kolāhalaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:735_9: Brāhmaṇānaṃ kenacideva kiccena sannipāte sati brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā sayaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0302a:735_10: brāhmaṇīnaṃ sannipāte sati sayaṃ gehe tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0302a:735_12: Tasmiṃ pana divase brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ āha – “bhoti,
atk-s0302a:735_14: “Mayaṃ mātugāmajātikā nāma rattiṃ sotuṃ na sakkoma,
atk-s0302a:735_15: divā sossāmī”ti brāhmaṇaṃ gehe ṭhapetvā vatthaṃ pārupitvā upāsikāhi saddhiṃ divā gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0302a:735_16: ekamante nisinnā dhammaṃ sutvā upāsikāhiyeva saddhiṃ āgamāsi.
atk-s0302a:735_17: Atha brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ gehe ṭhapetvā vatthaṃ pārupitvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:736_0: Tasmiṃ ca samaye satthā parisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane sannisinno cittabījaniṃ ādāya ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento
atk-s0302a:736_1: viya sineruṃ matthaṃ katvā sāgaraṃ nimmathento viya dhammakathaṃ katheti.
atk-s0302a:736_2: Brāhmaṇassa parisante nisinnassa dhammaṃ suṇantassa paṭhamayāmasmiṃyeva sakalasarīraṃ pūrayamānā pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajji.
atk-s0302a:736_7: apārupitvā ca nāma bahi carituṃ na sakkā”ti sabbathāpi adātukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:736_8: Athassa nikkhante paṭhamayāme majjhimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji,
atk-s0302a:736_9: so tatheva ca cintetvā tatheva adātukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:736_10: Athassa majjhimayāme nikkhante pacchimayāmepi tatheva pīti uppajji,
atk-s0302a:736_12: pacchāpi jānissāmī”ti vatthaṃ saṅgharitvā satthu pādamūle ṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:736_13: Tato vāmahatthaṃ ābhujitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena tikkhattuṃ apphoṭetvā “jitaṃ me jitaṃ me”ti tayo vāre nadi.
atk-s0302a:737_0: Tasmiñca samaye bandhumarājā dhammāsanassa pacchato antosāṇiyaṃ nisinno dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0302a:737_1: Rañño ca nāma “jitaṃ me”ti saddo amanāpo hoti.
atk-s0302a:737_2: So purisaṃ pesesi “gaccha etaṃ puccha kiṃ vadesī”ti?
atk-s0302a:737_4: “avasesā hatthiyānādīni āruyha asicammādīni gahetvā parasenaṃ jinanti,
atk-s0302a:737_6: ahaṃ pana pacchato āgacchantassa kūṭagoṇassa muggarena sīsaṃ bhinditvā taṃ palāpento viya maccheracittaṃ madditvā pārutavatthaṃ dasabalassa adāsiṃ,
atk-s0302a:737_8: Puriso gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0302a:737_13: “ayaṃ mayhaṃ tuṇhī nisinnassa paṭhamaṃ kiñci adatvā satthu guṇe kathentassa adāsi,
atk-s0302a:737_14: satthu guṇe paṭicca uppannena mayhaṃ ko attho”ti tampi vatthayugaṃ dasabalasseva adāsi.
atk-s0302a:737_17: “tampi tena vatthayugaṃ tathāgatasseva dinna”nti sutvā aññāni dve vatthayugāni pesesi.
atk-s0302a:737_19: Rājā aññānipi cattārīti evaṃ yāva dvattiṃsa vatthayugāni pesesi.
atk-s0302a:737_20: Atha brāhmaṇo “idaṃ vaḍḍhetvā gahaṇaṃ viya hotī”ti attano atthāya ekaṃ brāhmaṇiyā atthāya ekanti dve
atk-s0302a:737_21: vatthayugāni gahetvā tiṃsa yugāni tathāgatasseva adāsi.
atk-s0302a:737_22: Tato paṭṭhāya ca satthu vissāsiko jāto.
atk-s0302a:738_0: Atha naṃ rājā ekadivasaṃ sītasamaye satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇantaṃ disvā satasahassagghanikaṃ attano pārutaṃ rattakambalaṃ datvā āha –
atk-s0302a:738_2: So “kiṃ me iminā kambalena imasmiṃ pūtikāye upanītenā”ti? Cintetvā,
atk-s0302a:738_3: antogandhakuṭiyaṃ tathāgatamañcassa upari vitānaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:738_4: Atha ekadivasaṃ rājā pātova vihāraṃ gantvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ satthu santike nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:738_5: Tasmiñca samaye chabbaṇṇā buddharasmiyo kambalaṃ paṭihaññanti,
atk-s0302a:738_13: na maya”nti pasīditvā yaṃ manussānaṃ upakārabhūtaṃ,
atk-s0302a:738_14: taṃ sabbaṃ aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ katvā sabbaṭṭhakaṃ nāma dānaṃ datvā purohitaṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:738_15: Sopi “aṭṭhaṭṭhakaṃ nāma catusaṭṭhi hotī”ti catusaṭṭhi salākabhattāni upanibandhāpetvā yāvajīvaṃ dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā tato cuto sagge nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:739_0: Puna tato cuto imasmiṃ kappe koṇāgamanassa ca bhagavato kassapadasabalassa cāti dvinnaṃ buddhānaṃ antare bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbiyaghare nibbatto,
atk-s0302a:739_1: so vuddhimanvāya gharāvāsaṃ vasanto ekadivasaṃ araññe jaṅghavihāraṃ carati.
atk-s0302a:739_2: Tasmiñca samaye paccekabuddho nadītīre cīvarakammaṃ karonto anuvāte appahonte saṅgharitvā ṭhapetuṃ āraddho. So disvā, “kasmā, bhante,
atk-s0302a:739_6: “nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne me kenaci parihāni mā hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:739_7: Gharepissa bhaginiyā saddhiṃ bhariyāya kalahaṃ karontiyā paccekabuddho piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0302a:740_0: Athassa bhaginī paccekabuddhassa piṇḍapātaṃ datvā tassa bhariyaṃ sandhāya “evarūpaṃ bālaṃ yojanasatena parivajjeyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:740_2: “imāya dinnaṃ bhattaṃ esa mā bhuñjatū”ti pattaṃ gahetvā piṇḍapātaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalassa pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0302a:740_4: “bāle maṃ tāva akkosa vā pahara vā.
atk-s0302a:740_5: Evarūpassa pana dve asaṅkheyyāni pūritapāramissa pattato bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā kalalaṃ dātuṃ na yutta”nti āha.
atk-s0302a:740_8: bhante”ti kalalaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattaṃ dhovitvā gandhacuṇṇena ubbaṭṭetvā pavarassa catumadhurassa pūretvā
atk-s0302a:740_9: upari āsittena padumagabbhavaṇṇena sappinā vijjotamānaṃ paccekabuddhassa hatthe ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0302a:740_11: evaṃ obhāsajātaṃ me sarīraṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:740_13: Tepi jāyampatikā yāvatāyukaṃ kusalaṃ katvā sagge nibbattitvā puna tato cavitvā upāsako bārāṇasiyaṃ asītikoṭivibhavassa seṭṭhino putto hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0302a:741_1: Tassā pubbe adinnavipākassa tassa kammassa ānubhāvena patikulaṃ paviṭṭhamattāya ummārabbhantare sakalasarīraṃ
atk-s0302a:741_3: Seṭṭhikumāro “kassāyaṃ gandho”ti pucchitvā “seṭṭhikaññāyā”ti sutvā “nīharatha nīharathā”ti ābhataniyāmeneva kulagharaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0302a:741_4: Sā eteneva nīhārena sattasu ṭhānesu paṭinivattitā cintesi –
atk-s0302a:741_7: Attano ābharaṇabhaṇḍaṃ bhañjāpetvā suvaṇṇiṭṭhakaṃ kāresi ratanāyataṃ vidatthivitthataṃ caturaṅgulubbedhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:741_8: Tato haritālamanosilāpiṇḍaṃ gahetvā aṭṭha uppalahatthake ādāya kassapadasabalassa cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gatā.
atk-s0302a:741_9: Tasmiñca khaṇe ekā iṭṭhakapanti parikkhipitvā āgacchamānā ghaṭaniṭṭhakāya ūnā hoti.
atk-s0302a:741_14: Sā āruyha telena haritālamanosilaṃ yojetvā tena bandhanena iṭṭhakaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā upari aṭṭhahi uppalahatthakehi pūjaṃ katvā vanditvā,
atk-s0302a:742_0: Atha tasmiṃyeva khaṇe yassa seṭṭhiputtassa paṭhamaṃ gehaṃ nītā,
atk-s0302a:742_19: Tassā saha gharappavesena sakalagehaṃ candanagandhañceva nīluppalagandhañca vāyi.
atk-s0302a:743_5: Sā ādito paṭṭhāya attano katakammaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0302a:743_6: Seṭṭhiputto “niyyānikaṃ vata buddhānaṃ sāsana”nti pasīditvā yojanikaṃ suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ kambalakañcukena
atk-s0302a:743_7: parikkhipitvā tattha tattha rathacakkappamāṇehi suvaṇṇapadumehi alaṅkari.
atk-s0302a:743_9: So tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasito yojanamatte ṭhāne aññatarasmiṃ amaccakule nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:743_10: Seṭṭhikaññā devalokato cavitvā rājakule jeṭṭhadhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0302a:744_0: Tesu vayappattesu kumārassa vasanagāme nakkhattaṃ saṃghuṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:744_12: natthi no ito sukhumatarassa paṭilābhāya puñña”nti.
atk-s0302a:744_14: “Putta ahaṃ ajjeva tuyhaṃ bārāṇasinagare rajjapaṭilābhampi icchāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:744_19: idha vā ettha vā gehe nisīdissatī”ti?
atk-s0302a:744_20: So pana puññaniyāmena nikkhamitvā bārāṇasiṃ gantvā uyyāne maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipajji.
atk-s0302a:744_21: So cā bārāṇasirañño kālaṅkatassa sattamo divaso hoti.
atk-s0302a:745_0: Amaccā rañño sarīrakiccaṃ katvā rājaṅgaṇe nisīditvā mantayiṃsu –
atk-s0302a:745_11: pañcavidhaṃ rājakakudhabhaṇḍaṃ setacchattañca rathasmiṃyeva ṭhapetvā rathaṃ vissajjetvā pacchato tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:745_16: Ratho kumāraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā ārohanasajjo hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:745_17: Purohito pārupanakaṇṇaṃ apanetvā pādatalāni olokento “tiṭṭhatu ayaṃ dīpo,
atk-s0302a:745_18: dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu dīpesu esa rajjaṃ kātuṃ yutto”ti vatvā,
atk-s0302a:745_19: “punapi tūriyāni paggaṇhātha punapi paggaṇhāthā”ti tikkhattuṃ tūriyāni paggaṇhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:746_11: Te tāvadeva abhisekamaṇḍapaṃ katvā rājadhītaraṃ sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā uyyānaṃ ānetvā kumārassa abhisekaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0302a:747_15: Puna udakaṃ gahetvā dakkhiṇaṃ pacchimaṃ uttaranti evaṃ catasso disā abbhukkiri,
atk-s0302a:747_16: sabbadisāsu aṭṭha aṭṭha katvā dvattiṃsa kapparukkhā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:747_17: So ekaṃ dibbadussaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā “nandarañño vijite suttakantikā itthiyo mā suttaṃ kantiṃsūti evaṃ bheriṃ cārāpethā”ti vatvā,
atk-s0302a:748_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante ekadivasaṃ devī rañño sampattiṃ disvā,
atk-s0302a:748_6: idāni anāgatassa paccayaṃ kusalaṃ na karothā”ti? Āha.
atk-s0302a:748_13: Devī pātova uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya uparipāsāde puratthābhimukhā urena nipajjitvā –
atk-s0302a:749_0: Punadivase dakkhiṇadvāre dānaṃ sajjetvā tatheva akāsi,
atk-s0302a:749_2: Uttaradvāre sajjitadivase pana deviyā tatheva nimantentiyā himavante vasantānaṃ padumavatiyā puttānaṃ
atk-s0302a:749_3: pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ jeṭṭhako mahāpadumapaccekabuddho bhātike āmantesi “mārisā,
atk-s0302a:749_6: Te adhivāsetvā punadivase anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā ākāsena āgantvā uttaradvāre otariṃsu.
atk-s0302a:749_9: Rājā saddhiṃ deviyā gantvā vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā paccekabuddhe pāsādaṃ āropetvā tesaṃ dānaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne rājā saṅghatherassa,
atk-s0302a:749_13: amhākaṃ yāvajīvaṃ idha nivāsāya paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā uyyāne pañca paṇṇasālāsatāni pañca
atk-s0302a:749_14: caṅkamanasatānīti sabbākārena nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ sampādetvā tattha vasāpesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:750_0: Evaṃ kāle gacchante rañño paccanto kupito.
atk-s0302a:750_2: tvaṃ paccekabuddhesu mā pamajjī”ti deviṃ ovaditvā gato.
atk-s0302a:750_4: Mahāpadumapaccekabuddho tiyāmarattiṃ jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā aruṇuggamane ālambanaphalakaṃ ālambitvā ṭhitakova anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi,
atk-s0302a:750_6: Punadivase devī paccekabuddhānaṃ nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ haritūpalittaṃ kāretvā pupphāni vikiritvā dhūpaṃ datvā
atk-s0302a:750_7: tesaṃ āgamanaṃ olokayantī nisinnā āgamanaṃ apassantī purisaṃ pesesi – “gaccha, tāta, jānāhi,
atk-s0302a:750_9: So gantvā mahāpadumassa paṇṇasālāya dvāraṃ vivaritvā tattha apassanto caṅkamanaṃ gantvā ālambanaphalakaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ disvā vanditvā, “kālo,
atk-s0302a:750_12: So “niddāyati maññe”ti gantvā piṭṭhipāde hatthena parāmasi.
atk-s0302a:750_13: Pādānaṃ sītalatāya ceva thaddhatāya ca parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā dutiyassa santikaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0302a:750_14: evaṃ tatiyassāti sabbesaṃ parinibbutabhāvaṃ ñatvā rājakulaṃ gato. “Kahaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0302a:750_18: Devī kandantī rodantī nikkhamitvā nāgarehi saddhiṃ tattha gantvā sādhukīḷitaṃ kāretvā paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0302a:750_19: sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo gahetvā cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0302a:751_0: Rājā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgato paccuggamanaṃ āgataṃ deviṃ pucchi “kiṃ, bhadde,
atk-s0302a:751_7: So nagaraṃ agantvā uyyānameva pavisitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ pakkosāpetvā tassa rajjaṃ paṭiyādetvā sayaṃ samaṇakapabbajjaṃ pabbaji,
atk-s0302a:751_10: Dvepi jhānaṃ bhāvetvā tato cutā brahmaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:752_0: Tesu tattheva vasantesu amhākaṃ satthā loke uppajjitvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena rājagahaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0302a:752_1: Ayaṃ pippalimāṇavo magadharaṭṭhe mahātitthabrāhmaṇagāme kapilabrāhmaṇassa aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatto,
atk-s0302a:752_2: ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare kosiyagottabrāhmaṇassa aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattā.
atk-s0302a:752_3: Tesaṃ kho anukkamena vaḍḍhamānānaṃ pippalimāṇavassa vīsatime vasse bhaddāya soḷasame vasse sampatte mātāpitaro puttaṃ oloketvā, “tāta,
atk-s0302a:753_0: Māṇavo “mama mātaraṃ saññāpessāmī”ti rattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasahassaṃ datvā suvaṇṇakārehi ekaṃ itthirūpaṃ
atk-s0302a:753_1: kārāpetvā tassa majjanaghaṭṭanādikammapariyosāne taṃ rattavatthaṃ nivāsāpetvā vaṇṇasampannehi pupphehi
atk-s0302a:753_2: ceva nānāalaṅkārehi ca alaṅkārāpetvā mātaraṃ pakkosāpetvā āha –
atk-s0302a:753_8: addhā etena saha katapuññā suvaṇṇarūpakapaṭibhāgā bhavissatī”ti aṭṭha brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā sabbakāmehi santappetvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā,
atk-s0302a:753_10: yattha amhākaṃ jātigottabhogehi samānakule evarūpaṃ dārikaṃ passatha,
atk-s0302a:754_4: Tattha taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ nhānatitthe ṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:754_5: Atha bhaddāya dhātī bhaddaṃ nhāpetvā alaṅkaritvā sirigabbhe nisīdāpetvā nhāyituṃ āgacchantī taṃ rūpakaṃ disvā,
atk-s0302a:754_11: Sā paṭikkamitvā “evaṃ thaddhaṃ nāma mahāgīvaṃ disvā,
atk-s0302a:754_13: ayyadhītāya hi me ayaṃ nivāsanapaṭiggāhikāpi ayuttā”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:754_14: Atha naṃ te manussā parivāretvā “evarūpā te sāmidhītā”ti pucchiṃsu. “Kiṃ esā,
atk-s0302a:754_15: imāya sataguṇena sahassaguṇena mayhaṃ ayyā abhirūpatarā,
atk-s0302a:754_18: “Tena hi āgacchā”ti taṃ khujjaṃ gahetvā suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ rathaṃ āropetvā kosiyagottassa gharadvāre ṭhatvā āgamanaṃ nivedayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:755_15: anatthiko hutvā paṇṇaṃ pesissāmī”ti rahogato paṇṇaṃ likhi,
atk-s0302a:755_19: Bhaddāpi “asukassa kira maṃ dātukāmā”ti sutvā rahogatā paṇṇaṃ likhi,
atk-s0302a:755_27: Bhaddāya pippalimāṇavassa pahitanti ca vutte dvepi vācetvā,
atk-s0302a:755_28: “passatha dārakānaṃ kamma”nti phāletvā araññe chaḍḍetvā samānapaṇṇaṃ likhitvā ito ca etto ca pesesuṃ.
atk-s0302a:756_0: Taṃdivasaṃyeva ca māṇavopi ekaṃ pupphadāmaṃ ganthāpesi,
atk-s0302a:756_2: Tāni āsanamajjhe ṭhapetvā bhuttasāyamāsā ubhopi “sayanaṃ āruhissāmā”ti samāgantvā māṇavo dakkhiṇapassena sayanaṃ āruhi.
atk-s0302a:756_7: Te pana aññamaññassa sarīrasamphassabhayena tiyāmarattiṃ niddaṃ anokkamantāva vītināmenti,
atk-s0302a:756_9: Te lokāmisena asaṃsaṭṭhā yāva mātāpitaro dharanti,
atk-s0302a:756_10: tāva kuṭumbaṃ avicāretvā tesu kālaṅkatesu vicārayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:756_12: ekadivasaṃ sarīraṃ ubbaṭṭetvā chaḍḍetabbaṃ suvaṇṇacuṇṇameva magadhanāḷiyā dvādasanāḷimattaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0302a:757_0: So ekadivasaṃ alaṅkataṃ assaṃ āruyha mahājanaparivuto kammantaṃ gantvā khettakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito naṅgalehi
atk-s0302a:757_1: bhinnaṭṭhānato kākādayo sakuṇe gaṇḍuppādakādipāṇe uddharitvā khādante disvā, “tātā,
atk-s0302a:757_12: Sabbametaṃ bhaddāya kāpilāniyā niyyātetvā nikkhamitvā pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:758_0: Bhaddāpi kāpilānī tasmiṃ khaṇe abbhantaravatthumhi tayo tilakumbhe pattharāpetvā dhātīhi parivutā nisinnā kāke tilapāṇake khādamāne disvā,
atk-s0302a:758_7: yadi ca panetaṃ ettakena janena kataṃ akusalaṃ mayhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:758_8: bhavasahassenapi vaṭṭato sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0302a:758_9: ayyaputte āgatamatteyeva sabbaṃ tassa niyyātetvā nikkhamma pabbajissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:759_0: Māṇavo āgantvā nhatvā pāsādaṃ āruyha mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdi,
atk-s0302a:759_2: Dvepi bhuñjitvā parijane nikkhante rahogatā phāsukaṭṭhāne nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:759_4: tvaṃ imaṃ gharaṃ āgacchantī kittakaṃ dhanaṃ āharī”ti?
atk-s0302a:759_14: Tesaṃ ādittapaṇṇakuṭi viya tayo bhavā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:759_15: Te “pabbajissāmā”ti vatvā antarāpaṇato kasāyarasapītāni vatthāni mattikāpatte ca āharāpetvā aññamaññaṃ kese ohāretvā,
atk-s0302a:759_17: te uddissa amhākaṃ pabbajjā”ti pabbajitvā thavikāsu patte osāpetvā aṃse laggetvā pāsādato otariṃsu.
atk-s0302a:759_18: Gehe dāsesu ca kammakāresu ca na koci sañjāni.
atk-s0302a:760_0: Atha ne brāhmaṇagāmato nikkhamma dāsagāmadvārena gacchante ākappakuttavasena dāsagāmavāsino sañjāniṃsu.
atk-s0302a:760_1: Te rudantā pādesu nipatitvā “kiṃ amhe anāthe karotha ayyā”ti? Āhaṃsu. “Mayaṃ,
atk-s0302a:760_5: tumheva tumhākaṃ sīsaṃ dhovitvā bhujissā hutvā jīvathā”ti vatvā tesaṃ rodantānaṃyeva pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:760_6: Thero purato gacchanto nivattitvā olokento cintesi –
atk-s0302a:760_7: “ayaṃ bhaddā kāpilānī sakalajambudīpagghanikā itthī mayhaṃ pacchato āgacchati.
atk-s0302a:760_9: yaṃ kocideva evaṃ cinteyya ‘ime pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0302a:760_11: “Koci vā pana manaṃ padūsetvā apāyapūrako bhaveyya.
atk-s0302a:760_12: Imaṃ pahāya mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0302a:761_0: So purato gacchanto dvedhāpathaṃ disvā tassa matthake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:761_3: tādisiṃ itthiṃ mama pacchato āgacchantiṃ disvā,
atk-s0302a:761_4: ‘ime pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkontī’ti cintetvā amhesu paduṭṭhacitto mahājano apāyapūrako bhaveyya.
atk-s0302a:761_8: ‘pabbajitvāpi vinā na bhavantī’ti amhākaṃ dosaṃ passanti,
atk-s0302a:761_10: vinā bhavissāmā”ti tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā catūsu ṭhānesu pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha,
atk-s0302a:761_11: “satasahassakappappamāṇe addhāne kato mittasanthavo ajja bhijjatī”ti vatvā,
atk-s0302a:761_15: amhākaṃ vāmamaggo vaṭṭatī”ti vanditvā maggaṃ paṭipannā.
atk-s0302a:761_16: Tesaṃ dvedhābhūtakāle ayaṃ mahāpathavī “ahaṃ cakkavāḷagirisinerupabbate dhāretuṃ sakkontīpi tumhākaṃ
atk-s0302a:761_17: guṇe dhāretuṃ na sakkomī”ti vadantī viya viravamānā akampi,

atk-s0302a:762_7: Nisīdanto pana aññataro paṃsukūliko viya anisīditvā buddhavesaṃ gahetvā asītihatthā ghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjento nisīdi.

atk-s0302a:765_2: Muddhāpi tassa vipateyyāti yassa aññassa “ajānaṃyeva jānāmī”ti paṭiññassa bāhirakassa satthuno evaṃ sabbacetasā

atk-s0302a:765_17: mahākassapasadisānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sahassampi satasahassampi nipaccākāradassanena neva dasabalassa pādapiṭṭhe
atk-s0302a:765_18: lomamattampi vikopetuṃ paṃsukūlacīvare vā aṃsumattampi cāletuṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0302a:766_0: Tasmātiha te kassapāti yasmā ahaṃ jānanto eva “jānāmī”ti,
atk-s0302a:766_1: passanto eva ca “passāmī”ti vadāmi, tasmā, kassapa,
atk-s0302a:766_6: Yo hi therādīsu hirottappaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā upasaṅkamati therādayopi taṃ sahirikā saottappā ca hutvā upasaṅkamantīti ayamettha ānisaṃso.
atk-s0302a:766_8: Aṭṭhiṃ katvāti attānaṃ tena dhammena aṭṭhikaṃ katvā,
atk-s0302a:766_9: taṃ vā dhammaṃ “esa mayhaṃ attho”ti aṭṭhiṃ katvā.
atk-s0302a:766_11: Sabbacetasā samannāharitvāti cittassa thokampi bahi gantuṃ adento sabbena samannāhāracittena samannāharitvā.
atk-s0302a:766_13: ñāṇasotañca pasādasotañca odahitvā mayā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sakkaccameva suṇissāmīti evañhi te sikkhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:766_14: Sātasahagatā ca me kāyagatāsatīti asubhesu ceva ānāpāne ca paṭhamajjhānavasena sukhasampayuttā kāyagatāsati.
atk-s0302a:766_16: therassa ayameva pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca ahosi.
atk-s0302a:767_2: Cattāro hi paribhogā theyyaparibhogo iṇaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo sāmiparibhogoti.
atk-s0302a:767_3: Tattha dussīlassa saṅghamajjhe nisīditvā bhuñjantassāpi paribhogo theyyaparibhogo nāma. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:767_8: Iti khīṇāsavova sāmī hutvā anaṇo paribhuñjati.
atk-s0302a:767_9: Thero attanā puthujjanena hutvā paribhuttaparibhogaṃ iṇaparibhogaṃyeva karonto evamāha.
atk-s0302a:767_10: Aṭṭhamiyā aññā udapādīti aṭṭhame divase arahattaphalaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0302a:768_1: bhagavā maggā okkammāti maggato okkamanaṃ paṭhamataraṃ taṃdivaseyeva ahosi,
atk-s0302a:768_3: Desanāvārassa pana evaṃ āgatattā arahattādhigamo paṭhamaṃ dīpito.
atk-s0302a:768_5: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “imaṃ bhikkhuṃ jātiāraññikaṃ jātipaṃsukūlikaṃ jātiekāsanikaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0302a:769_0: Mudukā kho tyāyanti mudukā kho te ayaṃ.
atk-s0302a:769_1: Imañca pana vācaṃ bhagavā taṃ cīvaraṃ padumapupphavaṇṇena pāṇinā antantena parāmasanto āha.
atk-s0302a:769_6: Thero pana yasmā cīvarassa vā pattassa vā vaṇṇe kathite “imaṃ tumhākaṃ gaṇhathā”tivacanaṃ cārittameva,
atk-s0302a:769_11: tvaṃ imāni paribhogajiṇṇāni paṃsukūlāni pārupituṃ sakkhissasīti vadati.
atk-s0302a:769_15: ahaṃ imaṃ cīvaraṃ puṇṇaṃ nāma dāsiṃ pārupitvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ taṃ susānaṃ pavisitvā tumbamattehi
atk-s0302a:769_16: pāṇakehi samparikiṇṇaṃ te pāṇake vidhunitvā mahāariyavaṃse ṭhatvā aggahesiṃ,
atk-s0302a:769_17: tassa me imaṃ cīvaraṃ gahitadivase dasasahassacakkavāḷe mahāpathavī mahāviravaṃ viravamānā kampittha,
atk-s0302a:769_20: “imaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhantena bhikkhunā jātipaṃsukūlikena jātiāraññikena jātiekāsanikena jātisapadānacārikena bhavituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0302a:769_21: tvaṃ imassa cīvarassa anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasī”ti.
atk-s0302a:769_22: Theropi attanā pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti,
atk-s0302a:769_23: so taṃ atakkayitvā “ahametaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūressāmī”ti ussāhena sugatacīvarassa anucchavikaṃ kātukāmo “dhāressāmahaṃ,
atk-s0302a:769_26: Evaṃ pana cīvaraparivattanaṃ katvā ca therena pārutacīvaraṃ bhagavā pārupi,
atk-s0302a:769_28: Tasmiṃ samaye mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā unnadantī kampittha.
atk-s0302a:770_0: Bhagavato puttotiādīsu thero bhagavantaṃ nissāya ariyāya jātiyā jātoti bhagavato putto.
atk-s0302a:770_1: Urena vasitvā mukhato nikkhantaovādavasena pabbajjāya ceva upasampadāya ca patiṭṭhitattā oraso mukhato jāto.
atk-s0302a:770_2: Ovādadhammato jātattā ovādadhammena ca nimmitattā dhammajo dhammanimmito.
atk-s0302a:770_4: Paṭiggahitāni sāṇāni paṃsukūlānīti satthārā pārutaṃ paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupanatthāya paṭiggahitaṃ.
atk-s0302a:771_0: Sammā vadamāno vadeyyāti yaṃ puggalaṃ “bhagavato putto”tiādīhi guṇehi sammā vadamāno vadeyya,
atk-s0302a:771_3: Ettāvatā therena pabbajjā ca parisodhitā hoti.
atk-s0302a:771_7: kiṃ so anupajjhāyo anācariyo nhāpitamuṇḍako sayaṃgahitakāsāvo “titthiyapakkantako”ti saṅkhaṃ gato evaṃ tigāvutaṃ maggaṃ paccuggamanaṃ labhati,
atk-s0302a:771_8: tīhi ovādehi pabbajjaṃ vā upasampadaṃ vā labhati,
atk-s0302a:771_10: Passa yāva dubbhāsitaṃ vacanaṃ thullanandāya bhikkhuniyāti.
atk-s0302a:771_11: Evaṃ pabbajjaṃ sodhetvā idāni chahi abhiññāhi sīhanādaṃ nadituṃ ahaṃ kho,
atk-s0302a:773_1: Dvādasame tathāgatoti satto. Na hetaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0302a:773_4: Nādibrahmacariyakanti maggabrahmacariyassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāpi na hoti. Etañhi, āvuso,
atk-s0302a:773_7: Etaṃ ādibrahmacariyakanti etaṃ maggabrahmacariyassa ādi pubbabhāgapaṭipadā.

atk-s0302a:781_0: Dhammuddhaccakusalo hoti, na ca sammoha gacchatī”ti. ; –
atk-s0302a:782_1: Tisso pana saṅgītiyo anāruḷhaṃ dhātukathā ārammaṇakathā asubhakathā ñāṇavatthukathā vijjākaraṇḍakoti
atk-s0302a:782_2: imehi pañcahi kathāvatthūhi paribāhiraṃ guḷhavinayaṃ guḷhavessantaraṃ guḷhamahosadhaṃ vaṇṇapiṭakaṃ aṅgulimālapiṭakaṃ
atk-s0302a:782_3: raṭṭhapālagajjitaṃ āḷavakagajjitaṃ vedallapiṭakanti abuddhavacanaṃ pariyattisaddhammappatirūpakaṃ nāma.
atk-s0302a:783_1: Chaṇakālesu hi manussā “ābharaṇabhaṇḍakaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti āpaṇaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0302a:783_5: Imāni hi ghanāni ceva vaṇṇavantāni ca appagghāni cā”ti.
atk-s0302a:783_9: sobhanti ceva appagghāni cā”ti tāni gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0302a:783_11: Evaṃ taṃ jātarūpappatirūpake uppanne antaradhāyati nāma.
atk-s0302a:784_0: Atha saddhammassa antaradhānaṃ hotīti adhigamasaddhammassa paṭipattisaddhammassa pariyattisaddhammassāti tividhassāpi saddhammassa antaradhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:784_2: Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā pāpuṇituṃ na sakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:784_4: Tato cha abhiññā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:784_5: Idāni kāle gacchante tisso vijjā pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā āsavakkhayamattaṃ pāpuṇissanti.
atk-s0302a:784_9: Gacchante kāle sotāpattiphalampi pattuṃ na sakkhissanti.
atk-s0302a:784_10: Atha nesaṃ yadā vipassanā imehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā āraddhamattāva ṭhassati,
atk-s0302a:785_0: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi bhikkhū catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ anucchavikaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:785_1: Gacchante kāle taṃ asakkontā channaṃ abhiññānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:785_4: Gacchante pana kāle arahattassa anucchavikaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūretuṃ asakkontā anāgāmiphalassa anucchavikaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūressanti,
atk-s0302a:785_7: Yadā pana sotāpattiphalassapi anucchavikaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūretuṃ asakkontā sīlapārisuddhimatteva ṭhassanti,
atk-s0302a:786_1: na tāva sāsanaṃ antarahitanti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0302a:786_3: abhidhammapiṭake antarahite itaresu dvīsu tiṭṭhantesupi antarahitanti na vattabbameva.
atk-s0302a:786_6: mahāvinaye antarahite dvīsu pātimokkhesu vattamānesupi sāsanaṃ anantarahitameva.
atk-s0302a:786_9: Tasmiṃ antarahite sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:787_0: Nanu ca kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kapilo nāma anārādhakabhikkhu “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti bījaniṃ gahetvā
atk-s0302a:787_2: atha tassa bhayena yesampi pātimokkho vattati,
atk-s0302a:787_8: Yathā hi mahato taḷākassa pāḷiyā thirāya udakaṃ na ṭhassatīti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:787_9: udake sati padumādīni pupphāni na pupphissantīti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:787_10: evameva mahātaḷākassa thirapāḷisadise tepiṭake buddhavacane sati mahātaḷāke udakasadisā paṭipattipūrakā kulaputtā natthīti na vattabbā,
atk-s0302a:787_11: tesu sati mahātaḷāke padumādīni pupphāni viya sotāpannādayo ariyapuggalā natthīti na vattabbāti evaṃ ekantato pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:788_0: Pathavīdhātūti dve satasahassāni cattāri ca nahutāni bahalā mahāpathavī.
atk-s0302a:788_1: Āpodhātūti pathavito paṭṭhāya yāva subhakiṇhabrahmalokā uggataṃ kappavināsakaṃ udakaṃ.
atk-s0302a:788_2: Tejodhātūti pathavito paṭṭhāya yāva ābhassarabrahmalokā uggato kappavināsako aggi.
atk-s0302a:788_3: Vāyodhātūti pathavito paṭṭhāya yāva vehapphalabrahmalokā uggato kappavināsako vāyu.
atk-s0302a:788_4: Etesu hi ekadhammopi satthu sāsanaṃ antaradhāpetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:788_6: Idheva te uppajjantīti lohato lohakhādakaṃ malaṃ viya imasmiṃ mayhaṃyeva sāsane te uppajjanti.
atk-s0302a:789_0: Ādikeneva opilavatīti ettha ādikenāti ādānena gahaṇena.
atk-s0302a:789_3: yathā udakacarā nāvā bhaṇḍaṃ gaṇhantī nimujjati,
atk-s0302a:789_4: evaṃ pariyattiādīnaṃ pūraṇena saddhammassa antaradhānaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0302a:789_7: Pariyattiyā pūrayamānāya pariyattidharā puggalā paṭipattiṃ pūrenti,
atk-s0302a:789_9: Iti navacando viya pariyattiyādīsu vaḍḍhamānāsu mayhaṃ sāsanaṃ vaḍḍhati yevāti dasseti.
atk-s0302a:790_0: Idāni yehi dhammehi saddhammassa antaradhānañceva ṭhiti ca hoti,
atk-s0302a:790_6: Tattha yo cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ ārohanto chattaṃ dhāreti,
atk-s0302a:791_0: Yo dhammassavanassa kāle saṅghuṭṭhe daharasāmaṇerehi parivārito nisīdati,
atk-s0302a:793_0: Tisso pana sikkhā apūrentova sikkhāya agāravo nāma hoti.
atk-s0302a:793_1: Aṭṭha samāpattiyo anibbattento tāsaṃ vā pana nibbattanatthāya payogaṃ akaronto samādhismiṃ agāravo nāma.
